 20336                                  ;============================================================================
 20337                                  ; DUP.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 20338                                  ;============================================================================
 20339                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20340                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20341                                  
 20342                                  ;** 	Low level DUP routine for use by EXEC when creating a new process.
 20343                                  ;   	Exports the DUP to the server machine and increments the SFT ref count
 20344                                  ;
 20345                                  ;	DOS_DUP
 20346                                  ;
 20347                                  ;	Modification history:
 20348                                  ;
 20349                                  ;	  Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 20350                                  
 20351                                  ;BREAK <DOS_DUP -- DUP SFT across network>
 20352                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20353                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_DUP
 20354                                  ;
 20355                                  ; Inputs:
 20356                                  ;	[THISSFT] set to the SFT for the file being DUPed
 20357                                  ;		(a non net SFT is OK, in this case the ref
 20358                                  ;		 count is simply incremented)
 20359                                  ; Function:
 20360                                  ;	Signal to the devices that a logical open is occurring
 20361                                  ; Returns:
 20362                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 20363                                  ;    Carry clear
 20364                                  ;	SFT ref_count is incremented
 20365                                  ; Registers modified: None.
 20366                                  ; NOTE:
 20367                                  ;	This routine is called from $CREATE_PROCESS_DATA_BLOCK at DOSINIT
 20368                                  ;	time with SS NOT DOSGROUP. There will be no Network handles at
 20369                                  ;	that time.
 20370                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20371                                  
 20372                                  DOS_DUP:
 20373                                  	;LES	DI,[CS:THISSFT]  ; MSDOS 3.3
 20374                                  
 20375                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20376 000030B0 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 20377 000030B5 26C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[es:THISSFT]
 20378                                  
 20379                                  	;Entry	Dos_Dup_Direct
 20380                                  DOS_Dup_Direct:
 20381 000030BA E885E7                  	call	IsSFTNet
 20382 000030BD 7503                    	JNZ	short DO_INC
 20383 000030BF E85A21                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT
 20384                                  DO_INC:
 20385                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 20386 000030C2 26FF05                  	inc	word [ES:DI]		; Clears carry (if this ever wraps
 20387                                  					;   we're in big trouble anyway)
 20388 000030C5 C3                      	retn
 20389                                  
 20390                                  ;============================================================================
 20391                                  ; CREATE.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 20392                                  ;============================================================================
 20393                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20394                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20395                                  
 20396                                  ;TITLE	DOS_CREATE/DOS_CREATE_NEW - Internal CREATE calls for MS-DOS
 20397                                  ;NAME	DOS_CREATE
 20398                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20399                                  ;**	Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.
 20400                                  ;
 20401                                  ;	DOS_CREATE
 20402                                  ;	DOS_CREATE_NEW
 20403                                  ;	SET_MKND_ERR
 20404                                  ;	SET_Media_ID
 20405                                  ;	SET_EXT_Mode
 20406                                  ;
 20407                                  ;	Revision history:
 20408                                  ;
 20409                                  ;	    A000 version 4.00	  Jan. 1988
 20410                                  ;	    A001  D490 -- Change IOCTL subfunctios from 63h,43h to 66h, 46h
 20411                                  
 20412                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20413                                  
 20414                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 20415                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 20416                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD
 20417                                  ;	I_Need	ExtErr_locus,BYTE
 20418                                  ;	I_need	JShare,DWORD
 20419                                  ;	I_need	VOLCHNG_FLAG,BYTE
 20420                                  ;	I_need	SATTRIB,BYTE
 20421                                  ;	I_need	CALLVIDM,DWORD
 20422                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000; extended open
 20423                                  ;	I_need	NAME1,BYTE			  ;AN000;
 20424                                  ;	I_need	NO_NAME_ID,BYTE 		  ;AN000;
 20425                                  ;	I_need	Packet_Temp,WORD		  ;AN000;
 20426                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD 		  ;AN000;
 20427                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;AN000;
 20428                                  
 20429                                  ;***	DOS_CREATE - Create a File
 20430                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20431                                  ;	DOS_Create is called to create the specified file, truncating
 20432                                  ;	the old one if it exists.
 20433                                  ;
 20434                                  ;	ENTRY	AX is Attribute to create
 20435                                  ;		(ds) = DOSDATA
 20436                                  ;		[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20437                                  ;			terminated)
 20438                                  ;		[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20439                                  ;			( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20440                                  ;			 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20441                                  ;		[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20442                                  ;			(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20443                                  ;		[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20444                                  ;			(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20445                                  ;		[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20446                                  ;
 20447                                  ;	EXIT	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20448                                  ;		CARRY CLEAR
 20449                                  ;		    THISSFT filled in.
 20450                                  ;			sf_mode = unchanged for FCB, sharing_compat + open_for_both
 20451                                  ;		CARRY SET
 20452                                  ;		    AX is error code
 20453                                  ;			error_path_not_found
 20454                                  ;				Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20455                                  ;			error_bad_curr_dir
 20456                                  ;				Bad path in current directory part of path
 20457                                  ;			error_access_denied
 20458                                  ;				Attempt to re-create read only file , or
 20459                                  ;				create a second volume id or create a dir
 20460                                  ;			error_sharing_violation
 20461                                  ;				The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 20462                                  ;				generates an INT 24
 20463                                  ;	USES	all but DS
 20464                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20465                                  
 20466                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20467                                  	; DOSCODE:6920h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20468                                  
 20469                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 20715                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20716                                  ; Procedure Name : Dos_Create_New
 20717                                  ;
 20718                                  ; Inputs:
 20719                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20720                                  ;		terminated)
 20721                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20722                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20723                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20724                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20725                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20726                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20727                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20728                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20729                                  ;	AX is Attribute to create
 20730                                  ; Function:
 20731                                  ;	Try to create the specified file truncating an old one that exists
 20732                                  ; Outputs:
 20733                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20734                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20735                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 20736                                  ;		sf_mode = sharing_compat + open_for_both for Non-FCB SFT
 20737                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20738                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20739                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20740                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20741                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20742                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20743                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20744                                  ;			Create a second volume id or create a dir
 20745                                  ;		error_file_exists
 20746                                  ;			Already a file by this name
 20747                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20748                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20749                                  
 20750                                  DOS_Create_New:
 20751 0000318D B401                    	MOV	AH,1		; Truncate is NOT OK
 20752 0000318F E936FF                  	JMP	Create_inter

 20756                                  ; Procedure Name : Set_Media_ID
 20757                                  ;
 20758                                  ; Inputs:
 20759                                  ;	NAME1= Volume ID
 20760                                  ;	BH= 0, delete volume id
 20761                                  ;	    1, set new volume id
 20762                                  ;	DS= DOSGROUP

 20765                                  ; Outputs:

 20778

 20782                                  	;MOV	CX,0866H	;AN001;;>32mb  get media id

 20785 0000319B B96648                  	mov	cx,4866h	; ch = FAT32 disk drive (CATEGORY CODE)
 20786                                  				; cl = minor code,
 20787                                  				;      get volume serial number (and name)
 20788

 20791

 20793                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20794 000031A1 51                      	push	cx
 20795                                  
 20796 000031A2 53                      	PUSH	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20797 000031A3 52                      	PUSH	DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20798 000031A4 30FF                    	XOR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb
 20799                                  
 20800                                  	;invoke	$IOCTL		;AN000;;>32mb
 20801 000031A6 E8DCF6                  	call	_$IOCTL	
 20802                                  
 20803 000031A9 5A                      	POP	DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20804 000031AA 5B                      	POP	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20805                                  
 20806                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20807 000031AB 59                      	pop	cx
 20808                                  	;JC	short geterr	;AN000;;>32mb
 20809 000031AC 730A                    	jnc	short Set_Media_ID_2
 20810 000031AE 80FD48                  	cmp	ch,48h		; is it FAT32 disk drive request?
 20811 000031B1 F9                      	stc
 20812 000031B2 7529                    	jne	short geterr	; (ch=8 request failed!)

 20814                                  				; (except FAT32)
 20815 000031B6 EBE9                    	jmp     short Set_Media_ID_1 ; and try again
 20816

 20838

 20840

 20874                                  ; Procedure Name : Set_EXT_mode
 20875                                  ;
 20876                                  ; Inputs:
 20877                                  ;	[EXTOPEN_ON]= flag for extended open
 20878                                  ;	SAVE_BX= mode specified in Extended Open
 20879                                  ; Function:
 20880                                  ;	Set mode in ThisSFT
 20881                                  ; Outputs:
 20882                                  ;	carry set,mode is set if from Extended Open
 20883                                  ;	carry clear, mode not set yet

 20887                                  
 20888                                  Set_EXT_mode:
 20889                                  
 20890                                  ;hkn; SS override
 20891 000031E3 36F606[F605]01          	TEST	byte [ss:EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 20892 000031E9 740B                    	JZ	short NOTEX		    ;AN000;EO. no, do normal
 20893 000031EB 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;AN000;EO.
 20894                                  
 20895                                  ;hkn; SS override
 20896 000031EC 36A1[0106]              	MOV	AX,[ss:SAVE_BX]		    ;AN000;EO.
 20897                                  	;or	[es:di+2],ax
 20898 000031F0 26094502                	OR	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],AX ;AN000;EO.
 20899 000031F4 58                      	POP	AX			    ;AN000;EO.
 20900 000031F5 F9                      	STC				    ;AN000;EO.
 20901                                  NOTEX:					    ;AN000;
 20902 000031F6 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;EO.

 20904                                  ;============================================================================
 20905                                  ; OPEN.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 20906                                  ;============================================================================
 20907                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20908                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20909                                  
 20910                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_OPEN - Internal OPEN call for MS-DOS
 20911                                  ;	NAME	DOS_OPEN
 20912                                  
 20913                                  ;**	OPEN.ASM - File Open
 20914                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20915                                  ;	Low level routines for openning a file from a file spec.
 20916                                  ;	Also misc routines for sharing errors
 20917                                  ;
 20918                                  ;	DOS_Open
 20919                                  ;	Check_Access_AX
 20920                                  ;	SHARE_ERROR
 20921                                  ;	SET_SFT_MODE
 20922                                  ;	Code_Page_Mismatched_Error		   ; DOS 4.00
 20923                                  ;
 20924                                  ;	Revision history:
 20925                                  ;
 20926                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 20927                                  ;	    A000	version 4.00   Jan. 1988
 20928                                  ;
 20929                                  ;	M034 - The value in save_bx must be pushed on to the stack for
 20930                                  ; 	       remote extended opens and not save_cx.
 20931                                  ;
 20932                                  ;	M035 - if open made from exec then we must set the appropriate bits
 20933                                  ;	       on the stack before calling off to the redir.
 20934                                  ;	M042 - Bit 11 of DOS34_FLAG set indicates that the redir knows how 
 20935                                  ;	       to handle open from exec. In this case set the appropriate bit
 20936                                  ;	       else do not.
 20937                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------	
 20938                                  
 20939                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20940                                  
 20941                                  ;	i_need	NoSetDir,BYTE
 20942                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 20943                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 20944                                  ;	i_need	CURBUF,DWORD
 20945                                  ;	i_need	CurrentPDB,WORD
 20946                                  ;	i_need	CURR_DIR_END,WORD
 20947                                  ;	I_need	RetryCount,WORD
 20948                                  ;	I_need	Open_Access,BYTE
 20949                                  ;	I_need	fSharing,BYTE
 20950                                  ;	i_need	JShare,DWORD
 20951                                  ;	I_need	FastOpenFlg,byte
 20952                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20953                                  ;	I_need	ALLOWED,BYTE			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20954                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20955                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_LOCUS,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20956                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_ACTION,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20957                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_CLASS,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20958                                  ;	I_need	CPSWFLAG,BYTE			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20959                                  ;	I_need	EXITHOLD,DWORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20960                                  ;	I_need	THISDPB,DWORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20961                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_CX,WORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20962                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;M034
 20963                                  ;
 20964                                  ;	I_need	DOS_FLAG,BYTE
 20965                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD			  ;M042
 20966                                  
 20967                                  ;Break	<DOS_Open - internal file access>
 20968                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20969                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_Open
 20970                                  ;
 20971                                  ; Inputs:
 20972                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20973                                  ;		terminated)
 20974                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20975                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20976                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20977                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20978                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20979                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file found
 20980                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20981                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20982                                  ;	AX is Access and Sharing mode
 20983                                  ;	  High NIBBLE of AL (Sharing Mode)
 20984                                  ;		sharing_compat	   file is opened in compatibility mode
 20985                                  ;		sharing_deny_none  file is opened Multi reader, Multi writer
 20986                                  ;		sharing_deny_read  file is opened Only reader, Multi writer
 20987                                  ;		sharing_deny_write file is opened Multi reader, Only writer
 20988                                  ;		sharing_deny_both  file is opened Only reader, Only writer
 20989                                  ;	  Low NIBBLE of AL (Access Mode)
 20990                                  ;		open_for_read	file is opened for reading
 20991                                  ;		open_for_write	file is opened for writing
 20992                                  ;		open_for_both	file is opened for both reading and writing.
 20993                                  ;
 20994                                  ;	  For FCB SFTs AL should = sharing_compat + open_for_both
 20995                                  ;		(not checked)
 20996                                  ; Function:
 20997                                  ;	Try to open the specified file
 20998                                  ; Outputs:
 20999                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 21000                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 21001                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 21002                                  ;	CARRY SET
 21003                                  ;	    AX is error code
 21004                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 21005                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 21006                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 21007                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 21008                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 21009                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 21010                                  ;		error_invalid_access
 21011                                  ;			Bad sharing mode or bad access mode or bad combination
 21012                                  ;		error_access_denied
 21013                                  ;			Attempt to open read only file for writting, or
 21014                                  ;			open a directory
 21015                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 21016                                  ;			The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 21017                                  ;			generates an INT 24 on compatibility mode SFTs
 21018                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 21019                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21020                                  
 21021                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21022                                  ; DOSCODE:6A60h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 21023                                  ; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 21024                                  ; DOSCODE:6A4Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 21025                                  
 21026                                  ; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21027                                  ; DOSCODE:71BBh (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 21028                                  
 21029                                  DOS_OPEN:
 21030                                  	; DS has been set up to DOSDATA in file.asm and fcbio2.asm. 
 21031                                  
 21032 000031F7 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 21033 000031FC E83301                  	CALL	Check_Access_AX
 21034 000031FF 722B                    	JC	short do_ret_label	    ; retc
 21035                                  
 21036 00003201 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 21037 00003205 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH
 21038                                  
 21039                                  	; sleaze! move only access/sharing mode in. Leave sf_isFCB unchanged
 21040                                  
 21041 00003207 26884502                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],AL ; For moment do this on FCBs too
 21042 0000320B 06                      	PUSH	ES
 21043 0000320C C436[A205]              	LES	SI,[THISCDS]
 21044                                  	; 18/08/2018
 21045 00003210 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1 ; 0FFFFh
 21046 00003213 7530                    	JNZ	short TEST_RE_NET1
 21047 00003215 07                      	POP	ES
 21048                                  
 21049                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 21050                                  ;Extended open hooks
 21051 00003216 F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 21052 0000321B 7410                    	JZ	short _NOEXTOP 		    ;FT. no, do normal			;AN000;
 21053                                  _IFS_extopen:									;AN000;
 21054 0000321D A0[0106]                	MOV	AL,[SAVE_BX]		    ; M034 - save_bx has original bx  
 21055                                  					    ; with which call was made. This
 21056                                  					    ; has the open access bits. 
 21057                                  	;;MOV	AL,[SAVE_CX]		    ; M034 - FT. al= create attribute
 21058                                  	
 21059 00003220 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;FT. pass create attr to IFS	;AN000;
 21060                                  	;mov	ax,112Eh
 21061                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 46    ;FT. issue extended open verb	;AN000;
 21062 00003221 B82E11                  	mov	ax,(MultNET*256)+46 
 21063 00003224 CD2F                    	INT	2FH			    ;FT.				;AN000;
 21064 00003226 5B                      	POP	BX			    ;FT. trash bx			;AN000;
 21065 00003227 C606[F605]00            	MOV	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],0	    ;FT.				;AN000;
 21066                                  
 21067                                  do_ret_label:
 21068 0000322C C3                      	retn				    ;FT.				;AN000;
 21069                                  _NOEXTOP:
 21070                                  ;Extended open hooks
 21071                                  	;
 21072                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 21073                                  	;transfer NET_SEQ_OPEN
 21074                                  ;ELSE
 21075                                  	
 21076                                  do_net_int2f:
 21077 0000322D F606[8600]01            	test	byte [DOS_FLAG],EXECOPEN ; Q: was this open call made from exec
 21078 00003232 7409                    	jz	short not_exec_open	; N: just do net open
 21079                                  					; Y: check to see if redir is aware
 21080                                  					;    of this 
 21081                                  	
 21082                                  					; M042 - start
 21083                                  	;test	word [DOS34_FLAG],EXEC_AWARE_REDIR ; 800h
 21084 00003234 F606[1206]08            	test	byte [DOS34_FLAG+1],(EXEC_AWARE_REDIR>>8)
 21085                                  					; Q: does this redir know how to 
 21086                                  					;    this
 21087 00003239 7402                    	jz	short not_exec_open	; N: just do net open
 21088                                  					; Y: set bit 3 of access byte and 
 21089                                  					;    set sharing mode to DENY_WRITE
 21090                                  					; M042 - end
 21091                                  	
 21092                                  	; NOTE: This specific mode has not been set for the code assembled
 21093                                  	; under the "NOT Installed" conditional. Currently Installed is 
 21094                                  	; always one.
 21095                                  					; M035 - set the bits on the stack
 21096                                  	;mov	al,23h
 21097 0000323B B023                    	mov	AL,SHARING_DENY_WRITE+EXEC_OPEN
 21098                                  	
 21099                                  not_exec_open:
 21100                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 21101 0000323D 50                      	PUSH	AX
 21102                                  
 21103                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 22
 21104                                  	;INT	2FH
 21105                                  
 21106 0000323E B81611                  	mov     ax,1116h
 21107 00003241 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - OPEN EXISTING REMOTE FILE
 21108                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 21109                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file to open
 21110                                  			; STACK: WORD file open mode
 21111                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 21112                                  
 21113 00003243 5B                      	POP	BX			; clean stack
 21114                                  ;do_ret_label: ; 09/08/2018
 21115 00003244 C3                      	retn
 21116                                  ;ENDIF
 21117                                  
 21118                                  TEST_RE_NET1:
 21119                                  	;TEST	word [ES:SI+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 21120                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21121 00003245 26F6444480              	test	byte [ES:SI+curdir.flags+1],curdir_isnet>>8
 21122 0000324A 07                      	POP	ES
 21123                                  	; 18/05/2019

 21125                                  
 21126                                  ;Extended open hooks
 21127                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 21130                                  ;Extended open hooks
 21131

 21134                                  ;ELSE
 21135 00003254 EBD7                    	jmp	short do_net_int2f

 21148                                  
 21149                                  ; DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/16/86
 21150                                  
 21151 00003261 731D                    	JNC	short Open_found
 21152 00003263 7511                    	JNZ	short bad_path2
 21153 00003265 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL
 21154 00003267 740D                    	JZ	short bad_path2
 21155                                  OpenFNF:
 21156 00003269 B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found	; 2
 21157                                  OpenBadRet:
 21158                                  ;hkn; FastOpenFlg is in DOSDATA use SS override
 21159                                  	; 12/08/2018
 21160                                  	;mov	byte [cs:FastOpenFlg],0 ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) offset 36CAh
 21161                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 21164                                  	;call	LCritDisk

 21166 00003273 E999E6                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21167                                  	;;JMP	Clear_FastOpen ; 10/08/2018
 21168                                  	;retn 	; 08/09/2018
 21169                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 21170                                  	;jmp	Clear_FastOpen
 21171                                  
 21172                                  bad_path2:
 21173 00003276 B80300                  	MOV	AX,error_path_not_found	; 3
 21174 00003279 EBF1                    	JMP	short OpenBadRet
 21175                                  
 21176                                  Open_Bad_Access:
 21177 0000327B B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied	; 5
 21178 0000327E EBEC                    	JMP	short OpenBadRet
 21179                                  
 21180                                  Open_found:
 21181 00003280 74F9                    	JZ	short Open_Bad_Access 	; test for directories
 21182 00003282 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 21183 00003284 783E                    	JS	short open_ok		; Devices don't have attributes
 21184 00003286 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]		; get buffer location
 21185                                  	;mov	al,[es:bx+0Bh]
 21186 0000328A 268A470B                	MOV	AL,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 21187 0000328E A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id	; can't open volume ids
 21188 00003290 75E9                    	JNZ	short Open_Bad_Access
 21189 00003292 A801                    	TEST	AL,attr_read_only	; check write on read only
 21190 00003294 742E                    	JZ	short open_ok
 21191                                  
 21192                                  ; The file is marked READ-ONLY. We verify that the open mode allows access to
 21193                                  ; the read-only file. Unfortunately, with FCB's and net-FCB's we cannot
 21194                                  ; determine at the OPEN time if such access is allowed. Thus, we defer such
 21195                                  ; processing until the actual write operation:
 21196                                  ;
 21197                                  ; If FCB, then we change the mode to be read_only.
 21198                                  ; If net_FCB, then we change the mode to be read_only.
 21199                                  ; If not open for read then error.
 21200                                  
 21201 00003296 1E                      	push	ds
 21202 00003297 56                      	push	si
 21203 00003298 C536[9E05]              	LDS	SI,[THISSFT]
 21204                                  	;mov	cx,[si+2]
 21205 0000329C 8B4C02                  	MOV	CX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 21206                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21207                                  	;test	ch,80h
 21208 0000329F F6C580                  	test	ch,sf_isFCB>>8
 21209                                  	;TEST	CX,sf_isFCB ; 8000h	; is it FCB?
 21210 000032A2 750A                    	JNZ	short ResetAccess	; yes, reset the access
 21211 000032A4 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL
 21212 000032A6 80E2F0                  	AND	DL,SHARING_MASK	; 0F0h
 21213 000032A9 80FA70                  	CMP	DL,SHARING_NET_FCB ; 70h ; is it net FCB?
 21214 000032AC 7508                    	JNZ	short NormalOpen	; no
 21215                                  ResetAccess:
 21216                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)	
 21217                                  	;AND	CX,~access_mask	; 0FFF0h ; clear access
 21218                                  	; 16/12/2022
 21219                                  	;and	cl,0F0h ; 18/05/2019
 21220                                  	;;;
 21221                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21222                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21223                                  	;and	cx,0FFFCh
 21224 000032AE 80E1FC                  	and	cl,0FCh ; ~3 ; ~open_mode_mask ; clear access
 21225                                  	;;;
 21226                                  ;	OR	CX,open_for_read ; 0	; stick in open_for_read
 21227 000032B1 894C02                  	MOV	[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],CX
 21228 000032B4 EB0C                    	JMP	SHORT FillSFT
 21229                                  
 21230                                  ; The SFT is normal. See if the requested access is open_for_read
 21231                                  
 21232                                  NormalOpen:
 21233                                  	;AND	CL,access_mask	; 0Fh	; remove extras
 21234                                  	;;;
 21235                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21236                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21237 000032B6 80E103                  	and     cl,3		; it was 'and cl,0Fh' in MSDOS 6.22
 21238                                  				; (and cl,access_mask)
 21239                                  				; this may be open_mode_mask
 21240                                  	;;;
 21241 000032B9 80F900                  	CMP	CL,open_for_read ; 0	; is it open for read?
 21242 000032BC 7404                    	JZ	short FillSFT	; yes
 21243 000032BE 5E                      	pop	si
 21244 000032BF 1F                      	pop	ds
 21245 000032C0 EBB9                    	JMP	short Open_Bad_Access
 21246                                  ;
 21247                                  ; All done, restore registers and fill the SFT.
 21248                                  ;
 21249                                  FillSFT:
 21250 000032C2 5E                      	pop	si
 21251 000032C3 1F                      	pop	ds
 21252                                  open_ok:
 21253 000032C4 E84423                  	call	DOOPEN			; Fill in SFT
 21254                                  
 21255                                  ;hkn; FastOpenFlg is in DOSDATA. use SS override
 21256                                  	; 18/05/2019
 21257                                  	;and	byte [ss:FastOpenFlag],80h
 21258 000032C7 368026[4611]80          	AND	BYTE [SS:FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes	;; DOS 3.3
 21259                                  	; 12/08/2018
 21260                                  	;and	byte [FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes	
 21261                                  
 21262                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 21263 000032CD E84300                  	CALL	DO_SHARE_CHECK
 21264 000032D0 7303                    	JNC	short SHARE_OK
 21265                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 21266                                  	; 16/12/2022
 21267 000032D2 E93AE6                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21268                                  	;;JMP	short Clear_FastOpen
 21269                                  	;retn	; 18/05/2019
 21270                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 21271                                  	;jmp	short Clear_FastOpen	
 21272                                  
 21273                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 21274                                  ;DO_SHARE_CHECK:
 21275                                  ;	MOV	CX,[RetryCount]		; Get # tries to do
 21276                                  ;OpenShareRetry:
 21277                                  ;	push	cx			; Save number left to do
 21278                                  ;	call	SHARE_CHECK		; Final Check
 21279                                  ;	pop	cx			; CX = # left
 21280                                  ;	JNC	short SHARE_OK		; No problem with access

 21300                                  ;if installed
 21301                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4
 21302 000032DC FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)]  ; 14 = ShSU
 21303                                  ;else

 21314                                  ;

 21333 000032EF 7407                    	JZ	short Clear_FastOpen	; sf_mode correct (retz)

 21340                                  
 21341                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21342                                  ; Procedure Name : SHARE_ERROR
 21343                                  ;
 21344                                  ; Called on sharing violations. ES:DI points to SFT. AX has error code
 21345                                  ; If SFT is FCB or compatibility mode gens INT 24 error.
 21346                                  ; Returns carry set AX=error_sharing_violation if user says ignore (can't
 21347                                  ; really ignore). Carry clear if user wants a retry. ES, DI, DS preserved
 21348                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21349                                  
 21350                                  SHARE_ERROR:
 21351                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21352                                  	;test	byte [es:di+3],80h
 21353 000032F9 26F6450380              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode+1],sf_isFCB>>8 ; 80h
 21354                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB ; 8000h
 21355 000032FE 7509                    	JNZ	short _HARD_ERR
 21356 00003300 268A4D02                	MOV	CL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 21357 00003304 80E1F0                  	AND	CL,SHARING_MASK  ; 0F0h
 21358                                  	;CMP	CL,SHARING_COMPAT ; 0
 21359                                  	;JNE	short _NO_HARD_ERR
 21360                                  	; 21/09/2023
 21361 00003307 7505                    	jnz	short _NO_HARD_ERR
 21362                                  _HARD_ERR:
 21363 00003309 E85451                  	call	SHARE_VIOLATION
 21364                                  	;retnc				; User wants retry
 21365 0000330C 73EA                    	jnc	short Clear_FastOpen
 21366                                  _NO_HARD_ERR:
 21367 0000330E B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation  ; 20h
 21368 00003311 F9                      	STC
 21369 00003312 C3                      	retn
 21370                                  
 21371                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 21372                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21373                                  ; Procedure Name : DO_SHARE_CHECK
 21374                                  ;
 21375                                  ; Input: THISDPB, WFP_Start, THISSFT set
 21376                                  ; Functions: check file sharing mode is valid
 21377                                  ; Output: carry set, error
 21378                                  ;	  carry clear, share ok
 21379                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21380                                  
 21381                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21382                                  DO_SHARE_CHECK:
 21383 00003313 E8CCE5                  	call	ECritDisk		; enter critical section
 21384                                  OPN_RETRY:
 21385 00003316 8B0E[1A00]              	MOV	CX,[RetryCount]		; Get # tries to do
 21386                                  OpenShareRetry:
 21387 0000331A 51                      	push	cx			; Save number left to do
 21388 0000331B E83D51                  	call	SHARE_CHECK		; Final Check
 21389 0000331E 59                      	pop	cx			; CX = # left
 21390 0000331F 730E                    	JNC	short Share_Ok2		; No problem with access
 21391 00003321 E8C0E4                  	call	Idle
 21392 00003324 E2F4                    	LOOP	OpenShareRetry		; One more retry used up
 21393                                  OpenShareFail:
 21394 00003326 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 21395 0000332A E8CCFF                  	call	SHARE_ERROR
 21396 0000332D 73E7                    	JNC	short OPN_RETRY		; User wants more retry
 21397                                  Share_Ok2:
 21398                                  	;call	LCritDisk		; leave critical section
 21399                                  	;retn
 21400                                  	; 18/12/2022
 21401 0000332F E9DDE5                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21402                                  
 21403                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21404                                  ; Procedure Name : Check_Access
 21405                                  ;
 21406                                  ; Inputs:
 21407                                  ;	AX is mode
 21408                                  ;	  High NIBBLE of AL (Sharing Mode)
 21409                                  ;		sharing_compat	   file is opened in compatibility mode
 21410                                  ;		sharing_deny_none  file is opened Multi reader, Multi writer
 21411                                  ;		sharing_deny_read  file is opened Only reader, Multi writer
 21412                                  ;		sharing_deny_write file is opened Multi reader, Only writer
 21413                                  ;		sharing_deny_both  file is opened Only reader, Only writer
 21414                                  ;	  Low NIBBLE of AL (Access Mode)
 21415                                  ;		open_for_read	file is opened for reading
 21416                                  ;		open_for_write	file is opened for writing
 21417                                  ;		open_for_both	file is opened for both reading and writing.
 21418                                  ; Function:
 21419                                  ;	Check this access mode for correctness
 21420                                  ; Outputs:
 21421                                  ;	[open_access] = AL input
 21422                                  ;	Carry Clear
 21423                                  ;		Mode is correct
 21424                                  ;		AX unchanged
 21425                                  ;	Carry Set
 21426                                  ;		Mode is bad
 21427                                  ;		AX = error_invalid_access
 21428                                  ; No other registers effected
 21429                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21430                                  
 21431                                  	; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21432                                  Check_Access_AX:
 21433 00003332 A2[6E05]                	MOV	[OPEN_ACCESS],AL
 21434 00003335 53                      	PUSH	BX
 21435                                  
 21436                                  ;	If sharing, then test for special sharing mode for FCBs
 21437                                  
 21438 00003336 88C3                    	MOV	BL,AL
 21439 00003338 80E3F0                  	AND	BL,SHARING_MASK ; 0F0h
 21440                                  
 21441                                  	;CMP	byte [FSHARING],-1
 21442                                  	;JNZ	short CheckShareMode	; not through server call, must be ok
 21443                                  	; 23/01/2024
 21444                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 21445 0000333B 803E[7205]00            	cmp	byte [FSHARING],0
 21446 00003340 7405                    	jz	short CheckShareMode	; not through server call, must be ok
 21447                                  
 21448 00003342 80FB70                  	CMP	BL,SHARING_NET_FCB ; 70h
 21449 00003345 7405                    	JZ	short CheckAccessMode	; yes, we have an FCB
 21450                                  CheckShareMode:
 21451 00003347 80FB40                  	CMP	BL,40h			; is this a good sharing mode?
 21452 0000334A 770D                    	JA	short Make_Bad_Access
 21453                                  CheckAccessMode:
 21454 0000334C 88C3                    	MOV	BL,AL
 21455                                  	; 23/01/2024
 21456 0000334E 80E303                  	and	bl,3 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM	
 21457                                  	;AND	BL,access_mask ; 0Fh
 21458 00003351 80FB02                  	CMP	BL,2
 21459 00003354 7703                    	JA	short Make_Bad_Access
 21460 00003356 5B                      	POP	BX
 21461 00003357 F8                      	CLC
 21462 00003358 C3                      	retn
 21463                                  
 21464                                  Make_Bad_Access:
 21465 00003359 B80C00                  	MOV	AX,error_invalid_access ; 0Ch
 21466 0000335C 5B                      	POP	BX
 21467 0000335D F9                      	STC
 21468 0000335E C3                      	retn
 21469                                  
 21470                                  ;============================================================================
 21471                                  ; DINFO.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 21472                                  ;============================================================================
 21473                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 21474                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21475                                  ; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21476                                  
 21477                                  ;**	Low level routine for returning disk drive information from a local
 21478                                  ;	  or NET device
 21479                                  ;
 21480                                  ;	DISK_INFO
 21481                                  ;
 21482                                  ;	  Modification history:
 21483                                  ;
 21484                                  ;		Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 21485                                  
 21486                                  ;	Break	<DISK_INFO -- Get Disk Drive Information>
 21487                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21488                                  ; Procedure Name : DISK_INFO
 21489                                  ;
 21490                                  ; Inputs:
 21491                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to the Macro List Structure of interest
 21492                                  ;		(It MAY NOT be NUL, error not detected)
 21493                                  ; Function:
 21494                                  ;	Get Interesting Drive Information
 21495                                  ; Returns:
 21496                                  ;	DX = Number of free allocation units
 21497                                  ;	BX = Total Number of allocation units on disk
 21498                                  ;	CX = Sector size
 21499                                  ;	AL = Sectors per allocation unit
 21500                                  ;	AH = FAT ID BYTE
 21501                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 21502                                  ; Segs except ES preserved, others destroyed
 21503                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21504                                  
 21505                                  ;hkn; called from getset.asm and misc.asm. DS has already been set up to
 21506                                  ;hkn; DOSDATA. 
 21507                                  
 21508                                  	; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21509                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:732Bh
 21510                                  
 21511                                  DISK_INFO:
 21512                                  	; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 21513                                  	; IBM DOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 37C5h
 21514                                  
 21515 0000335F E8C7E4                  	call	TestNet
 21516 00003362 7318                    	JNC	short LOCAL_DSK_INFO
 21517                                  
 21518                                  	;;;
 21519                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21520 00003364 31F6                    	xor     si,si	; free cluster count hw = 0
 21521 00003366 31FF                    	xor     di,di	; number of clusters hw = 0
 21522                                  	;;;
 21523                                  
 21524                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 21525                                  ;	transfer NET_DISK_INFO
 21526                                  ;ELSE
 21527                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 12
 21528                                  	;INT	2FH
 21529                                  	;return
 21530                                  
 21531 00003368 B80C11                  	mov     ax,110Ch
 21532 0000336B CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - GET DISK SPACE
 21533                                  			; ES:DI -> current directory
 21534                                  			; Return: AL = sectors per cluster, BX = total clusters
 21535                                  			; CX = bytes per sector, DX = number of available clusters
 21536                                  	;;;
 21537                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21538 0000336D 83FBFF                  	cmp	bx,0FFFFh
 21539 00003370 7502                    	jne	short dsk_info_1
 21540 00003372 89DF                    	mov	di,bx
 21541                                  dsk_info_1:
 21542 00003374 83FAFF                  	cmp	dx,0FFFFh
 21543 00003377 7502                    	jne	short disk_info_retn
 21544 00003379 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 21545                                  disk_info_retn:
 21546                                  	;;;
 21547 0000337B C3                      	retn
 21548                                  ;ENDIF
 21549                                  
 21550                                  LOCAL_DSK_INFO:
 21551                                  	;MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
 21552                                  	;;;
 21553                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21554 0000337C E867DF                  	call	set_exerr_locus_disk
 21555                                  	;;;
 21556 0000337F E860E5                  	call	ECritDisk
 21557 00003382 E8ED31                  	call	FATREAD_CDS		; perform media check.
 21558                                  	;JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21559                                  	;;; 02/02/2024
 21560 00003385 720D                    	jc	short dsk_info_2
 21561 00003387 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 21562 00003389 A3[E80A]                	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],ax ; 0	; clear high word of cluster number
 21563                                  	;;;
 21564 0000338C BB0200                  	MOV	BX,2
 21565 0000338F E8652F                  	call	UNPACK			; Get first FAT sector into CURBUF
 21566                                  	;JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21567                                  	;;;
 21568                                  	; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21569 00003392 7303                    	jnc	short dsk_info_3
 21570                                  dsk_info_2:
 21571                                  	;jmp	CRIT_LEAVE
 21572 00003394 E978E5                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21573                                  dsk_info_3:
 21574                                  	;;;
 21575 00003397 C536[E205]              	LDS	SI,[CURBUF]
 21576                                  	; 02/02/2024
 21577                                  	;;mov	ah,[si+20]
 21578                                  	;mov	ah,[si+24] ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 21579 0000339B 8A6418                  	MOV	AH,[SI+BUFINSIZ]	; get FAT ID BYTE
 21580                                  
 21581                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 21582 0000339E 16                      	push	ss
 21583 0000339F 1F                      	pop	ds
 21584                                  
 21585                                  ; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21586                                  %if 0
 21587                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 21588                                  	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 21589                                  
 21590                                  ; Examine the current free count. If it indicates that we have an invalid
 21591                                  ; count, do the expensive calculation.
 21592                                  
 21593                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+1Fh]
 21594                                  	MOV	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; get free count
 21595                                  	CMP	DX,-1			; is it valid?
 21596                                  	JZ	short DoScan
 21597                                  
 21598                                  ; Check to see if it is in a reasonable range. If so, trust it and return.
 21599                                  ; Otherwise, we need to blast out an internal error message and then recompute
 21600                                  ; the count.
 21601                                  
 21602                                  	CMP	DX,CX			; is it in a reasonable range?
 21603                                  	JB	short GotVal		; yes, trust it.
 21604                                  DoScan:
 21605                                  	XOR	DX,DX
 21606                                  	DEC	CX
 21607                                  SCANFREE:
 21608                                  	call	UNPACK
 21609                                  	JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21610                                  	JNZ	short NOTFREECLUS
 21611                                  	INC	DX			; A free one
 21612                                  NOTFREECLUS:
 21613                                  	INC	BX			; Next cluster
 21614                                  	LOOP	SCANFREE
 21615                                  	DEC	BX			; BX was next cluster. Convert to
 21616                                  ReturnVals:
 21617                                  	DEC	BX			; count
 21618                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 21619                                  	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 21620                                  	INC	AL			; Sectors/cluster
 21621                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 21622                                  	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Bytes/sector
 21623                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1Fh],dx
 21624                                  	MOV	[ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],DX
 21625                                  	CLC
 21626                                  CRIT_LEAVE:
 21627                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 21628                                  	;retn
 21629                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21630                                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21631                                  
 21632                                  ; We have correctly computed everything previously. Load up registers for
 21633                                  ; return.
 21634                                  
 21635                                  GotVal: 
 21636                                  	MOV	BX,CX			; get cluster count
 21637                                  	JMP	short ReturnVals
 21638                                  
 21639                                  %else
 21640                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21641 000033A0 31F6                    	xor	si,si	; 0
 21642 000033A2 89F7                    	mov	di,si	; 0
 21643                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+1Fh]
 21644 000033A4 268B561F                	mov	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT]	; get free count
 21645                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],si
 21646 000033A8 2639760F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],si ; FAT32 (16 bit FAT size = 0) ?
 21647 000033AC 7406                    	jz	short dsk_info_4	; yes
 21648                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 21649 000033AE 268B4E0D                	mov	cx,[es:bp+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 21650 000033B2 EB18                    	jmp	short dsk_info_5 ; zf=0, si=di=0
 21651                                  
 21652                                  dsk_info_4:
 21653                                  	;mov	di,[es:bp+2Fh]
 21654 000033B4 268B7E2F                	mov	di,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER+2]
 21655                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2Dh]
 21656 000033B8 268B4E2D                	mov	cx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER]
 21657                                  	;mov	si,[es:bp+21h]
 21658 000033BC 268B7621                	mov	si,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT_HW] ; hw of free cluster count
 21659 000033C0 39F2                    	cmp	dx,si			; same (zero) ?
 21660                                  ;dsk_info_5:
 21661 000033C2 7504                    	jnz	short dsk_info_6	; not same (not zero)
 21662 000033C4 42                      	inc	dx
 21663 000033C5 740B                    	jz	short dsk_info_8	; 0FFFFh -> 0 (free count is invalid/initial)
 21664                                  					; free count calculation is needed
 21665 000033C7 4A                      	dec	dx
 21666                                  dsk_info_6:
 21667 000033C8 39FE                    	cmp	si,di			; same hw ?
 21668 000033CA 7502                    	jne	short dsk_info_7	; no
 21669                                  dsk_info_5:	; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 
 21670 000033CC 39CA                    	cmp	dx,cx			; same lw ?
 21671                                  dsk_info_7:
 21672 000033CE 7268                    	jb	short GotVal		; free cluster count < last cluster number
 21673 000033D0 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx	; 0
 21674                                  dsk_info_8:
 21675 000033D2 31F6                    	xor	si,si	; 0
 21676 000033D4 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; last cluster number - 1 = number of clusters
 21677 000033D7 19F7                    	sbb	di,si
 21678                                  	;or	byte [es:bp+18h],1
 21679 000033D9 26804E1801              	or	byte [es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],1 ; set first access bit 0
 21680                                  					; (Update flag for FSINFO sector)
 21681                                  SCANFREE:
 21682 000033DE 56                      	push	si
 21683 000033DF FF36[EC0A]              	push	word [CCONTENT_HW]
 21684 000033E3 57                      	push	di
 21685 000033E4 E8102F                  	call	UNPACK
 21686 000033E7 5F                      	pop	di
 21687 000033E8 8F06[EC0A]              	pop	word [CCONTENT_HW]
 21688 000033EC 5E                      	pop	si
 21689 000033ED 7246                    	jc	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21690 000033EF 7504                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS
 21691 000033F1 42                      	inc	dx			; a free one
 21692 000033F2 7501                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS
 21693 000033F4 46                      	inc	si			; increase hw of free cluster count
 21694                                  
 21695                                  NOTFREECLUS:
 21696 000033F5 43                      	inc	bx			; next cluster
 21697 000033F6 7504                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS2
 21698 000033F8 FF06[E80A]              	inc	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]	; increase hw of (next) cluster number
 21699                                  
 21700                                  NOTFREECLUS2:
 21701 000033FC 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; decrease remain cluster count for calculation
 21702 000033FF 83DF00                  	sbb	di,0
 21703 00003402 75DA                    	jnz	short SCANFREE
 21704 00003404 E302                    	jcxz	NOTFREECLUS3		; calculation completed
 21705 00003406 EBD6                    	jmp	short SCANFREE
 21706                                  
 21707                                  NOTFREECLUS3:
 21708 00003408 8B3E[E80A]              	mov	di,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 21709 0000340C 83EB01                  	sub	bx,1
 21710 0000340F 83DF00                  	sbb	di,0			; di:bx = last cluster number
 21711                                  
 21712                                  ReturnVals:
 21713 00003412 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 21714 00003414 83EB01                  	sub	bx,1
 21715 00003417 19CF                    	sbb	di,cx			; di:bx = number of clusters
 21716                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 21717 00003419 268A4604                	mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK] ; spc - 1
 21718 0000341D FEC0                    	inc	al			; sectors per cluster
 21719                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1Fh],dx		
 21720 0000341F 2689561F                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT],dx	; free cluster count,lw
 21721                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],cx ; 0
 21722 00003423 26394E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],cx ; 0 ; FAT32 (16 bit FAT size = 0) ?
 21723 00003427 7507                    	jnz	short ReturnVals2	; no
 21724                                  	;mov	[es:bp+21h],si
 21725 00003429 26897621                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT_HW],si ; hw of free cluster count
 21726                                  
 21727 0000342D E83800                  	call	update_fat32_fsinfo
 21728                                  
 21729                                  ReturnVals2:
 21730                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 21731 00003430 268B4E02                	mov	cx,[es:bp+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; bytes per sector
 21732 00003434 F8                      	clc
 21733                                  
 21734                                  CRIT_LEAVE:
 21735                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 21736                                  	;retn
 21737 00003435 E9D7E4                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21738                                  
 21739                                  GotVal:
 21740 00003438 89CB                    	mov	bx,cx
 21741 0000343A EBD6                    	jmp	short ReturnVals
 21742                                  
 21743                                  %endif
 21744                                  
 21745                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 21746                                  
 21747                                  ; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21748                                  
 21749                                  modify_spc:
 21750 0000343C 50                      	push	ax			; ax = sectors per cluster
 21751 0000343D 52                      	push	dx
 21752 0000343E F7E1                    	mul	cx			; bytes per sector
 21753                                  	;cmp	dx,0
 21754 00003440 21D2                    	and	dx,dx
 21755 00003442 7503                    	jnz	short mspc_1
 21756 00003444 3D0040                  	cmp	ax,16384		; 16 kilobytes (per cluster)
 21757                                  					; ***
 21758                                  					; actual disk size limit
 21759                                  					; without invalidating cluster counts is
 21760                                  					; 2 GB (512K clusters * 8 sectors per cluster)
 21761                                  					;      (128K clusters * 32 sectors per cluster)
 21762                                  mspc_1:
 21763 00003447 5A                      	pop	dx
 21764 00003448 58                      	pop	ax
 21765 00003449 760E                    	jbe	short mspc_3		; bytes per cluster <= 16 KB
 21766                                                                          ; ***
 21767                                                                          ; bytes per cluster > 16 KB
 21768 0000344B 31FF                    	xor	di,di			; 0
 21769 0000344D BBFEFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFEh		; (invalidated)
 21770 00003450 09F6                    	or	si,si			; hw of free cluster count
 21771 00003452 7404                    	jz	short mspc_2		; si = 0
 21772 00003454 89FE                    	mov	si,di			; si = 0
 21773 00003456 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx			; dx = bx = 0FFFEh (invalidated)
 21774                                  mspc_2:
 21775 00003458 C3                      	retn
 21776                                  
 21777                                  mspc_3:
 21778 00003459 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1			; sectors per clust = sectors per clust * 2
 21779                                  					; (ax <= 32768) -modified spc limit-
 21780 0000345B D1EF                    	shr	di,1			; cluster count = cluster count /2
 21781                                  					; di:bx = modified value of total clusters
 21782                                  mspc_4:
 21783 0000345D D1DB                    	rcr	bx,1
 21784 0000345F D1EE                    	shr	si,1			; free clusters = free clusters / 2
 21785 00003461 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1			; si:dx = modified value of free clusters
 21786                                  
 21787                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21788                                  
 21789                                  	; 03/02/2024
 21790                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7431h
 21791                                  
 21792                                  modify_cluster_count:
 21793 00003463 09FF                    	or	di,di			; hw of cluster count
 21794 00003465 75D5                    	jnz	short modify_spc
 21795 00003467 C3                      	retn
 21796                                  
 21797                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 21798                                  
 21799                                  ; write FSINFO sector onto disk
 21800                                  
 21801                                  ; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21802                                  ; --------------------------------
 21803                                  ; FAT32 FSInfo Sector Structure
 21804                                  ; --------------------------------
 21805                                  ; ref: Microsoft FAT32 File System Specification (2000)
 21806                                  
 21807                                  struc FSINFO		; Offset ;
 21808 00000000 ????????                .LeadSig:	resb 4	  ; 0		; Value 0x41615252. Lead Signature.
 21809 00000004 <res 1E0h>              .Reserved1:	resb 480  ; 4		; Reserved. Must be 0. Never be used.
 21810 000001E4 ????????                .StrucSig:	resb 4	  ; 484		; Value 0x61417272. Fields Signature.
 21811 000001E8 ????????                .Free_Count:	resb 4	  ; 488		; Last known free cluster count. (*) 
 21812 000001EC ????????                .Nxt_Free:	resb 4	  ; 492		; Start clus for free clus srch. (**)
 21813 000001F0 <res Ch>                .Reserved2:	resb 12	  ; 496		; Reserved. Must be 0. Never be used.
 21814 000001FC ????????                .TrailSig:	resb 4	  ; 508		; Value 0xAA550000. Trail Signature.
 21815                                  .size:
 21816                                  endstruc
 21817                                  
 21818                                  ; (*) If the value is 0xFFFFFFFF, then the free count is unknown
 21819                                  ;     and must be computed.
 21820                                  ; (**) If the value is 0xFFFFFFFF, then free cluster search must be started
 21821                                  ;     from cluster 2.
 21822                                  ; Lead Signature, Fields (Structure) Signature and Trail Signature
 21823                                  ; are used to validate FSInfo sector.
 21824                                  
 21825                                  ; --------------------------------
 21826                                  
 21827                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21828                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7436h
 21829                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:7227h)
 21830                                  
 21831                                  update_fat32_fsinfo:
 21832 00003468 51                      	push	cx
 21833 00003469 52                      	push	dx
 21834 0000346A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 21835                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+25h]
 21836 0000346C 268B5625                	mov	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FSINFO_SECTOR]
 21837                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],cx
 21838 00003470 26394E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],cx ; 0
 21839                                  				; (16bit FAT size field = 0 for FAT32 fs)
 21840 00003474 7505                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_1
 21841 00003476 83FAFF                  	cmp	dx,0FFFFh ; -1
 21842 00003479 7508                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_2
 21843                                  
 21844                                  u_fat32_inf_1:
 21845 0000347B 5A                      	pop	dx
 21846 0000347C 59                      	pop	cx
 21847                                  	;and	byte [es:bp+18h],0F4h
 21848 0000347D 26806618F4              	and	byte [es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],0F4h ; clear bit 0,1 and 3
 21849                                  					; bit 0 - FSINFO update (dirty) bit
 21850                                  					; bit 1 - BPB_RootClus update bit
 21851                                  					; bit 3 - BPB_ExtFlags update bit
 21852 00003482 C3                      	retn
 21853                                  
 21854                                  u_fat32_inf_2:
 21855 00003483 50                      	push	ax
 21856 00003484 53                      	push	bx
 21857 00003485 57                      	push	di
 21858 00003486 56                      	push	si
 21859 00003487 1E                      	push	ds
 21860 00003488 36803E[7900]00          	cmp	byte [ss:BuffInHMA],0	; is buffers in HMA?
 21861 0000348E 740A                    	jz	short u_fat32_inf_3	; no
 21862 00003490 36C53E[7A00]            	lds	di,[ss:LoMemBuff]	; read it into scratch buffer
 21863                                  	;sub	di,24
 21864 00003495 83EF18                  	sub	di,BUFINSIZ		; space for buffer header
 21865                                  					; (buffer header size = 24)
 21866                                  	;clc
 21867 00003498 EB0E                    	jmp	short u_fat32_inf_4
 21868                                  
 21869                                  u_fat32_inf_3:
 21870 0000349A 06                      	push	es
 21871 0000349B 55                      	push	bp
 21872 0000349C E83134                  	call	GETCURHEAD		; ds:di = first buffer in queue
 21873 0000349F 52                      	push	dx
