 36793                                  ;============================================================================
 36794                                  ; FAT.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 36795                                  ;============================================================================
 36796                                  ; 30/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 36797                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36798                                  ; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 36799                                  
 36800                                  ;	TITLE	FAT - FAT maintenance routines
 36801                                  ;	NAME	FAT
 36802                                  
 36803                                  ;**	FAT.ASM
 36804                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36805                                  ;	Low level local device routines for performing disk change sequence,
 36806                                  ;	setting cluster validity, and manipulating the FAT
 36807                                  ;
 36808                                  ;	IsEof
 36809                                  ;	UNPACK
 36810                                  ;	PACK
 36811                                  ;	MAPCLUSTER
 36812                                  ;	FATREAD_SFT
 36813                                  ;	FATREAD_CDS
 36814                                  ;	FAT_operation
 36815                                  ;
 36816                                  ;	Revision history:
 36817                                  ;
 36818                                  ;	  AN000  version Jan. 1988
 36819                                  ;	   A001  PTM	      -- disk changed for look ahead buffers
 36820                                  ;
 36821                                  ;	M014 - if a request for pack\unpack cluster 0 is made we write\read
 36822                                  ;	       from CL0FATENTRY rather than disk.
 36823                                  
 36824                                  ; DOSCODE:94FAh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 36825                                  
 36826                                  ; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 36827                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:A40Ch
 36828                                  
 36829                                  ;Break <IsEOF - check the quantity in BX for EOF>
 36830                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36831                                  ;
 36832                                  ; Procedure Name : IsEOF
 36833                                  ;
 36834                                  ; IsEOF - check the fat value in BX for eof.
 36835                                  ;
 36836                                  ;   Inputs:	ES:BP point to DPB
 36837                                  ;		BX has fat value
 36838                                  ;   Outputs:	JAE eof
 36839                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 36840                                  ;
 36841                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36842                                  
 36843                                  IsEOF:
 36844                                  	; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 36845                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 36846                                  	;;;
 36847 000062CE E89901                  	call	IsFAT32			; is it FAT32 drive ?
 36848 000062D1 730D                    	jnc	short IsEOF_FAT		; no, it has 12 or 16 bit FAT
 36849                                  
 36850                                  	; FAT32 fs
 36851 000062D3 36813E[E80A]FF0F        	cmp	word [ss:CLUSTNUM_HW],0FFFh
 36852 000062DA 7503                    	jnz     short IsEOF_other1	; not EOF
 36853 000062DC 83FBF8                  	cmp     bx,0FFF8h		; 32 bit compare
 36854                                  IsEOF_other1:
 36855 000062DF C3                      	retn 				; cf=0 -> EOF, cf=1 -> not EOF
 36856                                  
 36857                                  IsEOF_FAT:
 36858                                  	;;;
 36859                                  
 36860                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+0Dh],0FF6h
 36861 000062E0 26817E0DF60F            	CMP	word [ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER],4096-10 ; is this 16 bit fat?
 36862 000062E6 730B                    	JAE	short EOF16			; yes, check for eof there
 36863                                  
 36864                                  ;J.K. 8/27/86
 36865                                  ;Modified to accept 0FF0h as an eof. This is to handle the diskfull case
 36866                                  ;of any media that has "F0"(Other) as a MediaByte.
 36867                                  ;Hopely, this does not create any side effect for those who may use any value
 36868                                  ;other than "FF8-FFF" as an EOF for their own file.
 36869                                  
 36870 000062E8 81FBF00F                	cmp	bx,0FF0h
 36871 000062EC 7404                    	je	short IsEOF_other
 36872                                  
 36873 000062EE 81FBF80F                	CMP	BX,0FF8h		; do the 12 bit compare
 36874                                  IsEOF_other:
 36875 000062F2 C3                      	retn
 36876                                  EOF16:
 36877 000062F3 83FBF8                  	CMP	BX,0FFF8h		; 16 bit compare
 36878 000062F6 C3                      	retn				; cf=0 -> EOF, cf=1 -> not EOF
 36879                                  
 36880                                  ; DOSCODE:9511h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 36881                                  
 36882                                  ;Break	<UNPACK -- UNPACK FAT ENTRIES>
 36883                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36884                                  ;
 36885                                  ; Procedure Name : UNPACK
 36886                                  ;
 36887                                  ; Inputs:
 36888                                  ;	BX = Cluster number (may be full 16-bit quantity)
 36889                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 36890                                  ; Outputs:
 36891                                  ;	DI = Contents of FAT for given cluster (may be full 16-bit quantity)
 36892                                  ;	Zero set means DI=0 (free cluster)
 36893                                  ;	Carry set means error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 36894                                  ; SI Destroyed, No other registers affected. Fatal error if cluster too big.
 36895                                  ;
 36896                                  ; NOTE: if BX = 0 then DI = contents of CL0FATENTRY
 36897                                  ;
 36898                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36899                                  
 36900                                  	; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 36901                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0A44Eh
 36902                                  	;
 36903                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS .SYS - DOSCODE:9511h)
 36904                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C368h)
 36905                                  
 36906                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 36907                                  	; DOSCODE:94B5h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 36908                                  
 36909                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36910                                  UNPACK:
 36911                                  	; MSDOS 6.0			; M014 - Start
 36912 000062F7 09DB                    	or	bx,bx			; Q: are we unpacking cluster 0
 36913 000062F9 7519                    	jnz	short up_cont		; N: proceed with normal unpack
 36914                                  
 36915                                  ; 02/03/2024
 36916                                  %if 0
 36917                                  	mov	di,[CL0FATENTRY]	; Y: return value in CL0FATENTRY
 36918                                  	or	di,di 			; return z if di=0
 36919                                  	retn				; done
 36920                                  %else
 36921                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:A435h
 36922                                  	;;;
 36923                                  up_1:
 36924 000062FB 391E[E80A]              	cmp	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx ; 0
 36925 000062FF 7513                    	jne	short up_cont
 36926 00006301 8B3E[3B0F]              	mov	di,[CL0FATENTRY_HW]
 36927 00006305 09FF                    	or	di,di
 36928 00006307 893E[EC0A]              	mov	[CCONTENT_HW],di
 36929 0000630B 8B3E[8100]              	mov	di,[CL0FATENTRY]
 36930 0000630F 7502                    	jnz	short unpack_retn
 36931 00006311 09FF                    	or	di,di
 36932                                  unpack_retn:
 36933 00006313 C3                      	retn	; [CCONTENT_HW]:DI = contents of CL0FATENTRY
 36934                                  	;;;	
 36935                                  
 36936                                  %endif
 36937                                  
 36938                                  up_cont:				; M014 - End
 36939                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 36940                                  	;;;
 36941                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+0Fh],0
 36942 00006314 26837E0F00              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],0
 36943 00006319 7510                    	jnz	short up_fat		; not FAT32
 36944                                  	; FAT32
 36945                                  	;mov	si,[es:bp+2Fh]
 36946 0000631B 268B762F                	mov	si,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER+2]
 36947 0000631F 3936[E80A]              	cmp	[CLUSTNUM_HW],si
 36948 00006323 750A                    	jne	short up_2
 36949                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+2Dh]
 36950 00006325 263B5E2D                	cmp	bx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER]
 36951 00006329 EB04                    	jmp	short up_2
 36952                                  up_fat:
 36953                                  	;;;
 36954                                  
 36955                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 36956                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 36957 0000632B 263B5E0D                	CMP	BX,[es:bp+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 36958                                  up_2:		; 02/03/2024
 36959 0000632F 7748                    	JA	short HURTFAT
 36960 00006331 E84B01                  	CALL	MAPCLUSTER
 36961 00006334 7240                    	jc	short _DoContext
 36962                                  
 36963                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 36964                                  	;;;
 36965 00006336 FF7502                  	push	word [di+2]		; offset CLUSSAVE+2
 36966 00006339 368F06[EC0A]            	pop	word [ss:CCONTENT_HW]	; high word of cluster number
 36967                                  	;;;
 36968                                  
 36969 0000633E 8B3D                    	MOV	DI,[DI]
 36970 00006340 7521                    	JNZ	short High12		; MZ if high 12 bits, go get 'em
 36971                                  
 36972                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 36973                                  	;;;

 37005                                  
 37006                                  High12:

 37013                                  %endif

 37034                                  %endif

 37082                                  ; DOSCODE:9565h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 37083                                  
 37084                                  ;Break	<PACK -- PACK FAT ENTRIES>
 37085                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37086                                  ;
 37087                                  ; Procedure Name : PACK
 37088                                  ;
 37089                                  ; Inputs:
 37090                                  ;	BX = Cluster number
 37091                                  ;	DX = Data
 37092                                  ;	ES:BP = Pointer to drive DPB
 37093                                  ; Outputs:
 37094                                  ;	The data is stored in the FAT at the given cluster.
 37095                                  ;	SI,DX,DI all destroyed
 37096                                  ;	Carry set means error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 37097                                  ;	No other registers affected
 37098                                  ;
 37099                                  ; NOTE: if BX = 0 then data in DX is stored in CL0FATENTRY.
 37100                                  ;
 37101                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37102                                  
 37103                                  	; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37104                                  
 37105                                  	; INPUT:
 37106                                  	;  [CLUSDATA_HW]:DX = cluster data/content
 37107                                  	;  [CLUSTNUM_HW]:BX = cluster number (to be updated)
 37108                                  	;  ES:BP = pointer to DPB
 37109                                  
 37110                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 37111                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37112                                  PACK:
 37113                                  	; MSDOS 6.0			; M014 - start
 37114 000063A5 09DB                    	or	bx,bx			; Q: are we packing cluster 0
 37115 000063A7 7513                    	jnz	short p_cont		; N: proceed with normal pack
 37116                                  
 37117                                  ; 02/03/2024
 37118                                  %if 0
 37119                                  	mov	[CL0FATENTRY],dx	; Y: place value in CL0FATENTRY
 37120                                  	retn				; done
 37121                                  %else
 37122                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37123                                  	;;;
 37124 000063A9 391E[E80A]              	cmp	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx ; 0
 37125 000063AD 750D                    	jnz	short p_cont
 37126                                  
 37127                                  	;push	ax
 37128                                  	;mov	ax,[CLUSDATA_HW]	; Cluster Data/Content (High Word)
 37129                                  	;mov	[CL0FATENTRY_HW],ax
 37130                                  	;pop	ax
 37131 000063AF FF36[EA0A]              	push	word [CLUSDATA_HW]
 37132 000063B3 8F06[3B0F]              	pop	word [CL0FATENTRY_HW]
 37133                                  
 37134 000063B7 8916[8100]              	mov	[CL0FATENTRY],dx
 37135 000063BB C3                      	retn
 37136                                  	;;;
 37137                                  %endif
 37138                                  
 37139                                  p_cont:					; M014 - end
 37140                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 37141 000063BC E8C000                  	CALL	MAPCLUSTER
 37142 000063BF 72B5                    	JC	short _DoContext
 37143 000063C1 8B35                    	MOV	SI,[DI]
 37144 000063C3 740B                    	JZ	short ALIGNED 		; byte (not nibble) aligned
 37145 000063C5 51                      	PUSH	CX			; move data to upper 12 bits
 37146 000063C6 B104                    	MOV	CL,4
 37147 000063C8 D3E2                    	SHL	DX,CL
 37148 000063CA 59                      	POP	CX
 37149 000063CB 83E60F                  	AND	SI,0FH			; leave in original low 4 bits
 37150 000063CE EB2C                    	JMP	SHORT PACKIN
 37151                                  
 37152                                  ALIGNED:
 37153                                  
 37154                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37155                                  	;;;
 37156 000063D0 E89700                  	call	IsFAT32
 37157 000063D3 7313                    	jnb	short p_fat
 37158                                  
 37159 000063D5 368B36[EA0A]            	mov	si,[ss:CLUSDATA_HW]
 37160 000063DA 337502                  	xor	si,[di+2]		; hw of cluster number
 37161                                  					; offset CLUSSAVE+2
 37162 000063DD 81E6FF0F                	and	si,0FFFh
 37163 000063E1 317502                  	xor	[di+2],si
 37164 000063E4 8915                    	mov	[di],dx
 37165 000063E6 EB18                    	jmp	short PACKIN2
 37166                                  p_fat:
 37167                                  	;;;
 37168                                  
 37169                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+0Dh],0FF6h
 37170 000063E8 26817E0DF60F            	CMP	word [ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER],4096-10 ; MZ 16 bit fats?
 37171 000063EE 730A                    	JAE	short Pack16		; MZ yes, go clobber original data
 37172 000063F0 81E600F0                	AND	SI,0F000h		; MZ leave in upper 4 bits of original
 37173 000063F4 81E2FF0F                	AND	DX,0FFFh		; MZ store only 12 bits
 37174 000063F8 EB02                    	JMP	SHORT PACKIN		; MZ go store
 37175                                  Pack16:
 37176 000063FA 31F6                    	XOR	SI,SI			; MZ no original data
 37177                                  PACKIN:
 37178 000063FC 09D6                    	OR	SI,DX
 37179 000063FE 8935                    	MOV	[DI],SI
 37180                                  
 37181                                  PACKIN2:	; 02/03/2024
 37182                                  
 37183                                  ;hkn; SS override
 37184 00006400 36C536[E205]            	LDS	SI,[SS:CURBUF]
 37185                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 37186 00006405 F6440540                	TEST	byte [SI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 37187                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 37188 00006409 7507                    	JNZ	short yesdirty11	;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 37189                                  	; 10/06/2019
 37190 0000640B E8D007                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 37191                                  	
 37192                                  	;or	byte [si+5],40h
 37193 0000640E 804C0540                	OR	byte [SI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 37194                                  yesdirty11:				;LB.				;AN000;
 37195                                  ;hkn; SS override
 37196 00006412 36803E[7805]00          	CMP	BYTE [SS:CLUSSPLIT],0	; 15/08/2018
 37197                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 37198 00006418 16                      	push	ss
 37199 00006419 1F                      	pop	ds
 37200 0000641A 7488                    	jz	short hurtfat_retn	; Carry clear
 37201 0000641C 50                      	PUSH	AX
 37202                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37203                                  	;;;
 37204 0000641D FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 37205                                  	;;;
 37206 00006421 53                      	PUSH	BX
 37207 00006422 51                      	PUSH	CX
 37208 00006423 A1[8E05]                	MOV	AX,[CLUSSAVE]
 37209 00006426 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 37210                                  	;;;add	si,16 ; MSDOS 3.3
 37211                                  	;;add	si,20 ; MSDOS 6.0

 37228 0000643A 8B16[9005]              	MOV	DX,[CLUSSEC]

 37244 0000644E E88D07                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT 	;LB.				  ;AN000;
 37245                                  	
 37246                                  	;or	byte [di+5],40h
 37247 00006451 804D0540                	OR	byte [DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty 
 37248                                  yesdirty12:

 37250                                  	;;add	di,20 ; MSDOS 6.0
 37251                                  	;ADD	DI,BUFINSIZ

 37268                                  	;;;

 37272 00006469 C3                      	retn
 37273                                  
 37274                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 37275                                  	
 37276                                  	; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37277                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0A5B9h
 37278                                  IsFAT32:

 37280 0000646A 26837E0F01              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],1

 37282

 37285 00006476 7505                    	jnz	short isfat32eof_1	; FAT32
 37286                                  
 37287                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+2Dh],0FFF6h
 37288 00006478 26837E2DF6              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER],0FFF6h
 37289                                  isfat32eof_1:
 37290 0000647D F5                      	cmc	; cf=1 -> FAT32
 37291                                  isfat32eof_2:
 37292 0000647E C3                      	retn
 37293                                  
 37294                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37295                                  
 37296                                  ; 31/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 37297                                  
 37298                                  ;Break	<MAPCLUSTER - BUFFER A FAT SECTOR>
 37299                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37300                                  ;
 37301                                  ; Procedure Name : MAPCLUSTER
 37302                                  ;
 37303                                  ; Inputs:
 37304                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 37305                                  ;	BX Is cluster number
 37306                                  ; Function:
 37307                                  ;	Get a pointer to the cluster
 37308                                  ; Outputs:
 37309                                  ;	DS:DI Points to contents of FAT for given cluster
 37310                                  ;	DS:SI Points to start of buffer
 37311                                  ;	Zero Not set if cluster data is in high 12 bits of word
 37312                                  ;	Zero set if cluster data is in low 12 or 16 bits
 37313                                  ;	Carry set if failed.
 37314                                  ; SI is destroyed.
 37315                                  ;
 37316                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37317                                  
 37318                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37319                                  	; DOSCODE:9601h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 37320                                  	; 27/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 37321                                  	; DOSCODE:95A5h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 37322                                  
 37323                                  	; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37324                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0A5D7h
 37325                                  
 37326                                  MAPCLUSTER:
 37327                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5A15h
 37328 0000647F C606[7805]00            	MOV	BYTE [CLUSSPLIT],0
 37329                                  	;SAVE	<AX,BX,CX,DX>
 37330 00006484 50                      	push	ax
 37331 00006485 53                      	push	bx
 37332 00006486 51                      	push	cx
 37333 00006487 52                      	push	dx
 37334                                  	; 02/03/2024
 37335                                  	;MOV	AX,BX			; AX = BX
 37336                                  
 37337                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37338                                  	;;;
 37339                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 37340 00006488 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx
 37341 0000648A 8B16[E80A]              	mov	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 37342                                  	;
 37343 0000648E 52                      	push	dx ; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 37344                                  	;
 37345 0000648F 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 37346 00006491 E8D6FF                  	call	IsFAT32
 37347 00006494 730E                    	jnc	short mapcl1 ; not FAT32
 37348                                  	; FAT32
 37349 00006496 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 37350 00006498 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 37351 0000649A D1D7                    	rcl	di,1
 37352 0000649C D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 37353 0000649E D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 37354 000064A0 D1D7                    	rcl	di,1
 37355                                  	; DI:DX:AX = 4*(DX:AX)
 37356 000064A2 EB14                    	jmp	short Map16		; 32 bit FAT	
 37357                                  mapcl1:
 37358                                  	;;;
 37359                                  
 37360 000064A4 26817E0DF60F            	CMP	word [ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER],4096-10  ; MZ 16 bit fat?
 37361                                  	; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 37362                                  	;JAE	short Map16		; MZ yes, do 16 bit algorithm
 37363                                  	;SHR	AX,1			; AX = BX/2
 37364                                  	;
 37365                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37366                                  	;;;
 37367 000064AA 7304                    	jae	short mapcl2		; 16 bit FAT
 37368                                  	; 12 bit FAT
 37369 000064AC D1EA                    	shr	dx,1
 37370 000064AE D1D8                    	rcr     ax,1
 37371                                  mapcl2:
 37372 000064B0 01D8                    	add     ax,bx
 37373 000064B2 1316[E80A]              	adc     dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 37374 000064B6 11FF                    	adc	di,di
 37375                                  	;;;
 37376                                  Map16:	
 37377                                  
 37378                                  ; 02/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 37379                                  ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37380                                  %if 0
 37381                                  	; MSDOS 6.0			; MZ skip prev => AX=2*BX
 37382                                  	XOR	DI,DI ; *		; >32mb fat ;AN000;
 37383                                  	
 37384                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 37385                                  	ADD	AX,BX			; AX = 1.5*fat = byte offset in fat
 37386                                  	ADC	DI,DI ; * MSDOS 6.0	; >32mb fat ;DI is zero before op;AN000;
 37387                                  %endif
 37388                                  
 37389 000064B8 268B4E02                	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 37390                                  
 37391                                  ;IF FastDiv
 37392                                  ;
 37393                                  ; Gross hack: 99% of all disks have 512 bytes per sector. We test for this
 37394                                  ; case and apply a really fast algorithm to get the desired results
 37395                                  ;
 37396                                  ; Divide method takes 157+4*4=173 (MOV and DIV)
 37397                                  ; Fast method takes 39+20*4=119
 37398                                  ;
 37399                                  ; This saves a bunch.
 37400                                  
 37401 000064BC 81F90002                	CMP	CX,512			; 4  Is this 512 byte sector?
 37402 000064C0 751C                    	jne	short _DoDiv		; 4  for no jump
 37403                                  
 37404                                  ; 02/04/2024
 37405                                  %if 0
 37406                                  	MOV	DX,AX			; 2  get set for remainder
 37407                                  	AND	DX,512-1		; 4  Form remainder
 37408                                  	MOV	AL,AH			; 2  Quotient in formation in AL
 37409                                  	; MDOS 3.3
 37410                                  	;shr	al,1	
 37411                                  	; MDOS 6.0
 37412                                  	shr	di,1			; 2
 37413                                  	rcr	al,1			; 2
 37414                                  	; MDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 37415                                  	xor	ah,ah			; 3
 37416                                  %else
 37417                                  	; 02/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 37418                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37419                                  	;;;
 37420 000064C2 50                      	push	ax
 37421 000064C3 D1EF                    	shr	di,1
 37422 000064C5 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 37423 000064C7 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 37424 000064C9 88E0                    	mov	al,ah			; 9 bit shift to right
 37425 000064CB 88D4                    	mov	ah,dl
 37426 000064CD 88F2                    	mov	dl,dh
 37427 000064CF 30F6                    	xor	dh,dh
 37428 000064D1 D1EF                    	shr	di,1
 37429 000064D3 10F6                    	adc	dh,dh
 37430 000064D5 87D7                    	xchg	dx,di		; DI:AX = sector contains requested cluster data
 37431 000064D7 5A                      	pop	dx
 37432 000064D8 81E2FF01                	and	dx,1FFh			; offset in sector
 37433                                  	;;;
 37434                                  %endif
 37435 000064DC EB07                    	jmp	short DivDone		; 16
 37436                                  
 37437                                  _DoDiv:
 37438                                  ;ENDIF
 37439                                  
 37440                                  ; 02/04/2024
 37441                                  %if 0
 37442                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 37443                                  	;xor	dx,dx
 37444                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 37445                                  	mov	dx,di			; 2
 37446                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)	
 37447                                  	DIV	CX			; 155 AX is FAT sector # DX is sector index
 37448                                  %else
 37449                                  	; 02/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 37450                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37451                                  	;;;

 37614                                  ;Break	<FATREAD_SFT/FATREAD_CDS -- CHECK DRIVE GET FAT>
 37615                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37616                                  ;
 37617                                  ; Procedure Name : FATREAD_SFT
 37618                                  ;
 37619                                  ; Inputs:
 37620                                  ;	ES:DI points to an SFT for the drive of interest (local only,
 37621                                  ;		giving a NET SFT will produce system crashing results).
 37622                                  ;	DS DOSDATA
 37623                                  ; Function:
 37624                                  ;	Can be used by an SFT routine (like CLOSE) to invalidate buffers
 37625                                  ;	if disk changed.
 37626                                  ;	In other respects, same as FATREAD_CDS.
 37627                                  ;	(note ES:DI destroyed!)
 37628                                  ; Outputs:
 37629                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 37630                                  ; NOTE: This routine may cause FATREAD_CDS to "miss" a disk change
 37631                                  ;	as far as invalidating curdir_ID is concerned.
 37632                                  ;	Since getting a true disk changed on this call is a screw up
 37633                                  ;	anyway, that's the way it goes.
 37634                                  ;
 37635                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37636                                  
 37637                                  FATREAD_SFT:
 37638 00006561 26C46D07                	LES	BP,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_devptr]
 37639                                  
 37640                                  fatread_gotdpb:	; 03/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37641                                  	; 27/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 37642                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE] ; [es:bp+0]
 37643                                  	; 15/12/2022
 37644 00006565 268A4600                	mov	AL,[ES:BP]
 37645 00006569 A2[7605]                	MOV	[THISDRV],AL
 37646 0000656C E8F6A0                  	call	GOTDPB			; Set THISDPB
 37647                                  	;CALL	FAT_GOT_DPB
 37648                                  	; 17/12/2022
 37649 0000656F E99C00                  	jmp	FAT_GOT_DPB
 37650                                  ;fatread_sft_retn:
 37651                                  	;retn
 37652                                  
 37653                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37654                                  ;
 37655                                  ; Procedure Name : FATREAD_CDS
 37656                                  ;
 37657                                  ; Inputs:
 37658                                  ;	DS:DOSDATA
 37659                                  ;	ES:DI points to an CDS for the drive of interest (local only,
 37660                                  ;		giving a NET or NUL CDS will produce system crashing results).
 37661                                  ; Function:
 37662                                  ;	If disk may have been changed, media is determined and buffers are
 37663                                  ;	flagged invalid. If not, no action is taken.
 37664                                  ; Outputs:
 37665                                  ;	ES:BP = Drive parameter block
 37666                                  ;	THISDPB = ES:BP
 37667                                  ;	THISDRV set
 37668                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 37669                                  ; DS preserved , all other registers destroyed
 37670                                  ;
 37671                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37672                                  
 37673                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37674                                  	; DOSCODE:96C5h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 37675                                  	; 27/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 37676                                  	; DOSCODE:9669h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 37677                                  
 37678                                  	; 03/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37679                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0A6D8h
 37680                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C644h)
 37681                                  
 37682                                  FATREAD_CDS:
 37683 00006572 06                      	PUSH	ES
 37684 00006573 57                      	PUSH	DI
 37685                                  
 37686                                  	;les	bp,[es:di+45h]
 37687 00006574 26C46D45                	LES	BP,[ES:DI+curdir.devptr]
 37688                                  
 37689                                  ; 03/03/2024
 37690                                  %if 0
 37691                                  	; 27/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 37692                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE] ; [es:bp+0]
 37693                                  	; 15/12/2022
 37694                                  	mov	AL,[ES:BP]
 37695                                  	MOV	[THISDRV],AL
 37696                                  	call	GOTDPB			;Set THISDPB
 37697                                  	CALL	FAT_GOT_DPB
 37698                                  %else
 37699                                  	; 03/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37700                                  	;;;
 37701 00006578 E8EAFF                  	call	fatread_gotdpb
 37702                                  	;;;
 37703                                  %endif
 37704 0000657B 5F                      	POP	DI			;Get back CDS pointer
 37705 0000657C 07                      	POP	ES
 37706 0000657D 72E1                    	jc	short fatread_sft_retn
 37707 0000657F 7542                    	JNZ	short NO_CHANGE		;Media NOT changed
 37708                                  
 37709                                  ;	Media changed. We now need to find all CDS structures which use this
 37710                                  ;	DPB and invalidate their ID pointers.
 37711                                  
 37712                                  MED_CHANGE:
 37713                                  	;XOR	AX,AX
 37714                                  	;DEC	AX			; AX = -1
 37715                                  	; 03/03/2024
 37716 00006581 B8FFFF                  	mov	ax,0FFFFh ; -1
 37717

 37719 00006585 8A0E[4700]              	MOV	CL,[CDSCOUNT]

 37721                                  	;lds	si,[es:di+45h]
 37722 0000658B 26C57545                	LDS	SI,[ES:DI+curdir.devptr] ; Find all CDS with this devptr
 37723                                  
 37724                                  ;hkn; SS override
 37725                                  
 37726                                  ;	Find all CDSs with this DevPtr
 37727                                  ;
 37728                                  ;	(ax) = -1
 37729                                  ;	(ds:si) = DevPtr
 37730                                  
 37731 0000658F 36C43E[3C00]            	LES	DI,[SS:CDSADDR]		; (es:di) = CDS pointer
 37732                                  frcd20: 
 37733                                  	;;test	word [es:di+43h],8000h
 37734                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 37735 00006594 26F6454480              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+curdir.flags+1],(curdir_isnet>>8)
 37736 00006599 7522                    	JNZ	short frcd25		; Leave NET guys alone!!
 37737                                  
 37738                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 37739                                  	;push	es
 37740                                  	;push	di
 37741                                  	;les	di,[es:di+45h]
 37742                                  	;;les	di,[ES:DI+curdir.devptr]
 37743                                  	;call	POINTCOMP
 37744                                  	;pop	di
 37745                                  	;pop	es
 37746                                  	;jnz	short frcd25
 37747

 37750 0000659F 751C                    	jne	short frcd25		; no match
 37751 000065A1 8CDB                    	mov	bx,ds
 37752 000065A3 263B5D47                	cmp	bx,[ES:DI+curdir.devptr+2]
 37753 000065A7 7514                    	jne	short frcd25		; CDS not for this drive
 37754                                  
 37755                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)

 37760                                  		; !!! jz short frcd25

 37762                                  		; test dword ptr es:[di+49h],-1 ; Win ME - BIOSCODE:0C694h

 37766 000065AD 7506                    	jnz	short frcd24
 37767

 37769                                  	;;;

 37772 000065B3 7408                    	jz	short frcd25 ; = 0
 37773                                  frcd24:		; 03/03/2024
 37774                                  	;;;

 37776 000065B5 26894549                	MOV	[ES:DI+curdir.ID],AX	; else invalid
 37777                                  	; 03/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37778                                  	;;;
 37779                                  	;mov	[es:di+4Bh],ax

 37781                                  	;;;
 37782                                  frcd25:	
 37783                                  	;;add	di,81  ; MSDOS 3.3
 37784                                  	;add	di,88  ; MSDOS 6.0

 37786 000065C0 E2D2                    	LOOP	frcd20
 37787 000065C2 1F                      	POP	DS
 37788                                  NO_CHANGE:

 37790 000065C7 F8                      	CLC
 37791 000065C8 C3                      	retn

 37793                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 37794                                  ; 05/01/2024 - Retro DOS 5.0
 37795                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0A7Fh
 37796                                  ;;;
 37797                                  chk_set_first_access:
 37798                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+0Fh],0
 37799 000065C9 26837E0F00              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],0
 37800 000065CE 750D                    	jnz	short chk_set_fa_1	; FAT (FAT12 or FAT16)
 37801                                  	; FAT32

 37810                                  chk_set_fa_2:

 37815 000065EA 26804E1801              	or	byte [es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],1
 37816                                  chk_set_fa_3:
 37817 000065EF C3                      	retn
 37818                                  ;;;

 37827                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37828                                  
 37829                                  	; 27/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 37830                                  
 37831                                  	; 04/03/2024
 37832                                  	; 03/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37833                                  
 37834                                  FAT_operation:
 37835                                  	; 31/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 37836                                  FATERR:
 37837                                  
 37838                                  ; 03/03/2024
 37839                                  %if 0
 37840                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+1Eh],-1
 37841                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+1Fh],-1 ; MSDOS 6.0
 37842                                  	MOV	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],-1 
 37843                                  					; Err in FAT must force recomp of freespace
 37844                                  %else
 37845                                  	; 03/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37846                                  	;;;
 37847 000065F0 E8D6FF                  	call    chk_set_first_access
 37848                                  	;;;
 37849                                  %endif
 37850                                  	;and	di,0FFh
 37851 000065F3 81E7FF00                	AND	DI,STECODE		; Put error code in DI
 37852                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 37853 000065F7 C606[4B03]18            	MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 37854                                  	;mov	ah,1Ah
 37855 000065FC B41A                    	MOV	AH,2+Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY ; While trying to read FAT
 37856 000065FE A0[7605]                	MOV	AL,[THISDRV]		; Tell which drive
 37857 00006601 E8EFFA                  	call	FATAL1
 37858 00006604 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 37859 00006608 3C03                    	CMP	AL,3
 37860 0000660A 7502                    	JNZ	short FAT_GOT_DPB	; User said retry
 37861                                  
 37862                                  FATERR_fail:	; 03/03/2024
 37863 0000660C F9                      	STC				; User said FAIL
 37864 0000660D C3                      	retn
 37865                                  
 37866                                  FAT_GOT_DPB:
 37867                                  	;Context DS			;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 37868 0000660E 16                      	push	ss
 37869 0000660F 1F                      	pop	ds
 37870                                  
 37871                                  	; 03/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37872                                  	;;;
 37873 00006610 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 37874 00006612 09E8                    	or	ax,bp
 37875 00006614 74F6                    	jz	short FATERR_fail
 37876                                  	;;;
 37877                                  
 37878                                  	;;mov	al,0Fh
 37879                                  	;MOV	AL,DMEDHL
 37880                                  	; 03/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37881                                  	;;;
 37882 00006616 B013                    	mov	al,19
 37883                                  	;;;
 37884                                  
 37885                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+1]
 37886 00006618 268A6601                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 37887 0000661C A3[5A03]                	MOV	[DEVCALL_REQLEN],AX ; 09/09/2018 
 37888 0000661F C606[5C03]01            	MOV	BYTE [DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVMDCH
 37889 00006624 C706[5D03]0000          	MOV	word [DEVCALL_REQSTAT],0
 37890                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+16h]
 37891                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+17h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 37892 0000662A 268A4617                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 37893 0000662E A2[6703]                	MOV	[CALLMED],AL
 37894 00006631 06                      	PUSH	ES
 37895 00006632 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 37896                                  
 37897                                  ;hkn; DEVCALL is in DOSDATA
 37898 00006633 BB[5A03]                	MOV	BX,DEVCALL
 37899                                  	;;lds	si,[es:bp+12h]
 37900                                  	;lds	si,[es:bp+13h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 37901 00006636 26C57613                	LDS	SI,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVER_ADDR] ; DS:SI Points to device header
 37902 0000663A 07                      	POP	ES			; ES:BX Points to call header
 37903 0000663B E85FEC                  	call	DEVIOCALL2
 37904                                  	;Context DS		 	;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 37905 0000663E 16                      	push	ss
 37906 0000663F 1F                      	pop	ds
 37907 00006640 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 37908 00006641 8B3E[5D03]              	MOV	DI,[DEVCALL_REQSTAT]
 37909                                  	;test	di,8000h
 37910                                  	;jnz	short FATERR
 37911 00006645 09FF                    	or	di,di

 38340 00006804 E98C00                  	jmp	gotgetbuf12		; skip reading FSINFO sector
 38341                                  
 38342                                  gotgetbuf5:
 38343 00006807 36890E[0706]            	mov	[ss:HIGH_SECTOR],cx ; 0
 38344 0000680C 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 38345                                  
 38346                                  	;cmp	byte [ss:BuffInHMA],0
 38347 0000680E 36380E[7900]            	cmp	[ss:BuffInHMA],cl ; 0
 38348 00006813 7405                    	jz	short gotgetbuf6	; buffer is in conventional (<=640KB) memory
 38349 00006815 36C51E[7A00]            	lds	bx,[ss:LoMemBuff]	; use a buffer in conventional memory
 38350                                  	;mov	di,bx
 38351                                  gotgetbuf6:
 38352 0000681A 36C606[4B03]18          	mov	byte [ss:ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY ; 18h
 38353 00006820 41                      	inc	cx
 38354                                  	;push	di
 38355 00006821 53                      	push	bx
 38356 00006822 E8CAD7                  	call	DREAD
 38357 00006825 5B                      	pop	bx
 38358                                  	;pop	di
 38359 00006826 89DF                    	mov	di,bx ; Retro DOS v5.0
 38360 00006828 725F                    	jc	short gotgetbuf11	; ds:di = (FSINFO sector) buffer
 38361                                  
 38362                                  	; FSI_HeadSig = 41615252h
 38363                                  
 38364 0000682A 813D5252                	cmp	word [di],5252h		; 'RR' ; check if it is a valid FSINFO sector
 38365                                  	;cmp	word [di+FSINFO.LeadSig],5252
 38366 0000682E 7559                    	jnz	short gotgetbuf11	; not valid
 38367                                  	;cmp	word [di+2],4161h	; 'aA' ; (NASM syntax)
 38368 00006830 817D026141              	cmp	word [di+FSINFO.LeadSig+2],4161h
 38369 00006835 7552                    	jnz	short gotgetbuf11
 38370                                  	;cmp	word [di+484],7272h	; 'rr' ; FSI_StrucSig = 61417272h
 38371 00006837 81BDE4017272            	cmp	word [di+FSINFO.StrucSig],7272h
 38372 0000683D 754A                    	jnz	short gotgetbuf11
 38373                                  	;cmp	word [di+486],6141h	; 'Aa'
 38374 0000683F 81BDE6014161            	cmp	word [di+FSINFO.StrucSig+2],6141h
 38375 00006845 7542                    	jnz	short gotgetbuf11	; not valid
 38376                                  
 38377                                  	; valid
 38378 00006847 52                      	push	dx
 38379 00006848 53                      	push	bx
 38380 00006849 51                      	push	cx
 38381                                  
 38382                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2Fh]
 38383 0000684A 268B5E2F                	mov	bx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER+2]
 38384                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2Dh]
 38385 0000684E 268B4E2D                	mov	cx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER]
 38386                                  
 38387                                  	;mov	ax,[di+488]		; FSI_FreeCount ; bx:cx = number of clusters + 1
 38388 00006852 8B85E801                	mov	ax,[di+FSINFO.Free_Count]
 38389                                  	;mov	dx,[di+490]		; FSI_FreeCount+2
 38390 00006856 8B95EA01                	mov	dx,[di+FSINFO.Free_Count+2]
 38391                                  
 38392 0000685A 39DA                    	cmp	dx,bx			; is Free Count >= (Number of Clusters + 1) ?
 38393 0000685C 7502                    	jne	short gotgetbuf7	; if yes, it is invalid value (must be 0FFFFFFFFh)
 38394 0000685E 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38395                                  gotgetbuf7:
 38396 00006860 7308                    	jnb	short gotgetbuf8	; yes, invalid value (must be 0FFFFFFFFh)
 38397                                  	
 38398                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1Fh],ax		; no,valid free count
 38399 00006862 2689461F                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT],ax ; save free count into [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT]
 38400                                  	;mov	[es:bp+21h],dx
 38401 00006866 26895621                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2],dx
 38402                                  
 38403                                  gotgetbuf8:
 38404                                  	;mov	ax,[di+492]		; FSI_Nxt_Free
 38405 0000686A 8B85EC01                	mov	ax,[di+FSINFO.Nxt_Free]
 38406                                  	;mov	dx,[di+494]
 38407 0000686E 8B95EE01                	mov	dx,[di+FSINFO.Nxt_Free+2]
 38408                                  
 38409 00006872 39DA                    	cmp	dx,bx			; is the next free clust num >= (num of clusters + 1) ?
 38410 00006874 7502                    	jne	short gotgetbuf9	; invalid (if dx > bx)
 38411 00006876 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38412                                  gotgetbuf9:
 38413 00006878 730C                    	jnb	short gotgetbuf10 ; invalid
 38414                                  
 38415                                  	;mov	[es:bp+39h],ax		; save next free (search) cluster number
 38416 0000687A 26894639                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE],ax ; into [es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE]
 38417                                  	;mov	[es:bp+3Bh],dx
 38418 0000687E 2689563B                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE+2],dx
 38419                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1Dh],ax		; and into [es:bp+DPB.NEXT_FREE] ; low word
 38420 00006882 2689461D                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.NEXT_FREE],ax
 38421                                  
 38422                                  gotgetbuf10:
 38423 00006886 59                      	pop	cx
 38424 00006887 5B                      	pop	bx
 38425 00006888 5A                      	pop	dx
 38426                                  
 38427                                  gotgetbuf11:
 38428 00006889 36803E[7900]00          	cmp	byte [ss:BuffInHMA],0	; is buffer in HMA ?
 38429                                  	;jnz	short gotgetbuf12	; yes
 38430 0000688F 753A                    	jnz	short gotgetbuf16 ; 04/03/2024
 38431                                  
 38432                                  	;mov	word [di-20],0FFh	; invalidate buffer (set it as free buffer)
 38433                                  	; 04/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 38434 00006891 EB0F                    	jmp	short gotgetbuf17
 38435                                  
 38436                                  gotgetbuf12:
 38437 00006893 36803E[7900]00          	cmp	byte [ss:BuffInHMA],0
 38438 00006899 7530                    	jnz	short gotgetbuf16
 38439                                  
 38440                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+6],1
 38441 0000689B 26837E0601              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FIRST_FAT],1 ; 1st FAT start sector
 38442 000068A0 7405                    	jz	short gotgetbuf13
 38443                                  
 38444                                  gotgetbuf17:	; 04/03/2024
 38445                                  	;mov	word [di-20],0FFh	; invalidate buffer (set it as free buffer)
 38446                                  			  		; di = buffer header + 4 (BUFINFO.buf_ID)
 38447 000068A2 C745ECFF00              	mov	word [di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID-BUFINSIZ],0FFh
 38448                                  
 38449                                  gotgetbuf13:
 38450                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+8]
 38451 000068A7 268A4608                	mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.FAT_COUNT]
 38452                                  	;mov	[di-14],al		; buffer header address + 10
 38453 000068AB 8845F2                  	mov	[di+BUFFINFO.buf_wrtcnt-BUFINSIZ],al
 38454                                  
 38455                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+0Fh]
 38456 000068AE 268B460F                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE]	; 16 bit FAT size field
 38457 000068B2 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 38458 000068B4 750D                    	jnz	short gotgetbuf14 ; FAT (FAT12 or FAT16) fs
 38459                                  	
 38460                                  	; FAT32 fs
 38461                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+31h]		; FAT sectors (per one FAT)
 38462 000068B6 268B4631                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_SIZE] 
 38463                                  	;mov	[di-13],ax 	; BUFFINFO.buf_wrtcntinc ; # sectors between each write
 38464 000068BA 8945F3                  	mov	[di+BUFFINFO.buf_wrtcntinc-BUFINSIZ],ax
 38465                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+33h]
 38466 000068BD 268B4633                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_SIZE+2]
 38467 000068C1 EB05                    	jmp	short gotgetbuf15
 38468                                  
 38469                                  gotgetbuf14:
 38470                                  	;mov	[di-13],ax		; BUFFINFO.buf_wrtcntinc
 38471 000068C3 8945F3                  	mov	[di+BUFFINFO.buf_wrtcntinc-BUFINSIZ],ax
 38472                                  
 38473                                  	;xor	ax,ax			; 0
 38474 000068C6 29C0                    	sub	ax,ax ; 0
 38475                                  
 38476                                  gotgetbuf15:
 38477                                  	;;mov	[di-15],ax		; BUFFINFO.buf_wrtcntinc+2 ; hw of sectors per FAT
 38478                                  					; PCDOS 7.1 BUG !? This would be 'mov [di-11],ax'
 38479                                  					; Erdogan Tan - 03/03/2024
 38480                                  	;mov	[di-11],ax
 38481 000068C8 8945F5                  	mov	[di+BUFFINFO.buf_wrtcntinc+2-BUFINSIZ],ax
 38482                                  
 38483                                  gotgetbuf16:
 38484                                  	;mov	ax,ss			; SS is DOSDATA
 38485                                  	;mov	ds,ax
 38486 000068CB 16                      	push	ss
 38487 000068CC 1F                      	pop	ds
 38488                                  	;xor	al,al			; Media changed (Z),Carry clear
 38489 000068CD 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 38490 000068CF C3                      	retn

 38528                                  ;SETVISIT:
 38529                                  ;	; 31/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 38530                                  ;	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5CAFh
 38531                                  ;; Inputs:
 38532                                  ;;      None
 38533                                  ;; Function:
 38534                                  ;;      Set up a scan of I/O buffers
 38535                                  ;; Outputs:
 38536                                  ;;      All visit flags = 0
 38537                                  ;;              NOTE: This pre-scan is needed because a hard disk error
 38538                                  ;;                    may cause a scan to stop in the middle leaving some
 38539                                  ;;                    visit flags set, and some not set.
 38540                                  ;;      DS:DI Points to [BUFFHEAD]
 38541                                  ;; No other registers altered
 38542                                  ;
 38543                                  ;       LDS     DI,[SS:BUFFHEAD] ; 15/03/2018
 38544                                  ;	PUSH    AX
 38545                                  ;       ;;XOR	AX,AX	  ;; MSDOS 2.11
 38546                                  ;	;mov	al,0DFh
 38547                                  ;	mov	al,~buf_visit
 38548                                  ;SETLOOP:
 38549                                  ;       ;;MOV	[DI+7],AL ;; MSDOS 2.11
 38550                                  ;	;and	[DI+5],al
 38551                                  ;	AND	[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],AL
 38552                                  ;       LDS     DI,[DI]
 38553                                  ;       CMP     DI,-1
 38554                                  ;       JNZ     SHORT SETLOOP
 38555                                  ;       POP     AX ; 09/09/2018
 38556                                  ;	LDS     DI,[SS:BUFFHEAD] ; 15/03/2018
 38557                                  ;SVISIT_RETN:
 38558                                  ;       RETN
 38559                                  ;
 38560                                  ;SKIPVISIT:
 38561                                  ;	; 31/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 38562                                  ;	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5CC8h
 38563                                  ;
 38564                                  ;; Inputs:
 38565                                  ;;      DS:DI Points to a buffer
 38566                                  ;; Function:
 38567                                  ;;      Skip visited buffers
 38568                                  ;; Outputs:
 38569                                  ;;      DS:DI Points to next unvisited buffer
 38570                                  ;;      Zero is set if skip to LAST buffer
 38571                                  ;; No other registers altered
 38572                                  ;
 38573                                  ;       CMP     DI,-1
 38574                                  ;       ;retz
 38575                                  ;       JZ	SHORT SVISIT_RETN
 38576                                  ;
 38577                                  ;	;;CMP	BYTE [DI+7],1 ;; MSDOS 2.11
 38578                                  ;       ;;;retnz
 38579                                  ;       ;;JNZ	SHORT SVISIT_RETN
 38580                                  ;
 38581                                  ;	;test	byte [di+5],20h
 38582                                  ;	TEST	byte [DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_visit	
 38583                                  ;	JNZ	short SKIPLOOP
 38584                                  ;	
 38585                                  ;	push	ax
 38586                                  ;	or	al,1
 38587                                  ;	pop	ax
 38588                                  ;	retn	
 38589                                  ;
 38590                                  ;SKIPLOOP:
 38591                                  ;	LDS     DI,[DI]
 38592                                  ;       JMP     SHORT SKIPVISIT

 38601                                  ;	TITLE	BUF - MSDOS buffer management
 38602                                  ;	NAME	BUF
 38603                                  
 38604                                  ;**	BUF.ASM - Low level routines for buffer cache management
 38605                                  ;
 38606                                  ;	GETCURHEAD
 38607                                  ;	ScanPlace
 38608                                  ;	PLACEBUF
 38609                                  ;	PLACEHEAD
 38610                                  ;	PointComp
 38611                                  ;	GETBUFFR
 38612                                  ;	GETBUFFRB

 38614                                  ;	BufWrite

 38616                                  ;
 38617                                  ;	Revision history:
 38618                                  ;
 38619                                  ;		AN000  version 4.00  Jan. 1988
 38620                                  ;		A004   PTM 3765 -- Disk reset failed
 38621                                  ;		M039 DB 10/17/90 - Disk write optimization
 38622                                  ;		I001   5.0 PTR 722211 - Preserve CY when in buffer in HMA
 38623                                  
 38624                                  ;Break	<GETCURHEAD -- Get current buffer header>
 38625                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38626                                  ; Procedure Name : GetCurHead
 38627                                  ; Inputs:
 38628                                  ;	 No Inputs
 38629                                  ; Function:
 38630                                  ;	Returns the pointer to the first buffer in Queue
 38631                                  ;	and updates FIRST_BUFF_ADDR
 38632                                  ;       and invalidates LASTBUFFER (recency pointer)
 38633                                  ; Outputs:
 38634                                  ;	DS:DI = pointer to the first buffer in Queue
 38635                                  ;	FIRST_BUFF_ADDR = offset ( DI ) of First buffer in Queue
 38636                                  ;       LASTBUFFER = -1
 38637                                  ; No other registers altered
 38638                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38639                                  
 38640                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38641                                  ; DOSCODE:98D2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 38642                                  ; 27/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 38643                                  ; DOSCODE:9876h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 38644                                  
 38645                                  ; 06/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 38646                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0AA4Bh
 38647                                  
 38648                                  GETCURHEAD:
 38649 000068D0 36C53E[6D00]            	lds	di,[ss:BufferQueue]	; Pointer to the first buffer
 38650 000068D5 36C706[1E00]FFFF        	mov	word [ss:LastBuffer],-1	; invalidate last buffer
 38651 000068DC 36893E[7E11]            	mov	[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR],di	; save first buffer address
 38652 000068E1 C3                      	retn
 38653                                  
 38654                                  ;Break	<SCANPLACE, PLACEBUF -- PUT A BUFFER BACK IN THE POOL>
 38655                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38656                                  ; Procedure Name : ScanPlace
 38657                                  ; Inputs:
 38658                                  ;	Same as PLACEBUF
 38659                                  ; Function:
 38660                                  ;	Save scan location and call PLACEBUF
 38661                                  ; Outputs:
 38662                                  ;	DS:DI Points to saved scan location
 38663                                  ; All registers, except DS:DI, preserved.
 38664                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38665                                  ;M039: Rewritten to preserve registers.
 38666                                  
 38667                                  ;SCANPLACE:
 38668                                  ;	; 31/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 38669                                  ;	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5DDCh
 38670                                  ;	push	es
 38671                                  ;	les	si,[di]
 38672                                  ;	;les	si,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_link]
 38673                                  ;	call	PLACEBUF
 38674                                  ;	push	es
 38675                                  ;	pop	ds
 38676                                  ;	mov	di,si
 38677                                  ;	pop	es
 38678                                  ;scanplace_retn:
 38679                                  ;	retn	
 38680                                  	
 38681                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 38682                                  SCANPLACE:
 38683 000068E2 FF35                    	push	word [di]
 38684                                  	;push	word [di+BUFFINFO.buf_next] ;Save scan location
 38685 000068E4 E80200                  	call	PLACEBUF
 38686 000068E7 5F                      	pop	di
 38687 000068E8 C3                      	retn
 38688                                  
 38689                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38690                                  ; Procedure Name : PlaceBuf
 38691                                  ; Input:
 38692                                  ;	DS:DI points to buffer (DS->BUFFINFO array, DI=offset in array)
 38693                                  ; Function:
 38694                                  ;	Remove buffer from queue and re-insert it in proper place.
 38695                                  ; NO registers altered
 38696                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38697                                  
 38698                                  ;procedure PLACEBUF,NEAR
 38699                                  
 38700                                  	; 27/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 38701                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38702                                  PLACEBUF:
 38703                                  	; 31/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 38704                                  
 38705                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 38706 000068E9 50                      	push	AX			;Save only regs we modify	;AN000;
 38707 000068EA 53                      	push	BX							;AN000;
 38708                                  	; 23/09/2023
 38709                                  	;push	SI							;AN000;
 38710                                  	
 38711 000068EB 8B05                    	mov	ax,[di]
 38712                                  	;mov	ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next]
 38713 000068ED 368B1E[6D00]            	mov	bx,[ss:BufferQueue]	; bx = offset of head of list;smr;SS Override
 38714                                  	
 38715 000068F2 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx				;Buf = last?		;AN000;
 38716 000068F4 7422                    	je	short nret			;Yes, special case	;AN000;
 38717 000068F6 39DF                    	cmp	di,bx				;Buf = first?		;AN000;
 38718 000068F8 7506                    	jne	short not_first 		;Yes, special case	;AN000;
 38719 000068FA 36A3[6D00]              	mov	[ss:BufferQueue],ax		;smr;SS Override
 38720 000068FE EB18                    	jmp	short nret 			;Continue with repositioning;AN000;
 38721                                  not_first:
 38722                                  	; 23/09/2023
 38723 00006900 56                      	push	si
 38724                                  	;mov	si,[di+2]
 38725 00006901 8B7502                  	mov	SI,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_prev]	;No, SI = prior Buf	;AN000;
 38726 00006904 8904                    	mov	[si],ax
 38727                                  	;mov	[SI+BUFFINFO.buf_next],AX	; ax has di->buf_next	;AN000;
 38728 00006906 96                      	xchg	si,ax
 38729                                  	;mov	[si+2],ax
 38730 00006907 894402                  	mov	[SI+BUFFINFO.buf_prev],AX	;			;AN000;
 38731                                  	
 38732 0000690A 8B7702                  	mov	SI,[BX+BUFFINFO.buf_prev]	;SI-> last buffer	;AN000;
 38733 0000690D 893C                    	mov	[si],di
 38734                                  	;mov	[SI+BUFFINFO.buf_next],DI	;Add Buf to end of list ;AN000;
 38735 0000690F 897F02                  	mov	[BX+BUFFINFO.buf_prev],DI				;AN000;
 38736 00006912 897502                  	mov	[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_prev],SI	;Update link in Buf too	;AN000;
 38737 00006915 891D                    	mov	[di],bx
 38738                                  	;mov	[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_next],BX				;AN000;
 38739                                  	; 23/09/2023
 38740 00006917 5E                      	pop	si
 38741                                  nret:	
 38742                                  	; 23/09/2023							;AN000;
 38743                                  	;pop	SI							;AN000;
 38744 00006918 5B                      	pop	BX							;AN000;
 38745 00006919 58                      	pop	AX							;AN000;
 38746                                  									;AN000;
 38747                                  	;cmp	byte [di+4],0FFh
 38748 0000691A 807D04FF                	cmp	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID],-1	; Buffer FREE?		;AN000;
 38749 0000691E 7505                            jne	short pbx			; M039: -no, jump.
 38750 00006920 36893E[6D00]            	mov	[ss:BufferQueue],di		; M039: -yes, make it LRU.
 38751                                  pbx:	
 38752 00006925 C3                      	retn								;AN000;
 38753                                  
 38754                                  	; 31/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 38755                                  
 38756                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 38757                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5DDCh
 38758                                  
 38759                                  ;PLACEBUF:
 38760                                  ;	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0 (MSDOS 2.11)
 38761                                  ;	
 38762                                  ;       CALL	save_world
 38763                                  ;       LES     CX,[DI]
 38764                                  ;       CMP     CX,-1           	; Buf is LAST?
 38765                                  ;       JZ      SHORT NRET		; Buffer already last
 38766                                  ;       MOV     BP,ES           	; Pointsave = Buf.nextbuf
 38767                                  ;       PUSH    DS
 38768                                  ;       POP     ES              	; Buf is ES:DI
 38769                                  ;	; 15/03/2018
 38770                                  ;       LDS     SI,[SS:BUFFHEAD] 	; Curbuf = HEAD
 38771                                  ;       CALL    POINTCOMP       	; Buf == HEAD?
 38772                                  ;       JNZ     SHORT BUFLOOP
 38773                                  ;       MOV     [SS:BUFFHEAD],CX
 38774                                  ;       MOV     [SS:BUFFHEAD+2],BP	; HEAD = Pointsave
 38775                                  ;       JMP     SHORT LOOKEND
 38776                                  ;BUFLOOP:
 38777                                  ;	; 31/07/2018
 38778                                  ;	mov	ax,ds
 38779                                  ;	mov	bx,si
 38780                                  ;	;lds	si,[SI+BUFFINFO.buf_link]
 38781                                  ;       LDS     SI,[SI]
 38782                                  ;       CALL    POINTCOMP
 38783                                  ;       jnz	short BUFLOOP
 38784                                  ;	;
 38785                                  ;	mov	ds,ax

 38788                                  ;	;mov	[SI+BUFFINFO.buf_link],cx   ; If Curbuf.nextbuf == buf
 38789                                  ;	mov	[SI+2],bp
 38790                                  ;	;mov	[BX+BUFFINFO.buf_link+2],bp ; Curbuf.nextbuf = Pointsave
 38791                                  ;LOOKEND:
 38792                                  ;	mov	ax,ds
 38793                                  ;	mov	bx,si
 38794                                  ;       LDS     SI,[SI]
 38795                                  ;       CMP     SI,-1
 38796                                  ;       jnz     short LOOKEND
 38797                                  ;GOTHEEND:
 38798                                  ;       mov	ds,ax
 38799                                  ;	mov	[BX],di
 38800                                  ;	MOV     [BX+2],ES 		; Curbuf.nextbuf = Buf
 38801                                  ;       MOV     WORD [ES:DI],-1
