 47129                                  	; 14/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 47130                                  	;;;
 47131 000080C2 3CFF                    	cmp	al,0FFh		; MS-DOS 7.20 (Win98) - EXTENDED-LENGTH FILENAME OPERATIONS
 47132                                  				; AX = 43FFh
 47133                                  				; BP = 5053h ('PS')
 47134                                  				; CL = function
 47135                                  				; 39h "mkdir" create directory
 47136                                  				; DS:DX -> ASCIZ pathname
 47137                                  				; 56h rename file
 47138                                  				; DS:DX -> ASCIZ filename of existing file (no wildcards)
 47139                                  				; ES:DI -> ASCIZ new filename (no wildcards)
 47140                                  				;
 47141                                  				; ref: Ralf Brown's Interrupt List

 47150 000080D9 E947A7                  	jmp	mkdir_x

 47159 000080E3 E99285                  	jmp	SYS_RET_ERR

 47241                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 47242                                  ; DOSCODE:B039h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 47243                                  
 47244                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 47245                                  ; DOSCODE:AFD6h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 47246                                  
 47247                                  ;	BREAK <$UNLINK - delete a file entry>
 47248                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47249                                  ;
 47250                                  ;**	$UNLINK - Delete a File
 47251                                  ;
 47252                                  ;
 47253                                  ;	Assembler usage:
 47254                                  ;	    LDS     DX, name
 47255                                  ;	    IF VIA SERVER DOS CALL
 47256                                  ;	     MOV     CX,SEARCH_ATTRIB
 47257                                  ;	    MOV     AH, Unlink
 47258                                  ;	    INT     21h
 47259                                  ;
 47260                                  ;	ENTRY	(ds:dx) = path name
 47261                                  ;		(cx) = search_attribute, if via server_dos
 47262                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if no error
 47263                                  ;		'C' set if error
 47264                                  ;		  (ax) = error code
 47265                                  ;			= error_file_not_found
 47266                                  ;			= error_access_denied
 47267                                  ;
 47268                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47269                                  
 47270                                  	; 15/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 47271                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0C2E4h
 47272                                  
 47273                                  _$UNLINK:
 47274 00008127 51                      	push	cx			; Save possible CX input parm
 47275 00008128 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX			; Point at input string
 47276 0000812A BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF		; temp spot for path
 47277 0000812D E849FB                  	call	TransPathSet		; go get normalized path
 47278 00008130 59                      	pop	cx
 47279 00008131 7216                    	JC	short ChModErr		; badly formed path
 47280 00008133 36803E[7A05]FF          	CMP	byte [ss:CMETA],-1	; meta chars?	;smr;SS Override
 47281 00008139 750E                    	JNZ	short NotFound
 47282 0000813B 16                      	push	ss
 47283 0000813C 1F                      	pop	ds
 47284                                  	;mov	ch,6
 47285 0000813D B506                    	mov	ch,attr_hidden+attr_system ; unlink appropriate files
 47286 0000813F E82E01                  	call	SetAttrib
 47287 00008142 E81BAA                  	call	DOS_DELETE		; remove that file
 47288                                  	;JC	short UnlinkE 		; error is there
 47289                                  	; 17/12/2022
 47290 00008145 729C                    	jc	short NORERR
 47291                                  
 47292                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 47293                                  UnlinkOk:
 47294                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_OK		; okey doksy
 47295 00008147 EBDB                    	jmp	short OpenOkj3
 47296                                  
 47297                                  	; 17/12/2022
 47298                                  ChModErr:	; 17/12/2022
 47299                                  NotFound:
 47300                                  	;mov	al,3
 47301 00008149 B003                    	MOV	AL,error_path_not_found
 47302                                  ChModE:		; 17/12/2022
 47303                                  UnlinkE:
 47304                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 47305                                  	;;jmp	SYS_RET_ERR		; bye
 47306                                  	;jmp	short ChModE
 47307                                  	; 17/12/2022
 47308 0000814B EB96                    	jmp	short NORERR

 47310                                  ;BREAK <$RENAME - move directory entries around>
 47311                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47312                                  ;
 47313                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 47314                                  ;	    LDS     DX, source
 47315                                  ;	    LES     DI, dest
 47316                                  ;	    IF VIA SERVER DOS CALL
 47317                                  ;	      MOV   CX,SEARCH_ATTRIB
 47318                                  ;	    MOV     AH, Rename
 47319                                  ;	    INT     21h
 47320                                  ;
 47321                                  ;   Error returns:
 47322                                  ;	    AX = error_file_not_found
 47323                                  ;	       = error_not_same_device
 47324                                  ;	       = error_access_denied
 47325                                  ;
 47326                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47327                                  
 47328                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 47329                                  	; 15/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 47330                                  
 47331                                  _$RENAME:
 47332                                  	; 15/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 47333                                  	;;;
 47334                                  	;mov	word [ss:PATHNAMELEN],67
 47335                                  	; 15/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 47336 0000814D 36C606[5411]43          	mov	byte [ss:PATHNAMELEN],67 ; DIRSTRLEN = 67
 47337                                  rename_x:
 47338                                  	;;;
 47339                                  
 47340                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 47341 00008153 51                      	push	cx
 47342 00008154 1E                      	push	ds
 47343 00008155 52                      	push	dx			; save source and possible CX arg
 47344 00008156 06                      	PUSH	ES
 47345 00008157 1F                      	POP	DS			; move dest to source
 47346 00008158 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI			; save for offsets
 47347 0000815A BF[3E04]                	MOV	DI,RENBUF
 47348 0000815D E819FB                  	call	TransPathSet		; munge the paths
 47349 00008160 36FF36[B205]            	PUSH	word [ss:WFP_START]	; get pointer	;smr;SS Override
 47350 00008165 368F06[B405]            	POP	word [ss:REN_WFP]	; stash it	;smr;SS Override
 47351 0000816A 5E                      	pop	si
 47352 0000816B 1F                      	pop	ds
 47353 0000816C 59                      	pop	cx			; get back source and possible CX arg
 47354                                  epjc2:	
 47355 0000816D 72DA                    	JC	short ChModErr		; get old error
 47356 0000816F 36803E[7A05]FF          	CMP	byte [ss:CMETA],-1			;smr;SS Override
 47357 00008175 75D2                    	JNZ	short NotFound
 47358 00008177 51                      	push	cx			; Save possible CX arg
 47359 00008178 BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF		; appropriate buffer
 47360 0000817B E8FBFA                  	call	TransPathSet		; wham
 47361 0000817E 59                      	pop	cx
 47362                                  	;JC	short epjc2
 47363                                  	; 15/03/2024
 47364 0000817F 72C8                    	jc	short ChModErr
 47365                                  
 47366 00008181 16                      	push	ss
 47367 00008182 1F                      	pop	ds
 47368 00008183 803E[7A05]FF            	CMP	byte [CMETA],-1
 47369 00008188 72BF                    	JB	short NotFound
 47370                                  
 47371                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 47372                                  	;PUSH	WORD [THISCDS]		   ;AN000;;MS.save thiscds
 47373                                  	;PUSH	WORD [THISCDS+2]	   ;AN000;;MS.
 47374                                  	; 15/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 47375                                  	;;;

 47377 0000818E 57                      	push	di
 47378 0000818F 06                      	push	es

 47383 00008194 07                      	POP	ES			   ;AN000;;MS.es:di-> source
 47384 00008195 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL			   ;AN000;;MS.scan all CDS
 47385                                  rnloop: 				   ;AN000;
 47386 00008197 E859FA                  	call	GetCDSFromDrv		   ;AN000;;MS.
 47387 0000819A 720F                    	JC	short dorn		   ;AN000;;MS.	end of CDS
 47388 0000819C E8F095                  	call	StrCmp			   ;AN000;;MS.	current dir ?
 47389 0000819F 7404                    	JZ	short rnerr		   ;AN000;;MS.	yes
 47390 000081A1 FEC0                    	INC	AL			   ;AN000;;MS.	next
 47391 000081A3 EBF2                    	JMP	short rnloop		   ;AN000;;MS.
 47392                                  rnerr:					   ;AN000;
 47393                                  	;ADD	SP,4			   ;AN000;;MS. pop thiscds
 47394                                  	; 15/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 47395 000081A5 58                      	pop	ax
 47396 000081A6 58                      	pop	ax
 47397

 47399 000081A7 B010                    	mov	al,error_current_directory
 47400                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_ERR

 47402 000081A9 EBA0                    	jmp	short UnlinkE
 47403                                  dorn:
 47404

 47408                                  	POP	WORD [SS:THISCDS]	   ;AN000;;MS.;PBUGBUG;SS REQD??
 47409                                  %endif

 47435                                  ;Break <$CreateNewFile - Create a new directory entry>
 47436                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47437                                  ;   CreateNew - Create a new directory entry. Return a file handle if there
 47438                                  ;	was no previous directory entry, and fail if a directory entry with
 47439                                  ;	the same name existed previously.
 47440                                  ;
 47441                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an ASCIZ file name
 47442                                  ;		CX contains default file attributes
 47443                                  ;   Outputs:	Carry Clear:
 47444                                  ;		    AX has file handle opened for read/write
 47445                                  ;		Carry Set:
 47446                                  ;		    AX has error code
 47447                                  ;   Registers modified: All
 47448                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47449                                  
 47450                                  _$CreateNewFile:
 47451 000081C1 51                      	push	cx			; Save attributes on stack
 47452 000081C2 B9[8D31]                	MOV	CX,DOS_Create_New	; routine to call
 47453 000081C5 E9F1FE                  	JMP	AccessSet		; use good ol' open
 47454                                  
 47455                                  ;**	BinToAscii - convert a number to a string.
 47456                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47457                                  ;	BinToAscii converts a 16 bit number into a 4 ascii characters.
 47458                                  ;	This routine is used to generate temp file names so we don't spend
 47459                                  ;	the time and code needed for a true hex number, we just use
 47460                                  ;	A thorugh O.
 47461                                  ;
 47462                                  ;	ENTRY	(ax) = value
 47463                                  ;		(es:di) = destination
 47464                                  ;	EXIT	(es:di) updated by 4
 47465                                  ;	USES	cx, di, flags
 47466                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47467                                  
 47468                                  ; MSDOS 3.3
 47469                                  ;BinToAscii:
 47470                                  ;	mov     cx,4
 47471                                  ;bta5:
 47472                                  ;	push    cx
 47473                                  ;	mov     cl,4
 47474                                  ;	rol     ax,cl
 47475                                  ;	push    ax
 47476                                  ;	and     al,0Fh
 47477                                  ;	add     al,'0'
 47478                                  ;	cmp     al,'9'
 47479                                  ;	jbe     short bta6
 47480                                  ;	add     al,7
 47481                                  ;bta6: 
 47482                                  ;	stosb
 47483                                  ;	pop     ax
 47484                                  ;	pop     cx
 47485                                  ;	loop    bta5
 47486                                  ;	retn
 47487                                  
 47488                                  ; 15/03/2024
 47489                                  ; MSDOS 5.0-6.22 & Windows ME
 47490                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0B0D9h)
 47491                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0ABA4h)
 47492                                  %if 0
 47493                                  
 47494                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 47495                                  BinToAscii:
 47496                                  	mov	cx,404h			; (ch) = digit counter, (cl) = shift cnt
 47497                                  bta5:	
 47498                                  	ROL	AX,CL			; move leftmost nibble into rightmost
 47499                                  	push	ax			; preserve remainder of digits
 47500                                  	AND	AL,0Fh			; grab low nibble
 47501                                  	ADD	AL,'A'			; turn into ascii
 47502                                  	STOSB				; drop in the character
 47503                                  	pop	ax			; (ax) = shifted number
 47504                                  	dec	ch
 47505                                  	jnz	short bta5		; process 4 digits
 47506                                  	retn
 47507                                  %else
 47508                                  ; 15/03/2024
 47509                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0C385h
 47510                                  
 47511                                  BinToAscii:
 47512 000081C8 50                      	push	ax		; convert a number to a string ; ax = value
 47513 000081C9 86E0                    	xchg	ah,al
 47514                                  	;db	0D4h,10h
 47515 000081CB D410                    	aam	10h		; AH = AL / 16 and AL = remainder
 47516 000081CD 054141                  	add	ax,4141h	; 'AA'
 47517 000081D0 AB                      	stosw
 47518 000081D1 58                      	pop	ax
 47519                                  	;db	0D4h,10h
 47520 000081D2 D410                    	aam	10h
 47521 000081D4 054141                  	add	ax,4141h	; add ax,'AA'
 47522 000081D7 AB                      	stosw
 47523 000081D8 C3                      	retn	
 47524                                  %endif
 47525                                  
 47526                                  ;Break	<$CreateTempFile - create a unique name>
 47527                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47528                                  ;   $CreateTemp - given a directory, create a unique name in that directory.
 47529                                  ;	Method used is to get the current time, convert to a name and attempt
 47530                                  ;	a create new. Repeat until create new succeeds.
 47531                                  ;
 47532                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to a null terminated directory name.
 47533                                  ;		CX  contains default attributes
 47534                                  ;   Outputs:	Unique name is appended to DS:DX directory.
 47535                                  ;		AX has handle
 47536                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 47537                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47538                                  
 47539                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 47540                                  	; 15/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 47541                                  
 47542                                  _$CreateTempFile:
 47543                                  	;Enter
 47544 000081D9 55                      	push	bp
 47545 000081DA 89E5                    	mov	bp,sp
 47546                                  
 47547                                  	;LocalVar  EndPtr,DWORD
 47548                                  	;LocalVar  FilPtr,DWORD
 47549                                  	;LocalVar  Attr,WORD
 47550                                  
 47551 000081DC 83EC0A                  	sub	sp,10
 47552                                  
 47553                                  	;test	cx,0FFD8h
 47554 000081DF F7C1D8FF                	test	CX,~attr_changeable
 47555 000081E3 7405                    	JZ	short OKatts		; Ok if no non-changeable bits set
 47556                                  
 47557                                  ; We need this "hook" here to detect these cases (like user sets one both of
 47558                                  ; vol_id and dir bits) because of the structure of the or $CreateNewFile loop
 47559                                  ; below. The code loops on error_access_denied, but if one of the non
 47560                                  ; changeable attributes is specified, the loop COULD be infinite or WILL be
 47561                                  ; infinite because CreateNewFile will fail with access_denied always. Thus we
 47562                                  ; need to detect these cases before getting to the loop.
 47563                                  
 47564                                  	;mov	ax, 5
 47565 000081E5 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied
 47566 000081E8 EB7A                    	JMP	SHORT SETTMPERR
 47567                                  
 47568                                  OKatts:
 47569                                  	;MOV	attr,CX 		; save attribute
 47570 000081EA 894EF6                  	mov     [bp-10],cx
 47571                                  	;MOV	FilPtrL,DX		; pointer to file
 47572 000081ED 8956F8                  	mov	[bp-8],dx
 47573                                  	;MOV	FilPtrH,DS
 47574 000081F0 8C5EFA                  	mov	[bp-6],ds
 47575                                  	;MOV	EndPtrH,DS		; seg pointer to end of dir
 47576 000081F3 8C5EFE                  	mov	[bp-2],ds
 47577 000081F6 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 47578 000081F7 07                      	POP	ES			; destination for nul search
 47579 000081F8 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX
 47580 000081FA 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI
 47581 000081FC F7D9                    	NEG	CX			; number of bytes remaining in segment
 47582                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 47583 000081FE 09C9                    	OR	CX,CX			;AN000;MS. cx=0 ? ds:dx on segment boundary
 47584 00008200 7501                    	JNZ	short okok		;AN000;MS. no
 47585                                  	;MOV	CX,-1			;AN000;MS.
 47586                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 47587                                  	; 17/12/2022
 47588 00008202 49                      	dec	cx  ; mov cx,-1
 47589                                  	;mov	cx,-1 ; 0FFFh
 47590                                  okok:					;AN000;
 47591 00008203 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX			;AN000;
 47592 00008205 F2AE                    	REPNZ	SCASB			;AN000;
 47593                                  					;AN000;
 47594 00008207 4F                      	DEC	DI			; point back to the null
 47595 00008208 268A45FF                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI-1]		; Get char before the NUL
 47596 0000820C E8EFDB                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; Is it a path separator?
 47597 0000820F 7403                    	JZ	short SETENDPTR		; Yes
 47598                                  STOREPTH:
 47599 00008211 B05C                    	MOV	AL,'\'
 47600 00008213 AA                      	STOSB				; Add a path separator (and INC DI)
 47601                                  SETENDPTR:
 47602                                  	;MOV	EndPtrL,DI		; pointer to the tail
 47603 00008214 8856FC                  	mov	[bp-4],dl
 47604                                  CreateLoop:
 47605 00008217 16                      	push	ss			; let ReadTime see variables
 47606 00008218 1F                      	pop	ds
 47607 00008219 55                      	push	bp
 47608 0000821A E86D89                  	call	READTIME		; go get time
 47609 0000821D 5D                      	pop	bp
 47610                                  ;
 47611                                  ; Time is in CX:DX. Go drop it into the string.
 47612                                  ;
 47613                                  	;les	di,EndPtr		; point to the string
 47614 0000821E C47EFC                  	les	di,[BP-4]
 47615 00008221 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 47616 00008223 E8A2FF                  	call	BinToAscii		; store upper word
 47617 00008226 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 47618 00008228 E89DFF                  	call	BinToAscii		; store lower word
 47619 0000822B 30C0                    	xor	al,al
 47620 0000822D AA                      	STOSB				; nul terminate
 47621                                  	;LDS	DX,FilPtr		; get name
 47622 0000822E C556F8                  	lds	dx,[bp-8]
 47623                                  	;MOV	CX,Attr 		; get attr
 47624 00008231 8B4EF6                  	mov	cx,[bp-10]
 47625 00008234 55                      	push	bp
 47626 00008235 E889FF                  	CALL	_$CreateNewFile		; try to create a new file
 47627 00008238 5D                      	pop	bp
 47628 00008239 732A                    	JNC	short CreateDone	; failed, go try again
 47629                                  
 47630                                  ; The operation failed and the error has been mapped in AX. Grab the extended
 47631                                  ; error and figure out what to do.
 47632                                  
 47633                                  	;; MSDOS 3.3			; M049 - start
 47634                                  ;;	mov	ax,[ss:EXTERR]				;smr;SS Override
 47635                                  ;;	cmp	al,error_file_exists
 47636                                  ;;	jz	short CreateLoop	; file existed => try with new name
 47637                                  ;;	cmp	al,error_access_denied
 47638                                  ;;	jz	short CreateLoop	; access denied (attr mismatch)
 47639                                  
 47640                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 47641                                  	;cmp	al,50h
 47642 0000823B 3C50                    	CMP	AL,error_file_exists	; Q: did file already exist
 47643 0000823D 74D8                    	JZ	short CreateLoop	; Y: try again
 47644                                  	;cmp	al,5
 47645 0000823F 3C05                    	CMP	AL,error_access_denied	; Q: was it access denied
 47646 00008241 7521                    	JNZ	short SETTMPERR		; N: Error out
 47647                                  					; Y: Check to see if we got this due
 47648                                  					;    to the network drive. Note that
 47649                                  					;    the redir will set the exterr
 47650                                  					;    to error_cannot_make if this is 
 47651                                  					;    so.
 47652                                  ; 15/03/2024
 47653                                  %if 0
 47654                                  	CMP	byte [SS:EXTERR],error_net_access_denied ; M069
 47655                                  					; See if it's REALLY an att mismatch
 47656                                  	je	short SETTMPERR		; no, network error, stop
 47657                                  ;M070
 47658                                  ; If the user failed on an I24, we do not want to try again
 47659                                  ;
 47660                                  	cmp	byte [SS:EXTERR],error_FAIL_I24 ;User failed on I24? ;M070
 47661                                  	;je	short SETTMPERR		;yes, do not try again ;M070
 47662                                  
 47663                                  	;jmp	short CreateLoop	;attr mismatch, try again ;M070
 47664                                  	; 17/12/2022
 47665                                  	jne	short CreateLoop ; 10/06/2019 
 47666                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 47667                                  	;jz	short SETTMPERR
 47668                                  	;jmp	short CreateLoop
 47669                                  %else
 47670                                  	; 15/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 47671                                  	;;;
 47672 00008243 36A0[2403]              	mov	al,[ss:EXTERR]
 47673 00008247 3C41                    	cmp	al,41h			; error_net_access_denied
 47674 00008249 7419                    	je	short SETTMPERR
 47675 0000824B 3C53                    	cmp	al,53h			; error_FAIL_I24
 47676 0000824D 7415                    	je	short SETTMPERR
 47677 0000824F 3C50                    	cmp	al,50h			; error_file_exists
 47678 00008251 74C4                    	je	short CreateLoop
 47679 00008253 36C43E[A205]            	les	di,[ss:THISCDS]
 47680 00008258 83FFFF                  	cmp	di,0FFFFh ; -1
 47681 0000825B 74BA                    	je	short CreateLoop	; No CDS
 47682                                  	;;test	word [es:di+43h],8000h
 47683                                  	;test	word [es:di+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 47684 0000825D 26F6454480              	test	byte [es:di+curdir.flags+1],(curdir_isnet>>8)
 47685 00008262 75B3                    	jnz	short CreateLoop
 47686                                  	;;;
 47687                                  %endif
 47688                                  
 47689                                  ;;	MOV	AL,error_access_denied	; Return this "extended" error
 47690                                  					; M049 - end
 47691                                  SETTMPERR:
 47692 00008264 F9                      	STC
 47693                                  CreateDone:

 47737                                  ;Break	<Extended_Open- Extended open the file>
 47738                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47739                                  ; Input: AL= 0 reserved  AH=6CH
 47740                                  ;	 BX= mode
 47741                                  ;	 CL= create attribute  CH=search attribute (from server)
 47742                                  ;	 DX= flag
 47743                                  ;	 DS:SI = file name
 47744                                  ;	 ES:DI = parm list
 47745                                  ;			   DD  SET EA list (-1) null
 47746                                  ;			   DW  n  parameters
 47747                                  ;			   DB  type (TTTTTTLL)
 47748                                  ;			   DW  IOMODE
 47749                                  ; Function: Extended Open
 47750                                  ; Output: carry clear
 47751                                  ;		     AX= handle
 47752                                  ;		     CX=1 file opened

 47980                                  ;BREAK <$LockOper - Lock Calls>
 47981                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47982                                  ;
 47983                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 47984                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle	       (DOS 3.3)
 47985                                  ;	    MOV     CX, OffsetHigh
 47986                                  ;	    MOV     DX, OffsetLow
 47987                                  ;	    MOV     SI, LengthHigh
 47988                                  ;	    MOV     DI, LengthLow
 47989                                  ;	    MOV     AH, LockOper
 47990                                  ;	    MOV     AL, Request
 47991                                  ;	    INT     21h
 47992                                  ;
 47993                                  ;   Error returns:
 47994                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 47995                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 47996                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 47997                                  ;
 47998                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 47999                                  ;	    MOV     AX, 5C??	       (DOS 4.00)
 48000                                  ;
 48001                                  ;				    0? lock all
 48002                                  ;				    8? lock write
 48003                                  ;				    ?2 lock multiple
 48004                                  ;				    ?3 unlock multiple
 48005                                  ;				    ?4 lock/read
 48006                                  ;				    ?5 write/unlock
 48007                                  ;				    ?6 add (lseek EOF/lock/write/unlock)
 48008                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle
 48009                                  ;	    MOV     CX, count or size
 48010                                  ;	    LDS     DX, buffer
 48011                                  ;	    INT     21h
 48012                                  ;
 48013                                  ;   Error returns:
 48014                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 48015                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 48016                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 48017                                  ;
 48018                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48019                                  
 48020                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 48021                                  
 48022                                  	; 17/03/2024
 48023                                  	; 16/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 48024

 48258                                  ; LOCK_CHECK

 48261                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48262                                  ; Inputs:
 48263                                  ;	Outputs of SETUP
 48264                                  ;	[USER_ID] Set
 48265                                  ;	[PROC_ID] Set
 48266                                  ; Function:
 48267                                  ;	Check for lock violations on local I/O
 48268                                  ;	Retries are attempted with sleeps in between
 48269                                  ; Outputs:
 48270                                  ;    Carry clear
 48271                                  ;	Operation is OK
 48272                                  ;    Carry set
 48273                                  ;	A lock violation detected
 48274                                  ; Outputs of SETUP preserved
 48275                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48276                                  
 48277                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 48281                                  LockRetry:
 48282 000083FC 53                      	push	bx		; save regs
 48283 000083FD 50                      	push	ax ; MSDOS 6.0
 48284                                  
 48285                                  	;MSDOS 3.3
 48286                                  	;Call	far [ss:JShare+(8*4)]	; 8 = chk_block
 48287                                  	;MSDOS 6.0
 48288 000083FE FF1E[B000]              	Call	far [JShare+(8*4)]	; 8 = chk_block
 48289                                  
 48290 00008402 58                      	pop	ax ; MSDOS 6.0
 48291 00008403 5B                      	pop	bx		; restrore regs
 48292 00008404 7307                    	jnc	short lc_ret_label ; There are no locks (retnc)
 48293                                  LockN:
 48294 00008406 E8DB93                  	call	Idle		; wait a while
 48295 00008409 4B                      	DEC	BX		; remember a retry
 48296 0000840A 75F0                    	JNZ	short LockRetry	; more retries left...
 48297 0000840C F9                      	STC
 48298                                  lc_ret_label:
 48299 0000840D C3                      	retn

 48390                                  ; SHARE_CHECK
 48391                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48392                                  ; Inputs:
 48393                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to filled in local file/device SFT for new
 48394                                  ;               instance of file sf_mode ALWAYS has mode (even on FCB SFTs)
 48395                                  ;       [WFP_START] has full path of name
 48396                                  ;       [USER_ID] Set
 48397                                  ;       [PROC_ID] Set
 48398                                  ; Function:
 48399                                  ;       Check for sharing violations on local file/device access
 48400                                  ; Outputs:
 48401                                  ;    Carry clear
 48402                                  ;       Sharing approved
 48403                                  ;    Carry set
 48404                                  ;       A sharing violation detected
 48405                                  ;           AX is error code
 48406                                  ; USES    ALL but DS
 48407                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48408                                  
 48409                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 48410                                  SHARE_CHECK:
 48411                                  	; 26/07/2019

 48413                                  shchk_retn:

 48415                                  
 48416                                  ; SHARE_VIOLATION
 48417                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48418                                  ; Inputs:
 48419                                  ;       [THISDPB] Set
 48420                                  ;       AX has error code
 48421                                  ; Function:
 48422                                  ;       Handle Sharing errors
 48423                                  ; Outputs:
 48424                                  ;       Carry set if user says FAIL, causes error_sharing_violation
 48425                                  ;       Carry clear if user wants a retry
 48426                                  ;
 48427                                  ; DS, ES, DI preserved, others destroyed
 48428                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48429                                  
 48430                                  	; 19/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 48431                                  
 48432                                  SHARE_VIOLATION:
 48433 00008460 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 48434 00008461 06                      	PUSH	ES
 48435 00008462 57                      	PUSH	DI
 48436                                  	; 19/03/2024
 48437 00008463 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx	; Retro DOS v5.0
 48438                                  	;
 48439                                  	;MOV	byte [READOP],0	; All share errors are reading
 48440 00008465 8816[7505]              	mov	[READOP],dl ; 0
 48441                                  	;		
 48442                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 48443 00008469 C606[4B03]18            	MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 48444 0000846E C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 48445 00008472 BF0100                  	MOV	DI,1			; Fake some registers
 48446 00008475 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI
 48447                                  	
 48448                                  	; 19/03/2024
 48449                                  	;;mov	dx,[es:bp+17]
 48450                                  	;MOV	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.DIR_SECTOR]
 48451

 48453                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 48454                                  	;;;
 48455                                   	;cmp	word [es:bp+0Fh],0
 48456 00008477 2639560F                	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],dx ; 0
 48457 0000847B 740A                    	jz	short sharev_1 ; FAT32
 48458                                  	; FAT16 or FAT12
 48459                                  	;mov	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 48460 0000847D 8916[0706]              	mov	[HIGH_SECTOR],dx ; 0
 48461                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+11h]

 48467 0000848B 8916[0706]              	mov	[HIGH_SECTOR],dx
 48468                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+29h]
 48469 0000848F 268B5629                	mov	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FCLUS_FSECTOR]
 48470                                  sharev_2: 
 48471                                  	;;;
 48472 00008493 E8D2DB                  	call	HARDERR
 48473 00008496 5F                      	POP	DI
 48474 00008497 07                      	POP	ES
 48475 00008498 1F                      	POP	DS
 48476 00008499 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1
 48477 0000849B 74C2                    	jz	short shchk_retn	; 1 = retry, carry clear

 48479 0000849E C3                      	retn
 48480                                  
 48481                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48482                                  ;   ShareEnd - terminate sharing info on a particular SFT/UID/PID. This does
 48483                                  ;       NOT perform a close, it merely asserts that the sharing information
 48484                                  ;       for the SFT/UID/PID may be safely released.
 48485                                  ;
 48486                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI points to an SFT
 48487                                  ;   Outputs:    None
 48488                                  ;   Registers modified: all except DS,ES,DI
 48489                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48490                                  
 48491                                  ShareEnd:
 48492                                  	; 26/07/2019
 48493 0000849F FF1E[9800]              	call	far [JShare+(2*4)]	; 2 = MFTClose
 48494 000084A3 C3                      	retn
 48495                                  
 48496                                  ;Break <ShareEnter - attempt to enter a node into the sharing set>
 48497                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48498                                  ;   ShareEnter - perform a retried entry of a nodde into the sharing set. If
 48499                                  ;   the max number of retries is exceeded, we notify the user via int 24.
 48500                                  ;
 48501                                  ;   Inputs:     ThisSFT points to the SFT
 48502                                  ;               WFP_Start points to the WFP
 48503                                  ;   Outputs:    Carry clear => successful entry
 48504                                  ;               Carry set => failed system call
 48505                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 48506                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48507                                  
 48508                                  ShareEnter:
 48509 000084A4 51                      	push	cx
 48510                                  retry:
 48511 000084A5 8B0E[1A00]              	mov     cx,[RetryCount]
 48512                                  attempt:
 48513 000084A9 C43E[9E05]              	les     di,[THISSFT]		; grab sft
 48514 000084AD 31C0                    	XOR     AX,AX
 48515                                   	;mov	[es:di+51],ax
 48516 000084AF 26894533                	MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_MFT],AX ; indicate free SFT
 48517 000084B3 51                      	push	cx
 48518 000084B4 E8A4FF                  	call    SHARE_CHECK             ; attempt to enter into the sharing set
 48519 000084B7 59                      	pop	cx
 48520 000084B8 730A                    	jnc	short done		; success, let the user see this
 48521 000084BA E82793                  	call	Idle                    ; wait a while
 48522 000084BD E2EA                    	loop    attempt                 ; go back for another attempt
 48523 000084BF E89EFF                  	call    SHARE_VIOLATION         ; signal the problem to the user
 48524 000084C2 73E1                    	jnc	short retry		; user said to retry, go do it
 48525                                  done:
 48526 000084C4 59                      	pop	cx
 48527 000084C5 C3                      	retn
 48528                                  
 48529                                  ;============================================================================
 48530                                  ; EXEPATCH.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 48531                                  ;============================================================================
 48532                                  ; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS 4.0
 48533                                  ; 20/03/2024 - Retro DOS 5.0
 48534                                  
 48535                                  ;** EXEPATCH.ASM 
 48536                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48537                                  ;	Contains the foll:
 48538                                  ;
 48539                                  ;		- code to find and overlay buggy unpack code
 48540                                  ;		- new code to be overlayed on buggy unpack code 
 48541                                  ;		- old code sequence to identify buggy unpack code
 48542                                  ;
 48543                                  ;	Revision history:
 48544                                  ;
 48545                                  ;		Created: 5/14/90
 48546                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48547                                  
 48548                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48549                                  ;
 48550                                  ; M020 : Fix for rational bug - for details see routine header
 48551                                  ; M028 : 4b04 implementation
 48552                                  ; M030 : Fixing bug in EXEPACKPATCH (EXEC_CS is an un-relocated value)
 48553                                  ; M032 : set turnoff bit only if DOS in HMA.
 48554                                  ; M033 : if IP < 2 then not exepacked.
 48555                                  ; M046 : support for a 4th version of exepacked files.
 48556                                  ; M068 : support for copy protected apps.
 48557                                  ; M071 : use A20OFF_COUNT of 10.
 48558                                  ;
 48559                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48560                                  
 48561                                  PATCH1_COM_OFFSET	EQU	06CH
 48562                                  PATCH1_OFFSET		EQU	028H
 48563                                  PATCH1_CHKSUM		EQU	0EF4EH
 48564                                  CHKSUM1_LEN		EQU	11CH/2 ; 142
 48565                                  
 48566                                  PATCH2_COM_OFFSET	EQU	076H
 48567                                  PATCH2_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 48568                                  
 48569                                  	; The strings that start at offset 076h have two possible 
 48570                                  	; check sums that are defined as PATCH2_CHKSUM PATCH2A_CHKSUM
 48571                                  
 48572                                  PATCH2_CHKSUM		EQU	78B2H
 48573                                  CHKSUM2_LEN		EQU	119H/2
 48574                                  PATCH2A_CHKSUM		EQU	1C47H		; M046
 48575                                  CHKSUM2A_LEN		EQU	103H/2		; M046
 48576                                  
 48577                                  PATCH3_COM_OFFSET	EQU	074H
 48578                                  PATCH3_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 48579                                  PATCH3_CHKSUM		EQU	4EDEH
 48580                                  CHKSUM3_LEN		EQU	117H/2
 48581                                  
 48582                                  ;**	Data structure passed for ExecReady call
 48583                                  ;
 48584                                  ;struc ERStruc
 48585                                  ; .ER_Reserved:	resw	1	; reserved, should be zero
 48586                                  ; .ER_Flags:	resw	1
 48587                                  ; .ER_ProgName:	resd	1	; ptr to ASCIIZ str of prog name
 48588                                  ; .ER_PSP:	resw	1	; PSP of the program
 48589                                  ; .ER_StartAddr: resd	1	; Start CS:IP of the program
 48590                                  ; .ER_ProgSize:	resd	1	; Program size including PSP
 48591                                  ; .size:
 48592                                  ;endstruc
 48593                                  
 48594                                  ;DOSCODE SEGMENT
 48595                                  
 48596                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 48597                                  	; DOSCODE:B3DDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 48598                                  
 48599                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 48600                                  	; DOSCODE:B37Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 48601                                  
 48602                                  	; 20/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 48603                                  	; DOSCODE:C697h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 48604                                  
 48605                                  ; M028 - BEGIN
 48606                                  
 48607                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48608                                  ;
 48609                                  ;	Procedure Name		: ExecReady
 48610                                  ;
 48611                                  ;	Input			: DS:DX -> ERStruc (see exe.inc)
 48612                                  ;
 48613                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48614                                  
 48615                                  ExecReady:
 48616 000084C6 89D6                    	mov	si,dx			; move the pointer into a friendly one
 48617                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 48618                                  	; 17/12/2022
 48619 000084C8 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 48620                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; COM or EXE ?
 48621 000084CC 7418                    	jz	short er_setver		; only setver for .COM files
 48622                                  
 48623                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 48624 000084CE 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 48625 000084D1 83C010                  	add	ax,10h
 48626 000084D4 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 48627                                  
 48628                                  	;mov	cx,[si+10]
 48629 000084D6 8B4C0A                  	mov	cx,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr]   ; M030
 48630                                  	;mov	ax,[si+12]	; 11/04/2024
 48631 000084D9 8B440C                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr+2] ; M030
 48632                                  
 48633                                  	;call	[ss:FixExePatch]
 48634 000084DC 36FF16[670D]            	call	word [ss:FixExePatch] ; 28/12/2022
 48635                                  	
 48636                                  	; 20/03/2024
 48637                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 48638 000084E1 36FF16[3E13]            	call	word [ss:Rational386PatchPtr]
 48639                                  
 48640                                  er_setver:
 48641                                  	;;test	word [si+2],2		; Q: is this an overlay
 48642                                  	; 17/12/2022
 48643 000084E6 F6440202                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY ; 2
 48644                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY
 48645 000084EA 7518                    	jnz	short er_chkdoshi	; Y: set A20OFF_COUNT if DOS high
 48646                                  					; N: set up lie version first
 48647 000084EC 1E                      	push	ds
 48648 000084ED 56                      	push	si
 48649                                  	;lds	si,[si+4]
 48650 000084EE C57404                  	lds	si,[si+ERStruc.ER_ProgName]
 48651 000084F1 E8D2EC                  	call	Scan_Execname1
 48652 000084F4 E8E3EC                  	call	Scan_Special_Entries
 48653 000084F7 5E                      	pop	si
 48654 000084F8 1F                      	pop	ds
 48655                                  	;mov	es,[si+8]
 48656 000084F9 8E4408                  	mov	es,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 48657 000084FC 36A1[BB0E]              	mov	ax,[ss:SPECIAL_VERSION]
 48658                                  	;mov	[es:40h],ax ; 11/04/2024
 48659 00008500 26A34000                	mov	[es:PDB.Version],ax
 48660                                  
 48661                                  er_chkdoshi:
 48662 00008504 36803E[660D]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DosHasHMA],0	; M032: Q: is dos in HMA (M021)
 48663 0000850A 741F                    	je	short er_done		; M032: N: done
 48664                                  
 48665                                  					; M068 - Start
 48666                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 48667 0000850C 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]	; ax = PSP
 48668                                  
 48669                                  	;or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],4
 48670 0000850F 36800E[8600]04          	or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],EXECA20OFF ; Set bit to signal int 21
 48671                                  					; ah = 25 & ah= 49. See dossym.inc 
 48672                                  					; under TAG M003 & M009 for 
 48673                                  					; explanation
 48674                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 48675                                  	; 17/12/2022
 48676 00008515 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 48677                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; Q: COM file
 48678 00008519 7507                    	jnz	short er_setA20		; N: inc a20off_count, set 
 48679                                  					;    a20off_psp and ret
 48680 0000851B 1E                         	push	ds
 48681 0000851C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; DS = load segment of com file.
 48682 0000851E E8AD05                  	call	IsCopyProt		; check if copy protected
 48683 00008521 1F                      	pop	ds
 48684                                  
 48685                                  er_setA20:
 48686                                  	; We need to inc the A20OFF_COUNT here. Note that if the count
 48687                                  	; is non-zero at this point it indicates that the A20 is to be 
 48688                                  	; turned off for that many int 21 calls made by the app. In 
 48689                                  	; addition the A20 has to be turned off when we exit from this 
 48690                                  	; call. Hence the inc.
 48691                                  
 48692 00008522 36FE06[8500]            	inc	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT]		
 48693 00008527 36A3[6300]              	mov	[ss:A20OFF_PSP],ax	; set the PSP for which A20 is to be
 48694                                  					; turned OFF.
 48695                                  er_done:				; M068 - End
 48696 0000852B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 48697 0000852D C3                      	retn
 48698                                  
 48699                                  ; M028 - END
 48700                                  
 48701                                  ; 20/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 48702                                  ;%if 1
 48703                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 48704                                  ;%if 0
 48705                                  
 48706                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48707                                  ;
 48708                                  ; procedure : Rational386Patch
 48709                                  ;
 48710                                  ; Older versions of the Rational DOS Extender have several bugs which trash
 48711                                  ; 386 registers (usually just the high word of 32 bit registers) during
 48712                                  ; interrupt processing. Lotus 123 3.1+ is a popular application that uses a
 48713                                  ; version of the Rational extender with the 32 bit register trashing bugs.
 48714                                  ;
 48715                                  ; This routine applies patches to the Rational DOS Extender to work around
 48716                                  ; most of the register trashing bugs.
 48717                                  ;
 48718                                  ; Note that there are additional register trashing bugs not fixed by these
 48719                                  ; patches. In particular, the high word of ESP and the FS and GS registers
 48720                                  ; may be modified on interrupts.
 48721                                  ;
 48722                                  ; There are two different Rational DOS Extender patchs in this module.
 48723                                  ; Rational386Patch is to correct 386 register trashing bugs on 386 or later
 48724                                  ; processors. This patch code is executed when MS-DOS is running on a 386
 48725                                  ; or later processor, regardless of whether MS-DOS is running in the HMA
 48726                                  ; or not.
 48727                                  ;
 48728                                  ; The other Rational patch routine (RationalPatch, below) fixes a register
 48729                                  ; trashing problem on 286 processors, and is only executed if MS-DOS is
 48730                                  ; running in the HMA.
 48731                                  ;
 48732                                  ; This patch detection and replacement is based on an example supplied by
 48733                                  ; Ben Williams at Rational.
 48734                                  ;
 48735                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48736                                  
 48737                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 48738                                  ; DOSCODE:B448h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 48739                                  
 48740                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48741                                  ;
 48742                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 48743                                  ;
 48744                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48745                                  
 48746                                  rpFind1:
 48747 0000852E FAE4216033C0E6438B-     	db	0FAh, 0E4h, 21h, 60h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 43h, 8Bh, 16h
 48747 00008537 16                 
 48748                                  
 48749                                  rpFind1Len equ	$ - rpFind1
 48750                                  
 48751                                  ;	cli
 48752                                  ;	in	al, 21h
 48753                                  ;	pusha
 48754                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 48755                                  ;	out	43h, al
 48756                                  ;	mov	dx, ...
 48757                                  
 48758                                  rpFind1a:
 48759 00008538 B00EE63733C0E6F2        	db	0B0h, 0Eh, 0E6h, 37h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 0F2h
 48760                                  
 48761                                  rpFind1aLen equ	$ - rpFind1a
 48762                                  
 48763                                  ;	mov	al, 0Eh
 48764                                  ;	out	37h, al
 48765                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 48766                                  ;	out	0F2h, al
 48767                                  
 48768                                  ; bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 48769                                  
 48770                                  rpFind2:
 48771 00008540 0F20C0                  	db	0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 48772

 48774                                  
 48775                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0	;may be preceeded by PUSH CX (51h)
 48776                                  
 48777                                  rpFind3:
 48778 00008543 0F22C0EA                	db	0Fh, 22h, 0C0h, 0EAh
 48779                                  
 48780                                  rpFind3Len equ	$ - rpFind3
 48781                                  
 48782                                  ;	mov	cr0, eax	;may be preceeded by POP CX (59h)
 48783                                  ;	jmp	far ptr xxx	;change far ptr to go to replace3
 48784                                  ;	mov	ss, bx		;8E D3 ... and come back at or after this
 48785                                  
 48786                                  ; note, there is no rpRepl1 string
 48787                                  
 48788                                  rpRepl2:
 48789 00008547 6650510F20C0             	db	66h, 50h, 51h, 0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 48790

 48792                                  
 48793                                  ;	push	eax
 48794                                  ;	push	cx
 48795                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0
 48796                                  
 48797                                  rpRepl3:
 48798 0000854D 8ED3596658              	db	8Eh, 0D3h, 59h, 66h, 58h
 48799                                  
 48800                                  rpRepl3Len equ	$ - rpRepl3
 48801                                  
 48802                                  ;	mov	ss, bx
 48803                                  ;	pop	cx
 48804                                  ;	pop	eax
 48805                                  
 48806                                  ; bug # 2 -- loss of high EAX and ESI on 386+ only if VCPI
 48807                                  
 48808                                  rpFind4:
 48809 00008552 93588BCC                	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 48810                                  
 48811                                  rpFind4Len equ	$ - rpFind4
 48812                                  
 48813                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 48814                                  ;	pop	ax
 48815                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 48816                                  
 48817                                  rpFind5:
 48818 00008556 B80CDECD678BE1FFE3      	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 0CDh, 67h, 8Bh, 0E1h, 0FFh, 0E3h
 48819                                  
 48820                                  rpFind5Len equ	$ - rpFind5
 48821                                  
 48822                                  ;	mov	ax, DE0Ch
 48823                                  ;	int	67h
 48824                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 48825                                  ;	jmp	bx
 48826                                  
 48827                                  rpRepl4:
 48828 0000855F 93588BCC                	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 48829 00008563 2E66A3                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 0A3h
 48830                                  
 48831                                  rpRepl4o1Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 48832                                  
 48833 00008566 0000                    	db	00h, 00h
 48834 00008568 2E668936                	db	02Eh, 066h, 89h, 36h
 48835

 48837                                  
 48838 0000856C 0000                    	db	00h, 00h
 48839                                  
 48840                                  rpRepl4Len equ	$ - rpRepl4
 48841                                  
 48842                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 48843                                  ;	pop	ax
 48844                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 48845                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], eax
 48846                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], esi
 48847

 48849 0000856E 8BE1                    	db	8Bh, 0E1h

 48851

 48853

 48867                                  ;	jmp	bx

 48884

 48895                                  ;	pop	bx

 48901                                  
 48902                                  ;	cli
 48903                                  ;	push	eax
 48904                                  ;	push	ebx

 48907

 48914                                  ;	pop	ecx
 48915                                  ;	pop	ebx

 48917                                  ;	pop	bx

 48926                                  ;	pusha

 48928                                  ;	push	ds

 48931

 48934                                  
 48935                                  rpFind9Len equ	$ - rpFind9
 48936                                  
 48937                                  ;	pop	ds
 48938                                  ;	pop	es
 48939                                  ;	popa
 48940

 48942 000085A7 6660061E                 	db	66h, 60h, 06h, 1Eh
 48943

 48945                                  
 48946                                  ;	pushad
 48947                                  ;	push	es
 48948                                  ;	push	ds
 48949

 48954                                  
 48955                                  ;	pop	ds
 48956                                  ;	pop	es
 48957                                  ;	popad
 48958                                  ;	retn			;no need to jmp back to main-line
 48959

 48962                                  struc SearchPair
 48963 00000000 ????                     .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 48964 00000002 ????                     .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 48965 00000004 ????                     .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 48966 00000006 ????                     .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 48967 00000008 ????                     .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 48968                                   .size:

 49009                                  struc StackVars
 49010 00000000 ????                     .sv_wVersion:	resw 1		; Rational extender version #
 49011 00000002 ????                     .sv_cbCodeSeg: resw 1		; code seg size to scan
 49012 00000004 ????                     .sv_pPatch:	resw 1		; offset of next avail patch byte
 49013                                   .size:

 49016                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49017                                  
 49018                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 49019                                  
 49020                                  Rational386Patch:
 49021                                  	; Do a few quick checks to see if this looks like a Rational
 49022                                  	; Extended application. Hopefully this will quickly weed out
 49023                                  	; most non Rational apps.
 49024                                  
 49025 000085D8 26813E00008B01          	cmp	word [es:0],395		; version number goes here - versions
 49026 000085DF 7322                    	jae	short rp3QuickOut	;   3.95+ don't need patching
 49027                                  
 49028 000085E1 26833E0C0020            	cmp	word [es:0Ch],20h	; always has this value here
 49029 000085E7 751A                    	jne	short rp3QuickOut
 49030                                  
 49031 000085E9 50                      	push	ax ; *
 49032                                  
 49033 000085EA B81800                  	mov	ax,18h 			; extender has 18h at
 49034 000085ED 2639061800              	cmp	[es:24],ax		;   offsets 24, 28, & 36
 49035 000085F2 750E                    	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 49036 000085F4 2639061C00              	cmp	[es:28],ax
 49037 000085F9 7507                    	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 49038 000085FB 2639062400              	cmp	[es:36],ax
 49039 00008600 7402                    	je	short rp3Maybe
 49040                                  rp3QO_ax:
 49041 00008602 58                      	pop	ax
 49042                                  rp3QuickOut:
 49043 00008603 C3                      	retn
 49044                                  
 49045                                  ; It might be the rational extender, do more extensive checking
 49046                                  
 49047                                  rp3Maybe:
 49048 00008604 FC                      	cld
 49049                                  
 49050                                  ; 20/03/2024
 49051                                  %if 0
 49052                                  	push	bx			; note ax pushed above
 49053                                  	push	cx
 49054                                  	push	dx
 49055                                  	push	si
 49056                                  	push	di
 49057                                  	push	es
 49058                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 49059                                  	push	bp
 49060                                  %else
 49061                                  	; 20/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 49062                                  	;;;
 49063 00008605 60                      	pusha
 49064 00008606 06                      	push	es
 49065 00008607 1E                      	push	ds
 49066                                  	;;;	
 49067                                  %endif
 49068 00008608 83EC06                  	sub	sp,StackVars.size  ; 6	; make space for stack variables
 49069 0000860B 89E5                    	mov	bp,sp
 49070                                  
 49071 0000860D 0E                      	push	cs
 49072 0000860E 1F                      	pop	ds
 49073                                  
 49074 0000860F 26A10000                	mov	ax,[es:0]		; save version #
 49075                                  	;mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],ax
 49076 00008613 894600                  	mov	[bp],ax	
 49077                                  					; check that binary version # matches
 49078 00008616 E89901                  	call	VerifyVersion		;   ascii string
 49079 00008619 7521                    	jne	short rp3Exit_j
 49080                                  
 49081                                  ; Looks like this is it, find where to put the patch code.  The
 49082                                  ; patch will be located on top of Rational code specific to 80286
 49083                                  ; processors, so these patchs MUST NOT be applied if running on
 49084                                  ; an 80286 system.
 49085                                  
 49086                                  	; Rational says the code to patch will never be beyond offset 46xxh
 49087                                  
 49088 0000861B B90045                  	mov	cx,4500h		; force search len to 4700h (searches
 49089                                  	;mov	[bp+2],cx
 49090 0000861E 894E02                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg],cx	; start at offset 200h)
 49091                                  
 49092 00008621 268E062000              	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=code segment
 49093                                  
 49094 00008626 BE[2E85]                	mov	si,rpFind1		; string to find
 49095 00008629 BA0A00                  	mov	dx,rpFind1Len ; 10	; length to match
 49096 0000862C E86B01                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq
 49097 0000862F 740E                    	jz	short rpGotPatch
