 49309                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49310                                  ;
 49311                                  ; FindBadCode
 49312                                  ;
 49313                                  ; Searches Rational code segment looking for a pair of find strings (all
 49314                                  ; patches have at least two find strings).
 49315                                  ;
 49316                                  ; Entry:
 49317                                  ;	ES    = code segment to search
 49318                                  ;	DS:BX = search pair structure for this search
 49319                                  ;	[bp].sv_cbCodeSeg = length of code seg to search
 49320                                  ;
 49321                                  ; Exit:
 49322                                  ;	CY flag clear if both strings found, and
 49323                                  ;	SI    = offset in ES of 1st string
 49324                                  ;	DI    = offset in ES of 2nd string
 49325                                  ;	CY set if either string not found, or strings too far apart
 49326                                  ;
 49327                                  ; Used:
 49328                                  ;	CX
 49329                                  ;
 49330                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49331                                  
 49332                                  ;struc SearchPair
 49333                                  ; .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 49334                                  ; .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 49335                                  ; .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 49336                                  ; .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 49337                                  ; .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 49338                                  ; .size:
 49339                                  ;endstruc
 49340                                  
 49341                                  FindBadCode:
 49342                                  	;mov	cx,[bp+2]
 49343 00008745 8B4E02                  	mov	cx,[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg]	; search length
 49344                                  
 49345 00008748 8B37                    	mov	si,[bx]	; mov si,[bx+0]
 49346                                  	;mov	si,[bx+Searchpair.sp_off1] ; ds:si -> search string
 49347                                  	
 49348                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+2]
 49349 0000874A 8B5702                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len1] ; dx = search len
 49350 0000874D E84A00                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 49351 00008750 751A                    	jnz	short fbc_error		; done if 1st not found
 49352                                  
 49353 00008752 57                      	push	di			; save 1st string offset
 49354                                  
 49355                                  	;mov	si,[bx+4]
 49356 00008753 8B7704                  	mov	si,[bx+SearchPair.sp_off2]
 49357                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+6]
 49358 00008756 8B5706                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len2]
 49359 00008759 E84100                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di		; don't change flags after this!
 49360                                  
 49361 0000875C 5E                      	pop	si			; restore 1st string offset
 49362 0000875D 750D                    	jnz	short fbc_error
 49363                                  
 49364 0000875F 89F8                    	mov	ax,di			; sanity check that
 49365 00008761 29F0                    	sub	ax,si			;   si < di && di - si <= allowed diff
 49366 00008763 7207                    	jc	short fbc_error
 49367                                  	;cmp	ax,[bx+8]
 49368 00008765 3B4708                  	cmp	ax,[bx+SearchPair.sp_diff]
 49369 00008768 7702                    	ja	short fbc_error
 49370                                  
 49371 0000876A F8                      	clc
 49372 0000876B C3                      	retn
 49373                                  
 49374                                  fbc_error:
 49375 0000876C F9                      	stc
 49376 0000876D C3                      	retn
 49377                                  
 49378                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49379                                  ;
 49380                                  ; GenPatch
 49381                                  ;
 49382                                  ; Generate a patch sequence. 1) insert a jump at the buggy code location
 49383                                  ; (jumps to the patch code area), 2) copy the selected patch code to the
 49384                                  ; patch area, 3) insert a jump from the patch area back to the main-line
 49385                                  ; code.
 49386                                  ;
 49387                                  ; Entry:
 49388                                  ;	ES:DI = start of buggy code to be patched
 49389                                  ;	DX    = length of buggy code to be patched
 49390                                  ;	DS:SI = replacement patch code
 49391                                  ;	CX    = length of replacement patch code
 49392                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 49393                                  ;
 49394                                  ; Exit:
 49395                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after generated patch code
 49396                                  ;
 49397                                  ; Used:
 49398                                  ;	AX, BX, SI, Flags
 49399                                  ;
 49400                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49401                                  
 49402                                  GenPatch:
 49403 0000876E 57                      	push	di			;save offset of buggy code
 49404                                  
 49405                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 49406 0000876F 8B5E04                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]
 49407                                  					;jump from buggy code to patch area
 49408 00008772 E81900                  	call	GenJump
 49409                                  
 49410 00008775 E80A00                  	call	CopyPatch		;copy replacement code to patch area
 49411                                  
 49412 00008778 5B                      	pop	bx			;offset of buggy code + buggy code
 49413 00008779 01D3                    	add	bx,dx			;  length = return from patch offset
 49414                                  
 49415 0000877B E81000                  	call	GenJump 		;jump from patch area back to main-
 49416                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 49417 0000877E 897E04                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di
 49418                                  					;  line code, update patch pointer
 49419 00008781 C3                      	retn
 49420                                  
 49421                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49422                                  ;
 49423                                  ; CopyPatch
 49424                                  ;
 49425                                  ; Copies patch code to patch location.
 49426                                  ;
 49427                                  ; Entry:
 49428                                  ;	DS:SI = patch code to be copied
 49429                                  ;	ES    = segment of code to patch
 49430                                  ;	CX    = length of code to copy
 49431                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 49432                                  ;
 49433                                  ; Exit:
 49434                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after copied patch code
 49435                                  ;
 49436                                  ; Used:
 49437                                  ;	SI, Flags
 49438                                  ;
 49439                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49440                                  
 49441                                  CopyPatch:
 49442 00008782 51                      	push	cx
 49443                                  	;mov	di,[bp+4]
 49444 00008783 8B7E04                  	mov	di,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch] ;patch pointer is the dest offset
 49445 00008786 FC                      	cld
 49446 00008787 F3A4                    	rep movsb
 49447 00008789 59                      	pop	cx
 49448                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 49449 0000878A 897E04                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di ;update net pointer location
 49450 0000878D C3                      	retn
 49451                                  
 49452                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49453                                  ;
 49454                                  ; GenJump
 49455                                  ;
 49456                                  ; Generates a rel16 JMP instruction at location 'from' to location 'to'.
 49457                                  ;
 49458                                  ; Entry:
 49459                                  ;	ES:DI = from location (where to put jmp instruction)
 49460                                  ;	BX    = to location (where to jump to)
 49461                                  ;
 49462                                  ; Exit:
 49463                                  ;	DI = byte after generated jump
 49464                                  ;
 49465                                  ; Used:
 49466                                  ;	AX
 49467                                  ;
 49468                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49469                                  
 49470                                  GenJump:
 49471 0000878E B0E9                    	mov	al,0E9h		; jmp rel16 opcode
 49472 00008790 AA                      	stosb
 49473                                  
 49474 00008791 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx		; calc offset to 'to' location
 49475 00008793 29F8                    	sub	ax,di
 49476 00008795 83E802                  	sub	ax,2
 49477                                  
 49478 00008798 AB                      	stosw			; output offset
 49479                                  
 49480 00008799 C3                      	retn
 49481                                  
 49482                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49483                                  ;
 49484                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 49485                                  ;
 49486                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 49487                                  ;
 49488                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 49489                                  ;
 49490                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49491                                  
 49492                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 49493 0000879A BF0002                  	mov	di,200h
 49494                                  ScanCodeSeq_di:
 49495 0000879D 51                      	push	cx
 49496 0000879E 29D1                    	sub	cx,dx
 49497 000087A0 41                      	inc	cx
 49498                                  scsagain:
 49499 000087A1 56                      	push	si
 49500 000087A2 57                      	push	di
 49501 000087A3 51                      	push	cx
 49502 000087A4 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 49503 000087A6 F3A6                    	rep	cmpsb
 49504 000087A8 59                      	pop	cx
 49505 000087A9 5F                      	pop	di
 49506 000087AA 5E                      	pop	si
 49507 000087AB 7403                    	je	short scsfound
 49508 000087AD 47                      	inc	di
 49509 000087AE E2F1                    	loop	scsagain
 49510                                  scsfound:
 49511 000087B0 59                      	pop	cx
 49512                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 49513 000087B1 C3                      	retn
 49514                                  	
 49515                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49516                                  ;
 49517                                  ; VerifyVersion
 49518                                  ;
 49519                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 49520                                  ; from ES:2A.
 49521                                  ;
 49522                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 49523                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 49524                                  ;
 49525                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49526                                  
 49527                                  VerifyVersion:
 49528 000087B2 268B362A00              	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 49529                                  					;  in ascii
 49530 000087B7 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 49531 000087B9 83C603                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 49532                                  
 49533 000087BC E80E00                  	call	VVDigit
 49534 000087BF 75F0                    	jne	short vvexit
 49535 000087C1 E80900                  	call	VVDigit
 49536 000087C4 75EB                    	jne	short vvexit
 49537 000087C6 26803C2E                	cmp	byte [es:si],'.'
 49538 000087CA 75E5                    	jne	short vvexit
 49539 000087CC 4E                      	dec	si
 49540                                  	;call	VVDigit
 49541                                  	; 18/12/2022
 49542                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 49543                                  ;vvexit:
 49544                                  	;retn
 49545                                  VVDigit:
 49546 000087CD F6F3                    	div	bl
 49547 000087CF 80C430                  	add	ah,'0'
 49548 000087D2 4E                      	dec	si
 49549 000087D3 26386401                	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 49550 000087D7 B400                    	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 49551 000087D9 C3                      	retn
 49552                                  
 49553                                  ; 20/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 49554                                  ;%endif
 49555

 49557                                  
 49558                                  ; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 49559                                  ; DOSCODE:B702h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 49560                                  
 49561                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 49562                                  ; DOSCODE:B3E0h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 49563                                  
 49564                                  exepatch_start:	 ; label byte
 49565

 49567                                  	; code.

 49577

 49583 000087EA B0FF                    	db  0B0h,0FFh 		;mov	al,0FFH

 49589

 49591

 49594                                  second: ; label	byte
 49595

 49822                                  	; 28/12/2022
 49823                                  	;jmp	short ExePackPatch
 49824                                  
 49825                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 49826                                  ;
 49827                                  ; Procedure Name 	: ExePackPatch
 49828                                  ;
 49829                                  ; Inputs	 	: DS 			-> DOSDATA
 49830                                  ;			  ES:0 			-> read in image
 49831                                  ;			  ax:cx = start cs:ip of program
 49832                                  ; Output		:		
 49833                                  ;
 49834                                  ;	1. If ES <= 0fffh
 49835                                  ;	   2. if exepack signature ('RB') found
 49836                                  ;	      3. if common code to patch compares (for 3 diff. versions)
 49837                                  ;	       	 4. if rest of the code & checksum compares
 49838                                  ;	  	    5. overlay buggy code with code in 
 49839                                  ;		       doscode:str1.
 49840                                  ;		 6. endif
 49841                                  ;	      7. endif
 49842                                  ;	   8. endif
 49843                                  ;	9. endif
 49844                                  ;
 49845                                  ;
 49846                                  ; Uses			: NONE
 49847                                  ;
 49848                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 49849                                  	
 49850                                  	; 21/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 49851                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 49852                                  	; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 49853                                  ExePackPatch:
 49854 00008933 53                      	push	bx
 49855 00008934 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; bx has load segment
 49856 00008936 81FBFF0F                	cmp	bx,0FFFh		; Q: is the load segment > 64K
 49857 0000893A 7602                    	jbe	short ep_cont		; N: 
 49858 0000893C 5B                      	pop	bx			; Y: no need to patch
 49859 0000893D C3                      	retn
 49860                                  ep_cont:
 49861 0000893E 1E                      	push	ds
 49862 0000893F 06                      	push	es
 49863 00008940 50                      	push	ax
 49864 00008941 51                      	push	cx
 49865 00008942 56                      	push	si
 49866 00008943 57                      	push	di
 49867                                  	
 49868                                  		; M033 - start
 49869                                  		; exepacked programs have an IP of 12h (>=2)
 49870                                  
 49871 00008944 83E902                  	sub	cx,2			; Q: is IP >=2
 49872 00008947 7303                    	jnb	short epp_1		; N: exit
 49873 00008949 E9B500                  	jmp	ep_notpacked
 49874                                  					; ax:cx now points to location of
 49875                                  					; 'RB' if this is an exepacked file.
 49876                                  		; M033 - end
 49877                                  epp_1:
 49878 0000894C 89CF                    	mov	di,cx
 49879 0000894E 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 49880 00008950 36893E[8700]            	mov	[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET],di	; save pointer to 'RB' in
 49881                                  					; unpack_offset
 49882                                  
 49883 00008955 26813D5242              	cmp	word [es:di],'RB' ; 4252h
 49884                                  	;ljne	ep_notpacked
 49885 0000895A 7403                    	je	short epp_2
 49886 0000895C E9A200                  	jmp	ep_notpacked
 49887                                  epp_2:
 49888 0000895F 0E                      	push	cs
 49889 00008960 1F                      	pop	ds			; set ds to cs
 49890                                  
 49891                                  	;add	di,6Ch
 49892 00008961 83C76C                  	add	di,PATCH1_COM_OFFSET	; es:di -> points to place in packed
 49893                                  					;          file where we hope to find
 49894                                  					;	   scan string. 
 49895                                  
 49896 00008964 E8A200                  	call	chk_common_str		; check for match
 49897                                  
 49898 00008967 7521                    	jnz	short ep_chkpatch2	; Q: does the patch match
 49899                                  					; N: check at patch2_offset
 49900                                  					; Y: check for rest of patch string
 49901 00008969 BE[4088]                	mov	si,scan_patch1
 49902                                  					; ds:si -> scan string 
 49903 0000896C 368B3E[8700]            	mov	di,[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET]	; restore di to point to 'RB'
 49904                                  
 49905                                  	;add	di,28h
 49906                                  	; 07/12/2022
 49907 00008971 83C728                  	add	di,PATCH1_OFFSET	; es:di -> points to place in packed
 49908                                  					;          file where we hope to find
 49909                                  					;	   scan string. 
 49910                                  	;;mov	cx,68
 49911                                  	;mov	cx,size_scan_patch1
 49912                                  	; 21/03/2024
 49913 00008974 B144                    	mov	cl,size_scan_patch1 ; 68
 49914                                  
 49915                                  	;mov	bx,142
 49916 00008976 BB8E00                  	mov	bx,CHKSUM1_LEN
 49917                                  	;mov	ax,0EF4Eh
 49918 00008979 B84EEF                  	mov	ax,PATCH1_CHKSUM
 49919 0000897C E89E00                  	call	chk_patchsum		; check if patch and chk sum compare
 49920 0000897F 7207                    	jc	short ep_done1		; Q: did we pass the test
 49921                                  					; N: exit
 49922                                  					; Y: overlay code with new 
 49923 00008981 BE[DA87]                	mov	si,str1
 49924                                  	;;mov	cx,102
 49925                                  	;mov	cx,size_str1
 49926                                  	; 21/03/2024
 49927 00008984 B166                    	mov	cl,size_str1 ; 102
 49928                                  
 49929 00008986 F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 49930                                  ep_done1:
 49931 00008988 EB77                    	jmp	short ep_done ; 21/03/2024
 49932                                  
 49933                                  ep_chkpatch2:
 49934                                  	;mov	di,76h
 49935 0000898A BF7600                  	mov	di,PATCH2_COM_OFFSET	; es:di -> possible location of patch
 49936                                  					; in another version of unpack
 49937 0000898D E87900                  	call	chk_common_str		; check for match
 49938                                  
 49939 00008990 753D                    	jnz	short ep_chkpatch3	; Q: does the patch match
 49940                                  					; N: check for patch3_offset
 49941                                  					; Y: check for rest of patch string
 49942                                  
 49943 00008992 BE[8488]                	mov	si,scan_patch2
 49944                                  					; ds:si -> scan string
 49945                                  	;mov	di,32h
 49946 00008995 BF3200                  	mov	di,PATCH2_OFFSET	; es:di -> points to place in packed
 49947                                  					;          file where we hope to find
 49948                                  	;;mov	cx,68			;	   scan string.
 49949                                  	;mov	cx,size_scan_patch2
 49950                                  	; 21/03/2024
 49951 00008998 B144                    	mov	cl,size_scan_patch2 ; 68
 49952                                  	;mov	bx,140
 49953 0000899A BB8C00                  	mov	bx,CHKSUM2_LEN
 49954                                  	;mov	ax,78B2h
 49955 0000899D B8B278                  	mov	ax,PATCH2_CHKSUM
 49956 000089A0 E87A00                  	call	chk_patchsum		; check if patch and chk sum compare
 49957                                  
 49958                                  					; M046 - Start
 49959                                  					; Q: did we pass the test
 49960 000089A3 7310                    	jnc	short ep_patchcode2	; Y: overlay code with new
 49961                                  					; N: try with a different chksum
 49962                                  
 49963 000089A5 BE[8488]                	mov	si,scan_patch2
 49964                                  					; ds:si -> scan string
 49965                                  	;;mov	cx,68
 49966                                  	;mov	cx,size_scan_patch2
 49967                                  	; 21/03/2024
 49968 000089A8 B144                    	mov	cl,size_scan_patch2 ; 68
 49969                                  	;mov	bx,129
 49970 000089AA BB8100                  	mov	bx,CHKSUM2A_LEN
 49971                                  	;mov	ax,1C47h
 49972 000089AD B8471C                  	mov	ax,PATCH2A_CHKSUM
 49973 000089B0 E86A00                  	call	chk_patchsum		; check if patch and chk sum compare
 49974                                  					; Q: did we pass the test
 49975 000089B3 724C                    	jc	short ep_notpacked	; N: try with a different chksum
 49976                                  					; Y: overlay code with new
 49977                                  						
 49978                                  ep_patchcode2:			       	; M046 - End
 49979 000089B5 BE[DA87]                	mov	si,str1

 50077                                  ; 	Procedure Name	: chk_common_str
 50078                                  ;
 50079                                  ;	Input		: DS = DOSCODE
 50080                                  ;			; ES:DI points to string in packed file
 50081                                  ;
 50082                                  ;	Output		; Z if match else NZ
 50083                                  ;
 50084                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50085                                  
 50086                                  	; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 50087                                  chk_common_str:
 50088 00008A09 BE[0A89]                	mov	si,scan_com
 50089                                  					; ds:si -> scan string 
 50090                                  	;mov	cx,32
 50091 00008A0C B92000                  	mov	cx,size_scan_com
 50092                                  
 50093 00008A0F F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb
 50094                                  
 50095                                  					; M046 - start
 50096                                  	; a fourth possible version of these exepacked programs have a
 50097                                  	; 056h instead of 06Bh. See scan_com above
 50098                                  	;
 50099                                  	; 	db  75h, 6Bh		;jne CorruptExe
 50100                                  	;
 50101                                  	; If the mismatch at this point is due to a 56h instead of 6Bh
 50102                                  	; we shall try to match the rest of the string
 50103                                  	;
 50104                                  
 50105 00008A11 7409                    	jz	short ccs_done
 50106 00008A13 26807DFF56              	cmp	byte [es:di-1],56h
 50107 00008A18 7502                    	jnz	short ccs_done

 50110                                  ccs_done:				; M046 - end
 50111 00008A1C C3                      	retn

 50113                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50114                                  ;
 50115                                  ;	Procedure Name	: chk_patchsum
 50116                                  ;
 50117                                  ;	Input		: DS:SI -> string we're looking for
 50118                                  ;			: ES:DI -> offset in packed file
 50119                                  ;			: CX 	= scan length
 50120                                  ;			: BX	= length of check sum
 50121                                  ;			: AX 	= value of check sum
 50122                                  ;
 50123                                  ;	Output		: if patch & check sum compare
 50124                                  ;				NC
 50125                                  ;			  else
 50126                                  ;				CY
 50127                                  ;
 50128                                  ;	Uses		: AX, BX, CX, SI
 50129                                  ;
 50130                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50131                                  
 50132                                  	; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 50133                                  chk_patchsum:
 50134 00008A1D 57                      	push	di
 50135                                  
 50136 00008A1E F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb
 50137                                  
 50138 00008A20 7518                    	jnz	short cp_fail		; Q: does the patch match
 50139                                  					; N: exit
 50140                                  					; Y:
 50141                                  
 50142                                  		; we do a check sum starting from the location of the
 50143                                  		; exepack signature 'RB' up to 11c/2 bytes, the end of the
 50144                                  		; unpacking code.
 50145                                  
 50146 00008A22 368B3E[8700]            	mov	di,[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET]	; di -> start of unpack code
 50147 00008A27 89D9                    	mov	cx,bx			; cx = length of check sum
 50148                                  
 50149 00008A29 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; save check sum passed to us in bx
 50150 00008A2B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 50151                                  ep_chksum:
 50152 00008A2D 260305                  	add	ax,[es:di]
 50153 00008A30 83C702                  	add	di,2
 50154 00008A33 E2F8                    	loop	ep_chksum
 50155                                  
 50156 00008A35 5F                      	pop	di			; restore di
 50157                                  
 50158 00008A36 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		 	; Q: does the check sum match
 50159                                  	;jne	short cp_fail		; N: exit
 50160                                  					; Y:
 50161                                  	; 25/09/2023
 50162                                  	;clc	
 50163                                  	;retn
 50164 00008A38 74E2                    	je	short ccs_done ; cf=0
 50165                                  	
 50166                                  cp_fail:
 50167 00008A3A F9                      	stc
 50168 00008A3B C3                      	retn

 50177                                  ; M020 : BEGIN
 50178                                  ;
 50179                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50180                                  ;
 50181                                  ; procedure : RationalPatch
 50182                                  ;
 50183                                  ; A routine (in Ration DOS extender) which is invoked at hardware interrupts
 50184                                  ; clobbers CX register on 286 machines. (123 release 3 uses Rational DOS
 50185                                  ; extender). This routine identifies Buggy Rational EXEs and fixes the bug.
 50186                                  ;
 50187                                  ; THE BUG is in the following code sequence:
 50188                                  ;
 50189                                  ;8b 0e 10 00	mov	cx, ds:[10h]		; delay count
 50190                                  ;90		even				; word align
 50191                                  ;e2 fe		loop	$			; wait		CLOBBERS CX
 50192                                  ;e8 xx xx	call	set_A20			; enable A20
 50193                                  ;
 50194                                  ; This patch routine replaces the mov & the loop with a far call into a
 50195                                  ; routine in DOS data segment which is in low memory (because A20 line
 50196                                  ; is off). The routine (RatBugCode) in DOS data saves & restores CX around
 50197                                  ; a mov & loop.
 50198                                  ;
 50199                                  ; Identification of Buggy Rational EXE
 50200                                  ; ====================================
 50201                                  ;
 50202                                  ; (ALL OFFSETS ARE IN THE PROGRAM SECTION - EXCLUDING THE EXE HEADER)
 50203                                  ;
 50204                                  ; OFFSET				Contains
 50205                                  ; ------				--------
 50206                                  ; 0000h			100 times Version number in binary
 50207                                  ;			bug exists in version 3.48 thru 3.83 (both inclusive)
 50208                                  ;
 50209                                  ; 000ah			the WORDS : 0000h, 0020h, 0000h, 0040h, 0001h
 50210                                  ;
 50211                                  ; 002ah			offset where version number is stored in ASCII
 50212                                  ;				e.g. '3.48A'
 50213                                  ;
 50214                                  ; 0030h			offset of copyright string. Copyright strings either
 50215                                  ;			start with "DOS/16M Copyright...." or
 50216                                  ;			"Copyright.....". The string contains
 50217                                  ;			"Rational Systems, Inc."
 50218                                  ;
 50219                                  ; 0020h			word : Paragraph offset of the buggy code segment
 50220                                  ;				from the program image
 50221                                  ; 0016h			word : size of buggy code segment
 50222                                  ;
 50223                                  ;	Buggy code is definite to start after offset 200h in its segment
 50224                                  ;
 50225                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50226                                  
 50227                                  ; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 50228                                  ; DOSCODE:B976h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 50229                                  
 50230                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 50231                                  ; DOSCODE:B654h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 50232                                  
 50233                                  RScanPattern1:
 50234 00008A3C 000020000000400001-     	db	0, 0, 20h, 0, 0, 0, 40h, 0, 1, 0
 50234 00008A45 00                 
 50235                                  
 50236                                  RLen1 equ $ - RScanPattern1
 50237                                  
 50238                                  RScanPattern2:
 50239 00008A46 8B0E100090E2FEE8        	db	8Bh, 0Eh, 10h, 00h, 90h, 0E2h, 0FEh, 0E8h
 50240                                  
 50241                                  RLen2 equ $ - RScanPattern2
 50242                                  
 50243                                  RScanPattern3:
 50244 00008A4E 8B0E1000E2FEE8          	db	8Bh, 0Eh, 10h, 00h, 0E2h, 0FEh, 0E8h
 50245                                  
 50246                                  RLen3 equ $ - RScanPattern2
 50247                                  
 50248                                  ; DOSCODE:B98Fh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 50249                                  ; DOSCODE:B66Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 50250                                  
 50251                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50252                                  ;
 50253                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 50254                                  ;
 50255                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50256                                  
 50257                                  	; 21/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50258                                  	; DOSCODE:CC2Fh (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50259                                  
 50260                                  RationalPatch:
 50261 00008A55 FC                      	cld
 50262                                  
 50263                                  ; 21/03/2024
 50264                                  %if 0
 50265                                  	push	ax
 50266                                  	push	bx
 50267                                  	push	cx
 50268                                  	push	dx
 50269                                  	push	si
 50270                                  	push	di
 50271                                  %else
 50272                                  	; 21/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50273                                  	;;;
 50274 00008A56 60                      	pusha
 50275                                  	;;;
 50276                                  %endif
 50277 00008A57 06                      	push	es
 50278 00008A58 1E                      	push	ds			; we use all of them
 50279 00008A59 BF0A00                  	mov	di,0Ah			; look for pat1 at offset 0Ah
 50280 00008A5C 0E                      	push	cs
 50281 00008A5D 1F                      	pop	ds
 50282                                  	
 50283 00008A5E BE[3C8A]                	mov	si,RScanPattern1
 50284                                  	;mov	cx,10
 50285 00008A61 B90A00                  	mov	cx,RLen1
 50286 00008A64 F3A6                    	rep	cmpsb			; do we have the pattern ?
 50287 00008A66 754A                    	jne	short rpexit
 50288 00008A68 26A10000                	mov	ax,[es:0]
 50289 00008A6C 3D5C01                  	cmp	ax,348			; is it a buggy version ?
 50290 00008A6F 7241                    	jb	short rpexit
 50291 00008A71 3D7F01                  	cmp	ax,383			; is it a buggy version ?
 50292 00008A74 773C                    	ja	short rpexit
 50293                                  
 50294 00008A76 E839FD                  	call	VerifyVersion
 50295 00008A79 7537                    	jne	short rpexit
 50296                                  
 50297 00008A7B 268B0E1600              	mov	cx,[es:16h]		; Length of buggy code seg
 50298 00008A80 81E90002                	sub	cx,200h			; Length we search (we start
 50299                                  					;  at offset 200h)
 50300 00008A84 268E062000              	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=buggy code segment
 50301 00008A89 BE[468A]                	mov	si,RScanPattern2
 50302                                  	;mov	dx,8	
 50303 00008A8C BA0800                  	mov	dx,RLen2
 50304 00008A8F E808FD                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq with nop
 50305 00008A92 740B                    	jz	short rpfound
 50306                                  
 50307 00008A94 BE[4E8A]                	mov	si,RScanPattern3
 50308                                  	;mov	dx,15
 50309 00008A97 BA0F00                  	mov	dx,RLen3
 50310 00008A9A E8FDFC                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq w/o nop
 50311 00008A9D 7513                    	jnz	short rpexit
 50312                                  
 50313                                  rpfound:
 50314                                  	
 50315                                  ;	we set up a far call into DOS data
 50316                                  ;	dx has the length of the code seq we were searching for
 50317                                  
 50318 00008A9F B09A                    	mov	al,9Ah			; far call opcode
 50319 00008AA1 AA                      	stosb
 50320 00008AA2 B8[2611]                	mov	ax,RatBugCode
 50321 00008AA5 AB                      	stosw
 50322 00008AA6 8CD0                    	mov	ax,ss
 50323 00008AA8 AB                      	stosw
 50324 00008AA9 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 50325 00008AAB 83E906                  	sub	cx,6			; filler (with NOPs)
 50326 00008AAE B090                    	mov	al,90h
 50327 00008AB0 F3AA                    	rep	stosb
 50328                                  rpexit:
 50329 00008AB2 1F                      	pop	ds
 50330 00008AB3 07                      	pop	es
 50331                                  
 50332                                  ; 21/03/2024
 50333                                  %if 0
 50334                                  	pop	di
 50335                                  	pop	si
 50336                                  	pop	dx
 50337                                  	pop	cx
 50338                                  	pop	bx
 50339                                  	pop	ax
 50340                                  %else
 50341                                  	; 21/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50342                                  	;;;
 50343 00008AB4 61                      	popa
 50344                                  	;;;
 50345                                  %endif
 50346 00008AB5 C3                      	retn
 50347                                  
 50348                                  ; M020 END

 50355                                  ;
 50356                                  ;	M068
 50357                                  ;
 50358                                  ; 	Procedure Name	: IsCopyProt
 50359                                  ;
 50360                                  ;	Inputs		: DS:100 -> start of com file just read in
 50361                                  ;
 50362                                  ;	Outputs		: sets the A20OFF_COUNT variable to 10 if 
 50363                                  ;			  the program loaded in DS:100 uses a MICROSOFT
 50364                                  ;			  copy protect scheme that relies on the A20 line
 50365                                  ;			  being turned off for it's scheme to work.
 50366                                  ;
 50367                                  ;			  Note: The int 21 function dispatcher will turn 
 50368                                  ;				a20 off, if the A20OFF_COUNT is non-zero 
 50369                                  ;				and dec the A20OFF_COUNT before	iretting 
 50370                                  ;				to the user. 
 50371                                  ;
 50372                                  ;	Uses		: ES, DI, SI, CX
 50373                                  ;
 50374                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50375                                  
 50376                                  ; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 50377                                  
 50378                                  CPStartOffset	EQU	0175h
 50379                                  CPID1Offset	EQU	011Bh
 50380                                  CPID2Offset	EQU	0173h
 50381                                  CPID3Offset	EQU	0146h
 50382                                  CPID4Offset	EQU	0124h
 50383                                  ID1		EQU	05343h
 50384                                  ID2		EQU	05044h
 50385                                  ID3		EQU	0F413h
 50386                                  ID4		EQU	08000h
 50387                                  
 50388                                  ; DOSCODE:B9FAh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 50389                                  
 50390                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 50391                                  ; DOSCODE:B71Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 50392                                  
 50393                                  ; 21/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50394                                  ; DOSCODE:CC90h (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50395                                  
 50396                                  CPScanPattern:
 50397 00008AB6 89264801                	db	89h,26h,48h,01h		 ; mov [148],sp
 50398 00008ABA 8C0E4C01                	db	8Ch,0Eh,4Ch,01h		 ; mov [14C],cs
 50399 00008ABE C7064A010001            	db	0C7h,06h,4Ah,01h,00h,01h ; mov [14A],100h 
 50400 00008AC4 8C0E1301                	db 	8Ch,0Eh,13h,01h		 ; mov [113],cs
 50401 00008AC8 B82001                  	db	0B8h,20h,01h		 ; mov ax,120h
 50402 00008ACB BE0001                  	db	0BEh,00h,01h		 ; mov si,100h
 50403                                  
 50404                                  CPSPlen	EQU $ - CPScanPattern
 50405                                  
 50406                                  ; DOSCODE:BA12h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 50407                                  ; DOSCODE:B734h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 50408                                  ; 21/03/2024
 50409                                  ; DOSCODE:CCA8h (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50410                                  
 50411                                  IsCopyProt:
 50412 00008ACE 813E1B014353            	cmp	word [CPID1Offset],ID1
 50413 00008AD4 752D                    	jne	short CP_done
 50414                                  
 50415 00008AD6 813E73014450            	cmp	word [CPID2Offset],ID2
 50416 00008ADC 7525                    	jne	short CP_done
 50417                                  
 50418 00008ADE 813E460113F4            	cmp	word [CPID3Offset],ID3
 50419 00008AE4 751D                    	jne	short CP_done
 50420                                  
 50421 00008AE6 813E24010080            	cmp	word [CPID4Offset],ID4
 50422 00008AEC 7515                    	jne	short CP_done
 50423                                  
 50424 00008AEE 0E                      	push	cs
 50425 00008AEF 07                      	pop	es
 50426 00008AF0 BF[B68A]                	mov	di,CPScanPattern	; es:di -> Pattern to find
 50427                                  
 50428 00008AF3 BE7501                  	mov	si,CPStartOffset	; ds:si -> possible location 
 50429                                  					; of pattern
 50430                                  
 50431 00008AF6 B91800                  	mov	cx,CPSPlen ; 24		; cx = length of pattern
 50432 00008AF9 F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb
 50433 00008AFB 7506                    	jnz	short CP_done
 50434                                  
 50435 00008AFD 36C606[8500]0A          	mov	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT],0Ah ; M071
 50436                                  CP_done:
 50437 00008B03 C3                      	retn
 50438

 50498                                  %if 1
 50499                                  ; 28/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.1
 50500                                  ;%if 0
 50501                                  
 50502                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50503                                  ;
 50504                                  ; Procedure Name : WhatCPUType
 50505                                  ;
 50506                                  ; Inputs	 : none
 50507                                  ;
 50508                                  ; Outputs	 : AL = 0 if CPU <  286
 50509                                  ;		      = 1 if CPU == 286
 50510                                  ;		      = 2 if CPU >= 386
 50511                                  ;
 50512                                  ; Regs. Mod.	 : AX
 50513                                  ;
 50514                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50515                                  
 50516                                  WhatCPUType:
 50517                                  	; 25/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 50518                                  	;get_cpu_type	; done with a MACRO which can't be generated > once
 50519                                  
 50520                                  	;CPUTYPE.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 50521                                  
 50522                                  ; Note: this must be a macro, and not a subroutine in the BIOS since
 50523                                  ; 	it is called from both CODE and SYSINITSEG.
 50524                                  ;
 50525                                  ;------GET_CPU_TYPE-----------------------------------May, 88 by M.Williamson
 50526                                  ;  Returns: AX = 0 if 8086 or 8088
 50527                                  ;              = 1 if 80286
 50528                                  ;              = 2 if 80386
 50529                                  
 50530                                  	; 04/11/2022
 50531                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BB03h
 50532                                  
 50533                                  	; 22/03/2024
 50534                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0CCEDh
 50535                                  
 50536                                  Get_CPU_Type:	;macro
 50537 00008B13 9C                      	pushf
 50538 00008B14 53                      	push	bx			; preserve bx
 50539 00008B15 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; init bx to zero
 50540                                  
 50541 00008B17 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; 0000 into AX
 50542 00008B19 50                      	push	ax			; put it on the stack...
 50543 00008B1A 9D                      	popf				; ...then shove it into the flags
 50544 00008B1B 9C                      	pushf				; get it back out of the flags...
 50545 00008B1C 58                      	pop	ax			; ...and into ax
 50546 00008B1D 2500F0                  	and	ax,0F000h		; mask off high four bits
 50547 00008B20 3D00F0                  	cmp	ax,0F000h		; was it all 1's?
 50548 00008B23 740E                    	je	short cpu_8086		; aye; it's an 8086 or 8088
 50549                                  
 50550 00008B25 B800F0                  	mov	ax,0F000h		; now try to set the high four bits..
 50551 00008B28 50                      	push	ax
 50552 00008B29 9D                      	popf
 50553 00008B2A 9C                      	pushf
 50554 00008B2B 58                      	pop	ax			; ...and see what happens
 50555 00008B2C 2500F0                  	and	ax,0F000h		; any high bits set ?
 50556 00008B2F 7401                    	jz	short cpu_286		; nay; it's an 80286
 50557                                  
 50558                                  cpu_386:				; bx starts as zero
 50559 00008B31 43                      	inc	bx			; inc twice if 386
 50560                                  cpu_286:				; just inc once if 286
 50561 00008B32 43                      	inc	bx
 50562                                  cpu_8086:				; don't inc at all if 086
 50563 00008B33 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; put CPU type value in ax
 50564 00008B35 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore original bx
 50565 00008B36 9D                      	popf
 50566                                  	
 50567                                  	;endm
 50568                                  
 50569                                  	; 04/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 50570 00008B37 C3                      	retn	; 19/09/2023
 50571                                  
 50572                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50573                                  %endif	; 28/12/2022
 50574                                  
 50575                                  ;============================================================================
 50576                                  
 50577                                  ; MAIN ENTRY FOR DOS INITIALIZATION
 50578                                  
 50579                                  	; 05/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 50580                                  	; DOSCODE:B779h (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 50581                                  
 50582                                  	; 23/03/2024
 50583                                  	; 22/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50584                                  	; DOSCODE:CCEDh (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50585                                  
 50586                                  	; DOSCODE:BA57h (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS)
 50587                                  	; BIOSCODE:CF81h (Windows ME IO.SYS)
 50588                                  	
 50589                                  	; 30/05/2019
 50590                                  	; 22/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 50591                                  	; 07/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 50592                                  	; Retro DOS v2.0 - 03/03/2018
 50593                                  	; 03/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 50594                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 - MSDOS.SYS, offset 79A9h
 50595                                  DOSINIT:
 50596                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 - MSDOS.SYS, offset 7C77h
 50597                                  	;
 50598                                  	; Far call from SYSINIT
 50599                                  	; DX = Memory size in paragraphs
 50600                                  	; DS:SI = [DEVICE_LIST] (SYSINIT.S) 
 50601                                  	;	  (Retro DOS v2.0, 16/03/2018)
 50602                                  	;
 50603                                  	; ES:DI = ptr to BIOS communication block (sysinit3.s)
 50604                                  	;	  (Retro DOS v4.0, 20/04/2019)
 50605                                  
 50606 00008B38 FA                              CLI
 50607 00008B39 FC                              CLD
 50608                                  
 50609                                  	; 03/11/2022
 50610                                  	;push	dx ; 30/05/2019		; save parameters from BIOS
 50611

 50614                                  	;push	dx ; =*=		; save parameters from BIOS
 50615                                  	
 50616 00008B3A 56                      	push	si

 50619

 50623

 50651                                  					;  BData segment. Cannot use
 50652                                  					;  getdseg macro here!!!

 50657

 50660

 51506                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 51507                                  ;
 51508                                  ;	check_XMM: routine to check presence of XMM driver
 51509                                  ;
 51510                                  ;	Exit:   Sets up the XMM entry point in XMMcontrol in DOSDATA
 51511                                  ;
 51512                                  ;	USED:	none
 51513                                  ;
 51514                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 51515                                  
 51516                                  check_XMM: ; proc near
 51517                                  ;
 51518                                  ; determine whether or not an XMM driver is installed
 51519                                  ;
 51520 00008E5B 50                      	push	ax
 51521                                  	;mov	ax,(XMM_MULTIPLEX<<8)+XMM_INSTALL_CHECK
 51522 00008E5C B80043                  	mov	ax,4300h
 51523 00008E5F CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 51524                                  		; - Multiplex - XMS - INSTALLATION CHECK
 51525                                  		; Return: AL = 80h XMS driver installed
 51526                                  		; AL <> 80h no driver
 51527 00008E61 3C80                    	cmp	al,80h			; Q: installed
 51528 00008E63 751D                    	jne	short cXMM_no_driver	; N: set error, quit
 51529                                  ;
 51530                                  ; get the XMM control functions entry point, save it, we
 51531                                  ; need to call it later.
 51532                                  ;
 51533 00008E65 53                      	push	bx
 51534 00008E66 52                      	push	dx
 51535 00008E67 1E                      	push	ds
 51536 00008E68 06                      	push	es
 51537                                  	;mov	ax,(XMM_MULTIPLEX<<8)+XMM_FUNCTION_ADDR
 51538 00008E69 B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 51539 00008E6C CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 51540                                  		; - Multiplex - XMS - GET DRIVER ADDRESS
 51541                                  		; Return: ES:BX -> driver entry point
 51542                                  
 51543 00008E6E 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 51544                                  
 51545 00008E73 891E[7B10]              	mov	[XMMcontrol],bx
 51546 00008E77 8C06[7D10]              	mov	[XMMcontrol+2],es
 51547                                  cXMMexit:
 51548 00008E7B F8                      	clc
 51549 00008E7C 07                      	pop	es
 51550 00008E7D 1F                      	pop	ds
 51551 00008E7E 5A                      	pop	dx
 51552 00008E7F 5B                      	pop	bx
 51553 00008E80 58                      	pop	ax
 51554 00008E81 C3                      	retn				; done
 51555                                  ;
 51556                                  ; set carry if XMM driver not present
 51557                                  ;
 51558                                  cXMM_no_driver:
 51559 00008E82 F9                      	stc
 51560 00008E83 58                      	pop	ax
 51561 00008E84 C3                      	retn

 51563                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 51564                                  ;
 51565                                  ; Procedure Name : seg_reinit
 51566                                  ;
 51567                                  ; Inputs	 : ES has final dos code location
 51568                                  ;		   AX = 0 / 1
 51569                                  ;
 51570                                  ; Outputs	 : Patch in the sharer and other tables with seg in ES
 51571                                  ;		   if AX =0
 51572                                  ;		      if first entry
 51573                                  ;			 patch segment & offset of vectors with stub
 51574                                  ;			 and stub with segment in ES
 51575                                  ;		      else
 51576                                  ;			 patch stub with segment in ES
 51577                                  ;
 51578                                  ;		   else if AX = 1
 51579                                  ;			patch segment of vectors with segment in ES
 51580                                  ;
 51581                                  ; NOTE		 : This routine can be called at most twice!
 51582                                  ;
 51583                                  ; Regs Mod.	 : es, ax, di, cx, bx
 51584                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 51585                                  
 51586 00008E85 00                      num_entry: db	0		; keeps track of the # of times this routine
 51587                                  				; has been called. (0 or 1)
 51588                                  
 51589                                  	; 04/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (ref: MSDOS 5.0)
 51590                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BAB7h
 51591                                  	; 25/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 (ref: MSDOS 6.21)
 51592                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BDA5h
 51593                                  
 51594                                  	; 23/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (ref: PCDOS 7.1)
 51595                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0D07Eh
 51596                                  
 51597                                  seg_reinit:	; proc	far
 51598 00008E86 1E                      	push	ds
 51599                                  
 51600 00008E87 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 51601                                  
 51602 00008E8C E89300                  	call	patch_misc_segments	; patch in segments for sharer and 
 51603                                  					; other tables with seg in ES.
 51604                                  	
 51605                                  	; 17/12/2022
 51606                                  	; cx = 0
 51607 00008E8F 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx ; 0
 51608                                  	;cmp	ax,0
 51609 00008E91 754A                    	jne	short patch_vec_seg	; patch vectors with segment in es
 51610                                  	; 23/03/2024
 51611                                  	;or	ax, ax
 51612                                  	;jnz	short patch_vec_seg
 51613                                  
 51614                                  	; 23/03/2024
 51615                                  	;cmp	[cs:num_entry],al ; 0
 51616                                  	; 17/12/2022
 51617 00008E93 2E380E[858E]            	cmp	[cs:num_entry],cl ; 0
 51618                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:num_entry],0	; Q: is it the first call to this
 51619 00008E98 7508                    	jne	short second_entry	; N: just patch the stub with 
 51620                                  					;    segment in ES
 51621                                  					; Y: patch the vectors with stub
 51622 00008E9A 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 51623 00008E9C E84B00                  	call	patch_vec_segments	; patch the segment of vectors
 51624 00008E9F E8CA00                  	call	patch_offset		; patch the offsets of vectors
 51625                                  					; with those in the stub.
 51626                                  	; 17/12/2022
 51627                                  	; cx = 0
 51628                                  second_entry:
 51629 00008EA2 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es			; patch the stub with segment in es
 51630                                  
 51631                                  	;mov	di,OFFSET DOSDATA:DOSINTTABLE
 51632                                  	;;mov	di,1062h	; (same table addr for MSDOS 5.0 and MSDOS 6.21)
 51633                                  	;mov	di,0F7Ah ; 23/03/2024 ; PCDOS 7.1
 51634 00008EA4 BF[7A0F]                	mov	di,DOSINTTABLE
 51635                                  	
 51636                                  	; 17/12/2022
 51637                                  	; cx = 0
 51638                                  	;;mov	cx,9
 51639                                  	;mov	cl,9
 51640                                  	; 23/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 51641                                  	;;;
 51642                                  	;mov	cx,8
 51643 00008EA7 B108                    	mov	cl,8
 51644                                  	;;;
 51645 00008EA9 1E                      	push	ds			
 51646 00008EAA 07                      	pop	es			; es:di -> DOSINTTABLE
 51647                                  
 51648                                  dosinttabloop:
 51649                                  	;add	di,2
 51650                                  	; 19/06/2023
 51651 00008EAB 47                      	inc	di
 51652 00008EAC 47                      	inc	di
 51653 00008EAD AB                      	stosw
 51654 00008EAE E2FB                    	loop	dosinttabloop	
 51655                                  
 51656                                  ; For ROMDOS, this routine will only be called when the DOS wants to
 51657                                  ; use the HMA, so we don't want to check CS
 51658                                  
 51659                                  ;ifndef ROMDOS

 51678                                  					; M068: set pointer to the routine 
 51679                                  					; M068: that detects copy protected
 51680                                  					; M068: apps
 51681                                  	;mov	[ChkCopyProt],offset DOSCODE:IsCopyProt
 51682 00008EC8 C706[6100][CE8A]        	mov	word [ChkCopyProt],IsCopyProt
 51683                                  
 51684                                  	; 23/03/2024 - PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0D0C7h
 51685                                  	;	      (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BDF1h)
 51686 00008ECE E842FC                  	call	WhatCPUType
 51687 00008ED1 3C01                    	cmp	al,1
 51688 00008ED3 750D                    	jne	short sr_done	; we need Rational Patch only on 286 systems
 51689 00008ED5 C706[690D][558A]        	mov	word [RationalPatchPtr],RationalPatch
 51690                                  
 51691                                  	; 19/09/2023
 51692 00008EDB EB05                    	jmp	short sr_done
 51693                                  
 51694                                  	; 23/03/2024
 51695                                  patch_vec_seg:				; patch vectors with segment in es
 51696 00008EDD 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 51697 00008EDF E80800                  	call	patch_vec_segments	; patch in DOSCODE for the segments
 51698                                  					; NOTE we don't have to patch the 
 51699                                  					; offsets as they have been already
 51700                                  					; set to the doscode offsets at
 51701                                  					; DOSINIT.
 51702                                  sr_done:
 51703 00008EE2 2EC606[858E]01          	mov	byte [cs:num_entry],1
 51704 00008EE8 1F                      	pop	ds
 51705 00008EE9 CB                      	retf	; ! far return !

 51707                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 51708                                  ;
 51709                                  ; Procedure Name : patch_vec_segments
 51710                                  ;
 51711                                  ; Inputs	 : ax -> has segment address to patch in
 51712                                  ;		   ds -> DOSDATA
 51713                                  ;
 51714                                  ; Outputs	 : Patches in AX as the segment for the following vectors:
 51715                                  ;			
 51716                                  ;			0,20-28,3a-3f
 51717                                  ;
 51718                                  ; Regs. Mod.	 : DI,CX,DX,AX

 51720                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 51721

 51723

 51731

 51733                                  
 51734                                  					; set vectors 20h & 21h
 51735                                  	; 04/11/2022

 51738                                  	;mov	cl,2

 51746                                  
 51747                                  	; 17/12/2022

 51822                                  ;		   with right dos code segment in es

 51840

 51845                                  	;mov	bx,[0AA3h] ; 23/03/2024 ; PCDOS 7.1 
 51846 00008F2C 8B1E[A30A]              	mov	bx,[TEMP_DOSLOC]	; bx = location to which the share
 51847                                  					; table was patched during the first
 51848                                  					; call to this routine
 51849 00008F30 B90F00                  	mov	cx,15
 51850                                  jumptabloop:

 51864                                  					; BUGBUG patching the country info

 52057                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 52058                                  ;
 52059                                  ; 	Procedure Name	:	patch_in_nops
 52060                                  ;
 52061                                  ; 	Entry		: 	ES -> DOSDATA
 52062                                  ;
 52063                                  ;	Regs Mod	: 	cx, di
 52064                                  ;
 52065                                  ;	Description:
 52066                                  ;		This routine patches in 2 nops at the offsets specified in 
 52067                                  ;	patch_table. This basically enables the low mem stub to start 
 52068                                  ;	making XMS calls.
 52069                                  ;
 52070                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 52071                                  
 52072                                  	; 04/11/2022
 52073                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BC50h
 52074                                  
 52075                                  	; 23/03/2024
 52076                                  	; MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BF42h
 52077                                  	; 23/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 52078                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0D1E9h
 52079                                  
 52080                                  patch_table:	; label	byte
 52081                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i0patch
 52082                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i20patch
 52083                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i21patch
 52084                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i25patch
 52085                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i26patch
 52086                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i27patch
 52087                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i2fpatch
 52088                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:cpmpatch
 52089 00008FD7 [9E0F]                  	dw	i0patch
 52090 00008FD9 [A80F]                  	dw	i20patch
 52091 00008FDB [B20F]                  	dw	i21patch
 52092 00008FDD [BC0F]                  	dw	i25patch
 52093 00008FDF [C60F]                  	dw	i26patch
 52094 00008FE1 [D00F]                  	dw	i27patch
 52095 00008FE3 [DA0F]                  	dw	i2fpatch
 52096 00008FE5 [E40F]                  	dw	cpmpatch
 52097                                  
 52098                                  patch_table_size equ ($-patch_table)/2
 52099                                  
 52100                                  patch_in_nops:
 52101 00008FE7 50                      	push	ax
 52102 00008FE8 56                      	push	si
 52103 00008FE9 BE[D78F]                	mov	si,patch_table
 52104 00008FEC B89090                  	mov	ax,9090h ; nop, nop
 52105                                  	; 17/12/2022
 52106                                  	; cx = 0
 52107                                  	;mov	cx,8
 52108                                  	;mov	cx,patch_table_size ; 8
 52109 00008FEF B108                    	mov	cl,patch_table_size ; 8
 52110                                  pin_loop:
 52111 00008FF1 2E8B3C                  	mov	di,[cs:si]

 52116 00008FF6 46                      	inc	si

 52119 00008FFA 58                      	pop	ax

 52203                                  ;align 16
 52204                                  	; DOSDATA (MSDOS.SYS kernel DATA) segment starts here...
 52205                                  	; (4970 bytes for MSDOS 6.21)
 52206                                  	; (4976 bytes for Retro DOS v4.0, 25/05/2019 modification.)
 52207                                  
 52208                                  ;============================================================================
 52209                                  ; MSCONST.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 52210                                  ;============================================================================
 52211                                  ; 03/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 52212                                  ; 25/04/2019 - Retro DOS 4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
 52213                                  ; 16/07/2018 - Retro DOS 3.0	
 52214                                  
 52215                                  ;Break <Initialized data and data used at DOS initialization>
 52216                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 52217                                  
 52218                                  ; We need to identify the parts of the data area that are relevant to tasks
 52219                                  ; and those that are relevant to the system as a whole. Under 3.0, the system
 52220                                  ; data will be gathered with the system code. The process data under 2.x will
 52221                                  ; be available for swapping and under 3.0 it will be allocated per-process.
 52222                                  ;
 52223                                  ; The data that is system data will be identified by [SYSTEM] in the comments
 52224                                  ; describing that data item.
 52225                                  
 52226                                  ;DOSDATA SEGMENT
 52227                                  
 52228                                  ; 04/11/2022
 52229                                  ;[ORG 0]
 52230                                  
 52231                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 52232                                  ; 04/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 52233                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 52234                                  ; DOSDATA segment start offset from beginning of MSDOS.SYS file: 32432 (7EB0h)
 52235                                  ; (3DD0h+7EB0h = 0BC80h) - for MSDOS 5.0 kernel file -
 52236                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 52237                                  
 52238                                  ; 04/11/2022
 52239                                  
 52240                                  ;DOSDATA:0000h
 52241                                  
 52242 00009008 90<rep 8h>              align 16

 52245                                  ; 06/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 52246                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 52247

 52253                                  ;DOSDATASTART equ $
 52254                                  DOSDATASTART:

 52262                                  	;db	4 dup (?)	
 52263 00000000 00<rep 4h>              	times	4 db 0
 52264                                  
 52265                                  	; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 modification
 52266                                  	;dw 	_$STARTCODE ; DOSCODE offset and/or size of DOSDATA
 52267                                  	;dw	0
 52268

 52270                                  
 52271                                  ;align 2
 52272                                  
 52273                                  ; WANGO!!! The following word is used by SHARE and REDIR to determin data
 52274                                  ; area compatability. This location must be incremented EACH TIME the data
 52275                                  ; area here gets mucked with.
 52276                                  ;

 52294                                  MYNUM:			; Offset 000Eh
 52295 0000000E 0000                    	dw	0	; [SYSTEM] A number that goes with MYNAME
 52296                                  FCBLRU: 		; [SYSTEM] LRU count for FCB cache
 52297 00000010 0000                    	dw	0
 52298                                  OpenLRU:

 52300                                  OEM_HANDLER: 		
 52301 00000014 FFFFFFFF                	dd	-1	; [SYSTEM] Pointer to OEM handler code
 52302

 52304                                  ;;			way that we leave DOS???? - jgl
